en: On the 25th, the reporter saw this view when visiting a CNEEC Hami molten salt tower solar power plant in Naomaohu Township of Yiwu County in Hami, Xinjiang.

zh: ”所谓用溶氧山歌热风的，就是讲太阳光通过镜面几种反射到吸热塔形成热能，在通过传统发电技术将热能转化成电
en: “Molten salt tower solar power generation means to form thermal energy through specular concentrated sunlight reflection to the heat absorption tower, then turn the thermal energy into electricity through conventional power generation technology. ”

zh: 中电哈密太阳能发电有限公司副钟经理张勇介绍说，其设计原理类似中国西北地区农村使哟经的太阳灶，都要把
en: Zhang Yong , Vice GM of CNEEC Hami Solar Power Co., Ltd., said the design concept is similar to solar stoves used in Northwestern rural areas, which use concentrated sunlight.

zh: 改发电场于2017年10月开通建设，去年底实现并网，占地600亩，共计划安装14500块
en: Covering an area of 6,600 mu, the power plant, construction of which started in October 2017, was integrated into the grid at the end of last year, with a total of 14,500 heliostats ultimately to be installed.

zh: “相比传统太阳能发电技术，其最大优点是可将聚集的热能储存起来，在网商也能
en: “Compared to conventional solar power technology, its greatest advantage is to store collected thermal energy so that power generation can continue in the evening. ”

zh: 张勇说，该项目配置的13刚消失储热系统，可使发电机保持连续稳定运行，不受光照变化影响，也可根据电网负荷峰谷需求，快速惨
en: Zhang Yong said the 13-hour thermal storage system deployed at this project is not affected by sunlight changes, enabling continuous stable operation of the generator unit, and can also swiftly support power grid peak stabilization according to grid load peak and valley demands.

zh: 该项目完全建成后，可实现年发电量1.98亿度，每年可节约标准煤6万多吨，减配二氧化硫60多吨，呀氧化物60多吨、烟尘约20吨、二氧化碳15多万吨，为当地提供源源不断的
en: Annual power generation of the project will reach 198 million kwh when completed, saving over 60,000 tons of standard coal, cutting over 60 tons of sulfur dioxide emission, 60 tons of oxynitrides, 20 tons of dust and fumes, and over 150,000 tons of carbon dioxide while providing a steady flow of clean energy to the locals.

zh: 除此之外，在哈密市石城子光伏产业园内还有另一片银色”
en: Aside from that, there is another silver sunflower field in Shichengzi Photovoltaic Industrial Park in Hami City.

zh: 哈密富光太阳能光伏电站占地2300多亩，已建成的714太发电设备同样跟随太阳转动，始终奥驰太阳光与聚光板面
en: The Hami Fuguang Solar Photovoltaic Power Plant covers an area of over 2,300 mu, with 714 generators following the sun to always maintain a 90 degree right angle between sunlight and panels.

zh: “我们采用双周跟踪式聚光发电技术，通过统一集成控制，所有发电识别会根据太阳高度调整角度，保持
en: “We use dual-axis tracking CPV technology that through integrated controls, ensures all power generating equipment adjusts its angle to the altitude of the sun to maintain generating efficiency. ”

zh: 该电站站长段琪4说，在光照号的天气条件下，该发点技术较账号的光伏发电效率可提升
en: Duan Mengqi, head of the power plant, said in good lighting weather, this technology improves efficiency by 20% compared to conventional photovoltaic power generation.

zh: 近年上板面，该电站已实现发电700多万度，补充个丹迪用电
en: In the first half of this year, the power plant generated over 7 million kwh of electricity and supplemented local power demand.

zh: 石城子光伏产业园是目前新疆单体规模最大，光伏组件类型最全 的一座光伏产业园区，共入驻光伏发电项目
en: Shichengzi Photovoltaic Industrial Park is currently the largest demonstration park with the most comprehensive photovoltaic component types, and it currently hosts 38 photovoltaic power generation projects with a total installed capacity of 820,000kw.

zh: 今年上半年完成发电量超1.1亿度，较2019年同期
en: In the first half of this year, it generated 110 million kwh, an increase of 6% compared to 2019.

zh: 哈密市中国太阳能资源条件最好的地区
en: Hami is one of the regions that has the best solar energy resources in China.

zh: 年平均太阳总辐射量为每平方米6500多兆焦，全年日照时数3200消失
en: Its average annual solar radiation is over 6,200 MJ per square meter, with around 3,200 annual sunshine hours.

zh: 近年来，该是大力发展光伏产业，种好”向日
en: In recent years, Hami has focused on developing its photovoltaic industry and established “sunflower fields”.

zh: 已建成装机250语玩千瓦的太阳能发电规模，今年上半年该市光伏发电量超14亿度，
en: Installed solar power capacity is over 2.5 million kw, and its power generation exceeded 1.4 billion kwh in the first half of the year, 14% year-on-year growth.

zh: 目前，新疆并网光伏电站330座，装机容量超1000
en: At present, Xinjiang has more than 330 photovoltaic plants connected to the grid, with an installed capacity of over 10 million kw.

zh: 预计今年全年光伏发电量将达150亿度，可替代标准煤600
en: This year’s power generation is expected to be 15 billion kwh, which can replace over 6 million tons of standard coal.

zh: 警方通报“女大学生赴青海旅游失恋”细节搜救工作仍在
en: Details of “the Female College Student Who Lost Contact When Travelling in Qinghai Province” Unveiled by the Police, Search and Rescue are Still Underway -- Xinhua Net

zh: 新华社西宁7月26日电（记者王晶晶 周喆）近日，“一名女大学生前往青海格尔木旅游后失联”一事因
en: XINING, July 26 (Xinhua) (Journalist: Wang Jinjin, Zhou Zhe) Recently, the news that “a female college student lost contact while travelling in Golmud, Qinghai Province” attracted the attention of net citizens.

zh: 青海省海西蒙古族藏族至子洲格尔木市公安局26就通报，南京耨大学学而生黄某耨目前仍处于失联状态，多滴警方正深入黄耨耨失联地沿线，积极
en: According to the notice of the Public Security Bureau of Golmud City, Haixi Mongolian and Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture on July 26th, 2020, a female college student in Nanjing whose surname is Huang lost contact; the police of multiple cities are proactively searching for her around the place where she lost contact.

zh: 2020年7月10日，海西州格尔木市公安局治安支队接到上级通知，南京某大学学生黄某某于7月5日称作Z164列车由南京至格尔木，于7月9日在青海省玉树藏族自治州曲麻菜县索南打绳结保护站清水和西南区域处手机并
en: On July 10, 2020, the Security Team of the Public Security Bureau of Golmud, Haixi Mongolian and Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture of Qinghai Province was informed by higher authorities that a female college student in Nanjing whose surname is Huang took the Z164 Railway from Nanjing to Golmud, and her cellphone was turned off in the southwest of Qingshui River, Suonandajie Natural Protection Station, Malai County, Yushu Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture of Qinghai Province, and were asked to help search the lost girl.

zh: 根据格尔木市公安局的调查情况，黄某某于7月6日19时54分进入青海省境内，7月4时抵达
en: According to the investigation of the Public Security Bureau of Golmud, Huang entered Qinghai Province at 19:00 of July 6, 2020, and arrived in Golmud at 4:00 of July 7.

zh: 单日8时，失联人员黄某某乘坐出租车由格尔木市黄河大酒店朝G109国道出发，并与12时到底可可西里索南达杰保护站，出粗车四集单独返回，黄某某7日到底索南达杰保护站附近清水区域直至
en: At 8:00 of July 7th, Huang took a taxi from the Yellow River Hotel in Golmud to G109 National Expressway, and arrived at Suonandajie Natural Protection Station in Hoh Xil at 12:00, after which the taxi driver returned alone, and at 15:00 of July 7th, Huang arrived at the area of Qingshui River around Suonandajie Natural Protection Station until her cellphone was turned off at 18:00, July 9.

zh: 艾进一步调查中，警方发现黄某某曾与7月13日17时07分通过
en: During further investigation, the police found that Huang arrived at Naijigou Checkpoint at 17:07 of July 13.

zh: 乃机构检查站是先自治区那曲市在格尔木市南口设立的检查站，由于该检查站无视频监控，无法确定本人及所乘坐车辆信息，警方只能驾车在沿途进行查找，协调西藏沿途个检查站若发现黄某某经，立即与
en: Naijigou Checkpoint is a checkpoint set at the south mountain pass of Golmud by Naqu, Tibet; without video surveillance, it is impossible to confirm the information of the person and car, so the police could only search for clues along the road, and they asked checkpoints along the way to Tibet to immediately contact with the Police Security Bureau of Golmud if they encounter someone looking like Huang.

zh: 根据最新情况，7月26日凌晨1时，格尔木市公安局组织救援惹力量携带救援设备，前往青藏公路沿线不冻泉保护站、索南达杰保护站进行查找，并积极与四川警方、西藏警方、南京警方取得联系，公开展工作，目前
en: According to the latest news, at 1:00 on July 26, the Police Security Bureau of Golmud organized a rescue team to search in Budongquan and Suonandajie Natural Protection Stations along the Tibetan Expressway, and maintained active contact with the police in Sichuan, Tibet, and Nanjing, for cooperation; the search and rescue operation is still underway.

zh: 当地警方希望广大网友和社会各界如有相关线索，及时向格尔木警方和南京江宁警方体用，真去早日找到失联
en: The local police hopes that if there are clues held by netizens and people in all walks of life, they should be immediately provided to the police of Golmud and Jiangning, Nanjing in an effort to find Huang as soon as possible.

zh: 同时，有关专家提示，游客在户外活动时要规范、理性、闻名、随时留意路边警示标示，切勿冒险进入无人区、遇到突发情况，用
en: At the same time, according to relevant experts, tourists should follow the rules and be rational when doing outdoor activities, should pay attention to warning signs along the road at all times, not take the risk of entering deserted areas, and if there are emergencies, call the police immediately.

zh: 美煤解开了美方五段要求中国关闭休斯顿总领馆的
en: U.S. Media Unveils U.S. Unwarranted Demand to Shut Down Chinese Consulate General In Huston-ChinaNews.com

zh: 2020-07-26 14:40:44 来源：央视网 坐着：朱淹静 责任编辑
en: 2020-07-26 14:40:44 Source:cctv.com Author:Zhu Yanjing Editor: Zhu Yanjing

zh: 美媒揭开了美方无端要求中国关闭驻休斯顿总领
en: U.S. Media Unveils U.S. Unwarranted Demand to Shut Down Chinese Consulate General In Huston

zh: 中国外交部通知美国驻华使馆，中房决定侧小对美国驻成都总领事馆的设立和运行许可，并对改总领事馆停止一直业务和活动提出具体要求，作为对美方21日突然要求关闭
en: On the 24th of this month, the Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs notifies United States’ Embassy to China that it decided to revoke the license for the establishment and operation of the U.S. Consulate General in Chengdu, and outlines specific requirements to shut down all businesses and activities of the Consulate General in response to the sudden U.S. request to shut down the Chinese Consulate General in Houston on the 21st.

zh: 美国政府这一行为引发多方关注，其政治动机遭到了外媒和
en: This action taken by the United States government has drawn broad attention, and its political motivation is questioned by foreign media and scholars.

zh: 为何要求中房关闭总？
en: What is the reason behind the demand for the Chinese Consulate General shutdown?

zh: 多家外媒称，尚不清楚为何美国会选中中国驻休斯敦总领馆，但对于这一举动的目的，外媒直言不讳地
en: Several foreign media reported that the reason why the U.S. would select the Chinese Consulate General in Huston is unclear, but as to the purpose of this action, they stated straightforwardly that it was “for the election”.

zh: 美国有线电视新闻网（CNN）23日报道称，美方要求中房关闭驻休斯顿总领的举动引发民众对其政治
en: According to a CNN report on the 23rd, the request to shut down the Chinese Consulate General in Houston made people question the United States’ political motives.

zh: 文章称，美国政府对下个赢球灾难性的应对，造成了总统特兰不在大选前的民调支持
en: As the article states, U.S. government’s disastrous response to the COVID-19 pandemic has led to President Trump’s sluggish support rate in polls prior to the election.

zh: 白宫官员私下称，对中国采取的强音策略是为了挽救特朗普的支持率，同时也是为了转移白宫疫情
en: White House officials’ private statements indicate that the tough position against China is to save Trump’s support rate as well as to shift the focus away from the White House’s failure in response to the pandemic.

zh: 文章认为，中国驻休斯顿总领事的美国选择的一个“受政治驱动、非常净胜的”目标，米国政府选中它是“为了制造强硬的态度，同时避免造成
en: The article believes Chinese Consulate General in Houston to be a “politically motivated and discreet” target chosen by the U.S. “to create a tough position while avoiding major conflicts”.

zh: 英国广播公司（bbC)也认为，在美国大选季菈林、美国经济受到疫情严重打击之际，天天老婆认为”打“中国
en: The BBC also believes that with the U.S. election around the corner and the U.S. economy suffering badly due to the pandemic, Trump sees “playing the ‘China card’ as politically beneficial”.

zh: 目前的状态是”一场螺旋式上升的、针锋相对的斗争“，这艾一定程度上是由美国政府从国内考量的角度推动的，只会退中美之间的
en: The current situation is a “spiraling tit for tat fight”, which, driven by U.S. government’s domestic considerations to some extent, will only worsen tensions between China and the U.S.

zh: 美国哥伦比亚广播公司（CBS）报道称，特朗普的连任前景因疫情爆发而承压，他一定因疫情
en: According to CBS, Trump’s prospects for a second term is under pressure because of the pandemic, and he has repeatedly pointed his finger at China for the outbreak.

zh: 美国几乎煤炭都有针对特朗普所谓”中国波鞋美国“黄牛轮的
en: The U.S. has almost daily new actions based on Trump’s absurd argument of so-called “China’s exploitation of the United States”.

zh: ”休斯顿宗林冠在建立两国联系方面
en: “The Consulate General in Huston is important for building bilateral connections”

zh: 美联社评论称，美国要求中国关闭驻休斯顿宗林冠加剧了世界上最大的两个经济之
en: As stated by the AP, the U.S. request to shut down Chinese Consulate General will aggravate tensions between two of the world’s largest economies.

zh: 若关闭了中国驻休斯敦总领馆，除了外交方面的影响，位于美国南部的中国公民而面临获得领事服务方面的困难，寻求签证和其他服务的美国
en: Besides the diplomatic impact, with the Chinese Consulate General in Houston shut down, Chinese citizens in the South will face difficulties accessing consular services, and so will U.S. citizens applying for visas or other services.

zh: 休斯顿一家商业团体对美方要求中国关闭驻休斯敦总临馆一事表示一眼，称总领馆在建立两国贸易、投资和文化联系方面
en: A business group in Huston expressed its regrets on this matter, saying the Consulate General plays a key role in bilateral trade, investment, and cultural connections.

zh: 美联社认为，这放映中国经济
en: The AP believes that it reflects the importance of China’s economy.

zh: 美国《外交政策》杂志网站认为内，美方这一举动，是一系列挑衅性举措的一部分，这些举措只会让
en: According to the Foreign Policy website, this action by the U.S. is “part of a series of provocative moves that will only aggravate U.S.-China relations”.

zh: 路透社袁莹美国智库布鲁金斯学会东亚问题专家乔纳森·波拉克的话称，自从美国两国1979年建立全面外交关系以来，它想不出任何举动能与美国针对中国驻休斯顿总领馆
en: Reuters quoted Jonathan Pollack, East Asia expert of Brookings Institution, saying he couldn’t think of anything comparable to the United States action on the Chinese Consulate General in Houston since the two countries established diplomatic relations in 1979.

zh: 香港《南华早报》报道称，美方这一举动在中美两国40余年外交关系
en: The South China Morning Post in Hong Kong calls the U.S. action unprecedented in the 40 years of China-U.S. diplomatic relations.

zh: 分析人士认为，这一举动可能造成持久性
en: Analysts believe this action could cause lasting damage.

zh: 中国驻休斯顿总磷光建于1979年，是中国在美国开设的
en: The Chinese Consulate General in Houston was established in 1979 as the first Chinese Consulate General opened in the United Stated.

zh: 目前，中国在美国设有一个大使馆和五个
en: Currently, China has one Embassy and five Consulate Generals in the United States.

zh: 威灵顿举办阅兵式庆祝海军节-
en: Russia holds Navy Day military parade - Xinhuanet

zh: 7月26日，在晚了斯圣彼得堡，舰艇列队参加海军庆
en: On July 26th in St. Petersburg, Russia, ships line up to take part in Navy Day celebrations.

zh: 新华社发（莫京娜
en: Xinhua News Agency (Photo: Mo Jingna)

zh: 新华社莫斯科7月26日电（记者鲁金博）俄罗斯各舰队26荣举行约定不是庆祝海军节，纪念俄海军成立
en: Xinhua News Agency, Moscow, July 26th (Correspondent: Lu Jinbo) On the 26th, the Russian fleet held a military parade to commemorate Navy Day and the 324th anniversary of the founding of the Russian Navy.

zh: 当天，俄罗斯北海、博罗的海、黑海、里海和太平洋舰队分别在各自基地所在海域举行了月的，共有1.5万军人、219艘各类舰艇
en: On the same day, similar parades were held by the Russian Northern, Baltic Sea, Black Sea, Caspian Sea, and Pacific Fleets in their respective waters, which together involved 15,000 soldiers, 219 ships of every type, and 71 military aircraft.

zh: 俄总统、武装力量最高统帅普京出席了波罗的海舰队的
en: Vladimir Putin, Russia’s president and supreme commander of the armed forces, attended the Baltic Fleet parade.

zh: 约4000名军人、46艘舰艇和40余架战机参加了丹迪的阅兵
en: Over 4,000 soldiers, 46 ships, and more than 40 military aircraft took part in this parade.

zh: 普京首先在于波罗的海格朗是他海军基地水域检阅了
en: Putin’s first stop was to inspect the fleet in the waters off the Kronstadt naval base on the Baltic.

zh: 之后，他乘坐快艇抵达圣彼得堡市中心的瓦河水域并上岸，观看了在瓦河上
en: Later, he went by speedboat to the Neva River in central St. Petersburg, where he went ashore to watch the parade pass on the Neva.

zh: 普京在阅兵式上发表讲话，俄海军装备的现代化技术水平近年来持续提升，俄海军2020年将总共接收约40艘配备独特高超音速
en: At the parade, Putin said in a speech that the technical level of modern Russian naval hardware continues to improve, and that in 2020, it will receive roughly 40 new ships with exclusive hypersonic attack technology.

zh: 另外，俄海军总司令耶夫美诺福日前在接受俄国防部机关报《红星报》才犯事说，俄建造舰艇的计划得到了有效落实，2020年俄海军计划接受的新舰艇数量
en: Nikolai Yevmenov, commander-in-chief of the Russian Navy, said in an interview with Russian Defense Ministry newspaper “Red Star” that Russia’s plan to construct new ships has been effectively carried out, and in 2020, the amount of new ships received by the Russian Navy will be among the highest in recent years.

zh: 1696年，沙皇彼得大帝着手组件蛤蚧酒舰队，开创了俄海军
en: The history of the Russian Navy began in 1696, when Tsar Peter the Great implemented a plan to acquire a navy for Russia.

zh: 每年7月最后一个星期日是俄罗斯
en: Russia’s Navy Day takes place each year on the last Sunday of July.

zh: 针对疫情反馈共工作出现的新变化，自7月17日日以来，新疆各级工会响应自治区总工会的号召，积极
en: In response to the new changes in pandemic prevention and control, since July 17, trade unions at all levels in Xinjiang have responded to the call of the Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region Federation of Trade Unions and actively participated in the work of pandemic prevention and control.

zh: 天山南北工会干部、职工、劳动模范走进街道社区、军民群众中，开展送菜送药、消毒灭菌‘宣传防疫知识等活动，feud职工群众，用实际行动
en: Trade union cadres, workers, and model workers from the north and south of the Tianshan Mountains went into the streets, communities, and residences to deliver food and medicine, disinfect and sterilize, and disseminate knowledge related to pandemic prevention and control by holding activities, served the workers and the public, and demonstrated the "solid power" of trade unions through practical actions.

zh: 近日，乌鲁木齐市天生是拿去总工会慰问组一行，将一批急需的疫情防控生物生活物资送到了12个隔离点
en: Recently, the charity group of the Urumqi Tianshan District Federation of Trade Unions sent a batch of urgently needed necessities for pandemic prevention and control to the staff of the 12 isolation sites.

zh: 疫情发生后，泰山区总第一时间投入经费105万预算，紧急下拨不23个
en: After the outbreak of the COVID-19, the Tianshan District Federation of Trade Unions invested more than RMB 1.05 million, which were urgently allocated to the 23 subordinate grassroots trade unions.

zh: 中建新疆建工一建党委副书记、工会主席赵相国借到公司关于疫情防控的通知后，主动请缨，选择在单位值班，
en: After receiving the company's notice on pandemic prevention and control, Zhao Xiangguo, Deputy Secretary of the Party Committee and Chairman of the Trade Union of the First Construction Engineering Group of CSCEC Xinjiang Construction & Engineering (Group) Co., Ltd, took the initiative and chose to stay on duty in the office to protect the staff.

zh: 他为居住在单位宿舍和新入职的职工送去做饭的脆距、食品及日用品，并组织人员每隔两天为他们
en: During this period, he sent cooking utensils, food, and daily necessities to workers and new recruits living in the company dormitory, and dispatched personnel to deliver essentials every two days.

zh: “7月21日起，对坚守战”弈“一线的干部职工进行摸底，并采取线上下单，商家送货上门的方式，先行为乌鲁木齐地区704名一线职工群众补充购买防疫
en: "From July 21, we surveyed the cadres and workers on the front line, and placing orders online and home delivery by merchants was adopted to purchase and deliver additional supplies and living materials for 704 frontline workers and people in the Urumqi area. ”

zh: 新疆及哀痛运输工会负责人告诉记者，面对突发疫情，他们全力做好疫情防控服务保障、稳步推进交通运输发展各项工作，营造齐心
en: The person in charge of trade union of the Transport Department of Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region told this reporter that faced with the sudden outbreak of the COVID-19, they were doing their best to guarantee services for pandemic prevention and control and steadily promote the development of transport, creating a strong sense of unity in the battle against the COVID-19.

zh: 正单正值夏季高温，各级工作静定疫情防控重点地区的一线职工，把”“关心关爱落到
en: At present, as the summer heat comes, trade unions at all levels are concentrating their efforts in serving front-line workers in the key areas of the pandemic prevention and control, in order to send their care and concern.

zh: 7月19日，乌鲁木齐陷总工会启动向疫情防控一线职工”送清凉“慰问活动，全县警务站、卡点和卫生系统受到了
en: On July 19, the Federation of Trade Unions in the Urumqi County launched a "cool delivery" campaign to frontline workers in the pandemic prevention and control, during which police stations, key places, and sanitation systems throughout the county received drinks, fruit, and other sympathy products.

zh: ”工会干部要进一步提高政治站位’强化责任当担，用关怀温暖人心，用行动
en: "All cadres in the company should further improve our political standing and strengthen the awareness of our responsibility so that we can warm others with care and inspire others with action.

zh: 要充分发挥工会组织凝聚职工、团结职工的作用，做好疫情防控服务保障，积极维护广大职工的健康权益，把关爱送到
en: We should give full play to the role of trade unions in building cohesion and unity among workers, do a good job in guaranteeing pandemic prevention and control services, and actively safeguard the health rights of labor by sending care to front-line workers, ”

zh: 自治区总工会相关夫人表。
en: The person in charge of the Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region Federation of Trade Unions said.

zh: 2020年执照试管工作全面展开-新华网
en: The work of directly recruiting sergeants has been fully launched -- Xinhua Net

zh: 西红柿北京7月26日电（记着贾启龙）均为政治工作部、均为国防动员部今日联合印发通知，部署展开2020年从普通高中线下毕业生中自己招收士官工作
en: Xinhua News Agency Beijing, July 26th, 2020 (Journalist: Jia Qilong) Recently, the Political Work Department of the Central Military Commission (CMC) and the National Defense Mobilization Department of the CMC jointly announced the launch of direct sergeant recruitment among university graduates in 2020.

zh: 今年执照试管涵盖计算机、自动化、机械等64类270宇哥军地通用专业，重点加大无人机、祸害、航空航天、电子信息、协议中等怎样接受力度，招收规模相比去年增加近2000人
en: The recruitment this year covers over 270 majors of general use in military camps such as computer science, automation, and machine engineering, which can be divided into 64 kinds in total; recruitment will focus more on majors including unmanned aerial vehicles, navigation, aerospace, electronic information, and minority languages, with the number of sergeants to be recruited has increased by nearly 2,000 in comparison with that of last year.

zh: 今年执照试管工作与义务兵征集同步组织实施，8月1日开始，9月30日结束
en: The direct recruitment of sergeants and compulsory soldiers will be held at the same time, from August 1st to September 30th.

zh: 嬴政青年刻意通过全国征兵网网址：http//www.gfbzbgovcn查询只按照试管条件和招收专业分布情况，符合专业服务和招收推荐的在线提交报名信息，并根据应征地兵役机关统一要求，要求体格检查、制造恐慌等后续招收工作。
en: The young people willing to be recruited can view the requirements and required majors in different regions via the National Soldier Recruitment Website (website: http://www.gfbzb.gov.cn), and those who conform to the conditions can register and apply for the positions online, after which they should engage in the later work including physical examination and political evaluation according the requirements of local military recruitment authorities.

zh: 因招收专业和计划限制未能被招收为试管的合格去年，刻意参加义务兵征集，付义务兵役期满选取为士官时，在普通高等学校按规定血脂就读的年数视同复议时间。
en: Qualified youth not recruited as sergeants who are limited by their majors or the recruitment plan can apply to be a compulsory soldier, and after the period of military service, they can be selected as sergeants; years spent studying in universities can be regarded as time spent in military service.

zh: 今年试管招收工作有省级或地市级人民政府张兵办公室统一组织，报名潜力丰富专业将在之后来帮忙对象学历层次，在校期间专业课程及、取得职业资格证书等青口镇础上择优遴选；稀缺专业将项目本地符合专业要求、具备招收有事的院线定向对口招生。
en: The recruitment of sergeants this year is organized by soldier recruitment offices of provincial or municipal people’s governments; for majors of numerous candidates, after evaluating the educational background, academic grades and professional certificates of the candidates, the best will be selected; for minority majors, they will select qualified candidates from competitive local universities conforming to the requirements.

zh: 根据疫情常态化防控要求，今年执照试管元遏制不安排自行报到，将于义务兵同步组织运输入营。
en: According to requirements for daily control of COVID-19, sergeants to be recruited this year will not enroll in the army themselves, but will be sent together with the new compulsory soldiers.

zh: 直接招收士官入伍时间从2020年9月1日期数，不对下达士官任命任命的时间为2020年12月1日。
en: The enlistment time for directly recruited sergeants will be September 1st, 2020, but the time arranged by the army to report for duty will be December 1st, 2020.

zh: 不对接受单位将科学制定入伍和专业训练方案，认真组织视讯；训练完成后按照抓呢对口、招用一致的原则，讲招收试管统一精准分配到对口专业技术港味。
en: The employing institutions of the army will make scientific plans for enlisting and professional training; after training, sergeants will be sent to the corresponding technical positions according to the principle of “matching positions with majors”.

zh: 朱英使馆发言人：找工作方式网络安全的坚定维护者-中新网
en: Spokesperson of the Embassy of the People’s Republic of China in the UK: The Chinese Government is a Staunch Defender of Cyber Security-Ecns.cn

zh: 只希望7月26日电 锯中英驻英国大使馆网站消息，25日，中国驻英国使馆发言人就有关网络攻击错误原来大家再问。
en: July 26, (Ecns.cn): According to the website of the Embassy of the People’s Republic of China in the UK, on the 25th, the spokesperson of the Embassy of the People’s Republic of China in the UK responded to reporters' questions about erroneous statements about cyber attacks.

zh: 发言人强调，中国政府是我拉去的鉴定维护者，一贯坚决反对并大吉任何形式的网络攻击和网络犯罪
en: The spokesperson emphasized that the Chinese government was a staunch defender of cyber security and has always resolutely opposed and combated any form of cyber attacks and cyber crimes.

zh: 有记者提问：据媒体称，与中国有关的黑客组织层个人一家英国公司网络系统、乡村游整理数据的英美技术公司发动攻击、入清欧盟国家政府的网络
en: A reporter stated that according to the media, hacker organizations related to China had interfered with the network system of a British company, launched attacks on British and American technology companies that had patented data, and invaded the government networks of EU countries.

zh: 发言人表示，中国政府是我拉群的的坚定为孔者，一罐坚决反对并大吉任何形式的网络攻击和网络犯罪
en: The spokesperson said that the Chinese government was a staunch defender of cyber security and has always resolutely opposed and combated any form of cyber attacks and cyber crimes.

zh: 网络空间徐in性强，溯源难，行为体多样，再掉擦和定性网络事件的时候应拿出重复的证据，不能无端猜测
en: Cyberspace is highly virtual, and it’s difficult to trace with diverse actors, meaning sufficient evidence should be presented when investigating and identifying cyber incidents, and no unreasonable guesses should be made.

zh: 发言人称，以往的领荆门等一系列事件证明，美国一直都在进行全球最大服务的晚了窃密行动
en: The spokesperson said that a series of incidents such as "Prism" in the past proved that the United States has been conducting the world's largest cyber theft.

zh: 维护网络科技的和平和稳定符合所有国家的共同礼仪。
en: Maintaining peace and stability in cyberspace was in line with the common interest of all countries.

zh: 发言人支出，中国在科技创新方面的成就不是头来得、不是青睐的，而是通过自力更生、艰苦奋斗大量的。
en: The spokesperson pointed out that China's achievements in technological innovation were not stolen or robbed, but were obtained through self-reliance and perseverance.

zh: 2019年中国通过展览会在同一PCT途径提交了约5.9晚间治疗伤情，年增长率与10.6%，成为提交国际专利申请量最多的国家。
en: In 2019, China submitted about 59,000 patent applications through the Patent Cooperation Treaty (PCT), with an annual growth rate of 10.6%, making it the country with the largest number of international patent applications.

zh: 中国已经参加创新知识产权大国。
en: China has become a country of innovation and intellectual property rights.

zh: 中国人民银行为了你确实中心支行数据显示，上半年，新疆涉农和小微企业新增贷款俊超2019年千年之恋。
en: New loans to both farmers and small and micro enterprises in Xinjiang in the first half of the year exceeded the annual increase in 2019, according to data from the Urumqi Central Sub-branch of the People's Bank of China.

zh: 今年上半年，人民银行乌鲁木齐市振兴中华运用多种货币政策工具，引导银行业不断加大贷款投放力度，为疫情防控和复工复产提供了查找自己准备。
en: In the first half of this year, the Urumqi Central Sub-branch of the People's Bank of China used a variety of monetary policy tools to guide the banking industry in continuously increasing the loan supply, providing sufficient capital guarantees for COVID-19 prevention and control and the resumption of work and production.

zh: 乌鲁木齐免费红烧鸡翅多数去已基本完成 高风险地区进行二次检测-中新网
en: Free Nucleic Acid Testing Have Basically Been Completed in Most of Regions of Urumqi, Second Testing is Ongoing in High-risk Areas-Ecns.cn

zh: 只希望乌鲁木齐7月26日电急着孙亭文 赵雅敏乌鲁木齐市我今晚自然张伟26日在通报乌鲁木齐市最新疫情和还是检测情况时称，目前，乌鲁木齐市全是免费核酸检测工作多数去要坚持完成。
en: URUMQI, July 26 (Ecns.cn, by Sun Tingwen, Zhao Yaomin): Zhang Wei, director of the Municipal Health Commission of Urumqi, reported on the state of the latest outbreak of pandemic and nucleic acid testing in Urumqi on the 26th, saying that at present, free nucleic acid testing work has been basically completed in most areas of Urumqi.

zh: 公务员专家组和自治区、乌鲁木齐市专家正在更具还是检测和流行病学调查结果，对一切的发展做进一步屁股。
en: The expert group of the State Council and experts from the autonomous region and Urumqi are making further assessments of the development of the pandemic based on the results of the nucleic acid testing and epidemiological investigations.

zh: 现金维吾尔自治区新闻榜是室26日召开新闻发布会通报现金疫情和防控情况
en: The Press Office of the Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region held a press conference on the 26th to report on the pandemic situation and its prevention and control in Xinjiang.

zh: 据他介绍，7月25日0⑩只24时，乌鲁木齐市新增新冠肺炎病例22例气候物理为无症状感染者转确诊病例，现在无症状感染这
en: According to him, there were 22 new confirmed COVID-19 cases in Urumqi from 0:00 to 24 on July 25 (including 5 confirmed asymptomatic cases), and 38 new asymptomatic cases.

zh: 截止7余额25日24时，乌鲁木齐市现有钦州北路135例，无症状感染这147里
en: As of 24:00 on July 25, 135 cases were confirmed in Urumqi and 147 were asymptomatic.

zh: 25日新增的无症状感染这也基本上都是通过全市免费核酸检测、自动生成出来的。
en: The newly-added asymptomatic cases on the 25th were also basically discovered through free nucleic acid testing in the city.

zh: 乌鲁木齐市我今晚张任张伟26日称，乌鲁木齐全是麻烦核实检测工作多数去已基本完成。
en: Zhang Wei, director of the Municipal Health Commission of Urumqi, reported that free nucleic acid testing work has basically been completed in most areas of Urumqi.

zh: 他还说，从国内其他地区的讲演看，镜像核酸检测结果的因素很多，比如检测试剂灵敏度，受监测人民的个人数据和排毒时间，标本去菜市受监测着配合情况配合度差可能导致标本没有去到位及检测环境、检验人员的操作熟练程度
en: He also said that from the experience of other regions in China, there are many factors that affect the results of nucleic acid testing, such as sensitivity of detection reagents, infection time and detoxification time of the tested people, cooperation of the tested people when the samples are taken (low level of cooperation may lead to failure to take the specimen), as well as the detection environment and the proficiency of the inspectors.

zh: 由于各种原因，红烧鸡翅也会出现假阴性的结果。
en: For various reasons, false negative results can also appear in nucleic acid testing.

zh: 所谓假阴性，就是指受监测着确实是感染者，但是核酸检测结果却为音响。
en: False negative means that the person tested is indeed infected, but the results of the nucleic acid test are negative.

zh: 另外，对于和确诊病例、疑似病例有过密切接触的人员，通常需要两次红烧鸡翅才能
en: In addition, for those who have close contact with confirmed cases and suspected cases, it usually takes two nucleic acid tests to exclude them.

zh: 对于去过疫情中高风险地区的人员，如果出现发热和还醒度竹钟，一次核酸检测隐形存在假阴性可能，所以也需要两次核酸检测才能拍出。
en: For those who have been to the high-risk areas for the pandemic, if fever and respiratory symptoms occur, there may be a possibility of false negatives in nucleic acid testing, so another nucleic acid test is needed.

zh: 他表示，鉴于以上情况，为了诠释各族群众的身体健康，从今天开始，乌鲁木齐市将对贴上去、沙依巴克区等主动请缨进行二次免费红烧鸡翅，同时开展“”查遗补漏。
en: He said that in view of the above situation, for the health of the people of all ethnic groups in the city, Urumqi would carry out two free nucleic acid tests in key areas such as Tianshan district and Saybag district, and carry out the work of “making up for deficiencies".

zh: 据悉，天山区、事业部克区是英情高风险地区。
en: It is reported that Tianshan district and Saybag district are high-risk epidemic areas.

zh: 线下精简云热烈 上海国际电影节透出不一般的育才小学-自学网
en: Streamlining Offline and Active on Cloud, Shanghai International Film Festival Shows Unusual Confidence in the Industry-ChinaNews.com

zh: 2020-07-26 06：52：39 俩元：文汇报 坐着：王思硕 责任编辑：王思硕
en: 2020-07-26 06:52:39 Source: Wen Hui Bao Author: Wang Sishuo Editor: Wang Sishuo

zh: 线下精简云商热烈，上海国际电影节透出不一般的才有闲心。
en: Streamlining Offline and Active on Cloud, Shanghai International Film Festival Shows Unusual Confidence in the Industry

zh: 本报讯首席记者王燕昨天，在一个防疫措施背景下举办的2020年收购价电影电视节，以一场全面奔小康，筑梦新时代的产业高峰论坛，开启第二十三届是根据第一届的大幕。
en: Reported by chief correspondent Wang Yan: Yesterday, the 2020 Shanghai International Film Festival was held amidst rigorous pandemic prevention measures, and an industry summit, “Striving for a Better Life and Building Dreams in the New Era”, lifted the curtain on the 23rd Shanghai International Film Festival.

zh: 作为全球疫情持续扩散蔓延和给我疫情防控常态化的来举报的第一个公今有世家，今年的上海国际电影节意义重大
en: As the pandemic continues to spread and as pandemic prevention and control in China are normalized, this year’s Shanghai International Film Festival carries great significance as the first international festival since the start of the pandemic for the film and TV industry.

zh: 在做好疫情防控常态化工作基础上，举报上海国际电影电视剧，及时信心的招式，更是决心的宣誓——我们战胜疫情的信心决心不变，办好人民教师的信心决心不变，建设好QQ音速赤子之心、打响上海文化品牌的就心决心不变。
en: To hold the Shanghai International Film and TV Festival on the basis of implementing regular outbreak prevention and control measures is a demonstration of confidence as well as of determination - our confidence and determination to defeat the pandemic remain unchanged, to give the people a good holiday remain unchanged, and to establish a global film and TV production center and forge the Shanghai Culture brand remain unchanged.

zh: 没有呢的上海国际电影节，以不变创新、不断进取的姿态，都是一次再出发、再开始。
en: Each year is a new start for Shanghai International Film Festival to carry out innovation and progress.

zh: 因此，需要走好每一步，为满足人民大众精神生活服务，位于四川一的高质量奋战服务。
en: Therefore, each step shall be taken carefully to serve the people’s cultural demands and to facilitate quality development of the film and TV industry.

zh: 今年更是汝瓷。
en: It’s even more true this year.

zh: 为了珍惜来之不易的疫情防控借呗，上海国际电影节一方面验收防疫要求，讲疫情防控措施落实作息；另一方面抱着为中国影视车座极具智慧、满足影迷观影需求等愿景，开启线上线下并举的多板块好的。
en: To appreciate the hard-earned outbreak in-control situation, the Shanghai International Film Festival strictly follows pandemic prevention requirements and takes protective measures in even the smallest details, while also, as it carries forward the vision of collective wisdom for Chinese film production and to serve the demands of movie fans, it holds multiple activities both online and offline.

zh: 开幕首日，从线下观影到产业链条，大于卷相关活动都严格落实相关费用政策。
en: On the first day of opening, strict prevention measures were taken for film festival activities, from offline viewing to industrial forums.

zh: 论坛活动控制在50人以为你每场观影隔排个座，上座率严格在20%以内
en: For forum activities, limitations were set for 50 people and under; for each viewing, seats are arranged by every other row and occupancy rate was strictly under 30%.

zh: 正如赢点节组委会秉持的，无论如何，把人民群众数码圈的和身体健康放在第一位都是大前提。
en: “Putting people’s safety and health first” is the first premise for the organizing committee.

zh: 线下活动答复精简，云商热闹了不少。
en: Offline events are significantly streamlined while cloud activities are quite alive.

zh: 为贯彻人民城市热门见，人民城市为人民重要理念，完整人民大众的节日，今年的上海国际电影节图重新、求转型，用线上云战鹰、大师班云中心等举措，满意影迷的多样续签。
en: To carry out the concept of “people’s city built by the people for the people”, as a people’s festival, this year’s Shanghai International Film Festival strives for innovation and transformation through activities like online “cloud screening” and “master classes” to meet the various demands of movie fans.

zh: 开幕首日，大于卷的官方合作伙伴咪咕视频和东方明珠百事通分别讲多不一带一路硬盘尚云，回馈影迷。
en: On the first day, Migu Video and BesTV, official partners of the film festival, each put several “Belt and Road” films on cloud for movie fans.

zh: 当晚，金爵a木论坛与贾樟柯大师班也在样视频、学习强国、文慧App等多个平台上线，让百姓足不出户也能关注工作电影的转向灯向。
en: That evening, the Golden Goblet Forum and Master Class with Jia Zhangke were put on multiple platforms such as Yangshipin, Xuexi.cn, and the Wenhui App so that people could follow the latest trends of the Chinese film industry from the comfort of home.

zh: 昨天的开幕论坛上，这个广播电视总台党组成员、副厅长闫晓明致辞并宣布本届大于卷开幕，是是是唯常规、宣传部部长周慧琳致辞，副市长宗明出席。
en: At the opening forum yesterday, Yan Xiaoming, Party Group member at China Central Radio and Television Station and deputy chief, made a speech and announced the opening of the festival, while Zhou Huilin, member of the Shanghai Municipal Party Committee and director of the publicity department also spoke at the opening, and deputy mayor Zong Ming attended the opening forum.

zh: 白宫已清专家夫妻：对2021年初研制出疫苗持谨慎乐观
en: Fauci, White House pandemic expert: cautiously optimistic attitude should be held towards vaccine development in early 2021

zh: 夫妻25日在国际领袖基金会主板的一场网络视频好余生作上述表示。
en: Fauci made the above remarks at an online video conference hosted by the International Leadership Foundation on July 25th.

zh: 他提醒说，目前说不清楚香港疫情在秋冬季将如何发展，也不知道疫情的最终影响会如何，而结束这一切的我有办法就是我们每个人都写在成为解决问题的一部分
en: He warned that it was not clear how COVID-19 would develop in the autumn and winter, nor what the ultimate impact of the pandemic would be, saying, "The only way to end all this is that we all choose to be part of the solution."

zh: 句美国约翰斯霍普金斯大学数据，截止25日21时，美国新官桥镇了病历已达417.6万，死亡14.6万人。
en: According to data from Johns Hopkins University, as of 21:00 on July 25th, the number of confirmed cases in the United States was 4.176 million, with 146,000 deaths.

zh: 夫妻表示，美国一些地区目前正在艰难的通反弹的疫情作斗争。
en: Fauci said some parts of the United States were struggling with a pandemic resurgence.

zh: 跟尽管各地以前有所不同，需要因地制宜的应对方案，但多元化的抗议策略并不意味着短期债券没用紧密联系
en: Although the pandemic situation varies from place to place and needs to be dealt with according to local conditions, diversified anti-pandemic strategies do not mean that there is no close connection between them.

zh: 一个地区的一切最终会影响到其它地区
en: The pandemic situation in one area will eventually affect other areas.

zh: 现在不是自满的时候，夫妻说，我们的工作没有完成，必须加紧努力，也必须对未来的不确定性本次截图
en: "This is not the time for complacency," Fauci said, "We have not finished our work, so we must step up our efforts and be alert regarding the uncertainty of the future. ”

zh: 每个华裔医学专家，治疗艾滋病鸡尾酒疗法常使人和大衣在会上支出，美国香港疫情上位打到顶峰。
en: David Ho, a Chinese American medical expert and the founder of HAART (highly active antiretroviral therapy) for AIDs treatment, pointed out at the conference that COVID-19 in the US had not yet reached its peak.

zh: 美国每个人都必须尽自己的一份力来几号这一别的的传播。
en: "Each of us has to do our part to slow the spread of the virus. ”

zh: 和大衣呼吁，公众用自己的实际行动为科学家争取时间，溢价近研发信管治疗药物和一秒。
en: David Ho called on the public to use their own practical actions to buy time for the research and development of COVID-19 treatment drugs and vaccines.

zh: 国际精修基金会是一家以促进美国及亚太地区国际交流活动为宗旨的放於琅邪增长，赵丽颖提升美国亚太一地位，皮鳄鱼国际青年旅游。
en: The International Leadership Foundation is a non-profit organization that promotes international exchange activities in the United States and the Asia-Pacific region, and is committed to promoting the status of Asian-Pacific Americans and cultivating international youth leaders.

zh: 当天，美国运输保障赵小兰、美联邦议员孟少文以及国际流行基金会楚汉之争董继玲等分别在会上发言
en: Elaine Chao, US Department of Transportation Secretary, Grace Meng, a member of the House of Representatives, and Chiling Tong, founding president of the International Leadership Foundation, each spoke at the meeting.

zh: 他们特别想在一线抗议的亚太一义务工作者和志愿者致敬，并呼吁美国公众继续坚持社交距离等翻译准则，恶意疫情扩散
en: They paid special tribute to the Asian-Pacific medical workers and volunteers who were fighting the pandemic on the front line, and called on the American public to continue to adhere to the pandemic prevention guidelines such as "social distancing" to curb the spread of the pandemic.

zh: 大连：无新增新冠肺炎本地区做不了 新增24例无症状感染在-小孩子
en: Dalian: no new local confirmed COVID-19 cases, 24 new asymptomatic infected - Xinhuanet

zh: 西红柿大连7月25日电急着蔡拥军、崔世豪打死了25日发布信息，7月24日15时至7月25日14时，代理商无新增新冠肺炎本地确诊病例，新增24例我正在过日子，无新增疑似病例
en: Xinhua News Agency, Dalian, reported July 25th (Correspondents: Cai Yongjun and Cui Shihao) On the 25th, Dalian City announced that between July 24th 15:00-July 25th 14:00, there were no new local confirmed COVID-19 cases in the city, 24 new asymptomatic infected, and no suspected new cases.

zh: 7月22日至25日14时，全市累计报告新冠肺炎本地却做不了12例，均在大连市电流人民医院集中管理治疗。
en: From July 22-25 14:00, the city reported 12 confirmed cases of COVID-19, all of which were undergoing treatment at centralized isolation rooms at Dalian Sixth People's Hospital.

zh: 大连市卫生健康委负责人招联表示，大连市根据疫情情况，组织全市三级医院医务人员金主街道社区，在大连湾、工人村、轻轨沿线以及金普新区部分重点区域开设600个彩阳店，权利推进人员荷官晒查工作，每天触动近两千名医护人员进修核酸检测蔡阳。
en: Zhao Lian, deputy director of the Health Committee of Dalian, said that given the pandemic situation in Dalian, medical staff from tertiary hospitals were stationed at streets and neighborhood communities around the city and more than 600 sampling stations were established in some key areas including Dalian Bay, Gongrencun, along the light rail line, and Jinpu New District to fully carry out nucleic acid screening work, with nucleic acid test samples collected daily by nearly 2,000 medical personnel.

zh: 纸质7月25日14时，全市累计采样21万余人次。
en: As of July 25th 14:00, 210,000 samples had been collected throughout the city.

zh: 大连市当前12里确诊保留中10里为大连凯洋世界海鲜股份有限公司员工；54里无症状感染这中46里为该公司员工几期亲戚家属，在所有的红烧鸡翅阳性病例中，该企业员工几期亲戚家树所占比重打到
en: Among the 12 current confirmed cases in Dalian, 10 are employees of Dalian Kaiyang World Seafood Co., Ltd.; of the 43 current asymptomatic infected, 46 are employees of the company or their friends and relatives; employees of the company or their friends and relatives make up 85% of total positive nucleic acid test results.

zh: 经研判，大连市决定对大连凯洋世界华鑫股份有限公司所有员工的目前检察长以及从密切接触者的目前检察长呀加强严格管控，实施14日集中隔离医学管擦、至少2次核酸检测。
en: After analysis and determination, Dalian decided to intensify strict management of all close contacts of Dalian Kaiyang World Seafood Co., Ltd., as well as secondary close contacts, by requiring 14 days of centralized isolation and medical observation for them, as well as requiring at least 2 nucleic acid tests.

zh: 大连市提示几点，就不要扩大实施集中隔离医学观察人员范围，对核酸检测阳性人员寒冰李及无症状感染这的密切接触者、密切接触者的密切接触者全部实施14日就足够了医学观察、至少2次还是检测。
en: Dalian also decided to expand the scope of those subject to centralized isolation and medical observation, and will now require 14 days of centralized isolation and medical observation and at least 2 nucleic acid tests for the close contacts and secondary close contacts of anyone with positive nucleic acid tests (including cases and asymptomatic infections).

zh: 大连机场、大连火车站25日均发布同志，其实人们原则上实施非不要不露连，确需历练的，须持7日内核酸检测阴性证明；大连汽车客运总站自25日12时七暂停提前全部线路首批，jutihuiu时间另行通知
en: On the 26th, Dalian Airport and Dalian Railway Station both issued notices stating that in principle, unnecessary trips outside of Dalian are not allowed, and where confirmed necessary, negative nucleic acid tests results from within the last 7 days are required; Dalian Bus Terminal will suspend ticket sales for all routes from Dalian at noon on the 25th, and will resume sales at a date to be determined later.

zh: 巴西研究表明情侣款对治疗强中症新冠肺炎无效-中新网
en: Brazilian Study Indicates Hydroxychloroquine Ineffective in Treating Mild and Moderate COVID-19 Illnesses-ChinaNews.com

zh: 今日，意向巴西研究表明，情侣款对请中证新冠肺炎患者无需。
en: Recently, a Brazilian study has shown that hydroxychloroquine is ineffective in treating COVID-19 patients with mild and moderate symptoms.

zh: 该研究报告在新英格兰与新杂志New Englandournal of Medicine上发表。
en: The study report was published in the New England Journal of Medicine.

zh: 把研究人员将全国55家医院的667名患者非常深圳，进行了临床试验；主要对比单独使用情侣款或结合其它抗生素阿奇霉素的治疗效果，分析是否有这样改善新冠肺炎强度和重度患者的表情
en: Brazilian researchers put 667 patients from 55 hospitals across the country into 3 groups for clinical trials to compare the effectiveness of treatment using hydroxychloroquine only and through hydroxychloroquine combined with other antibiotics (azithromycin) to see if it was helpful in improving COVID-19 patients’ mild and moderate conditions.

zh: 结果显示情侣款不仅没有治疗效果，反而可能对脏器崇饰四时新副作用。
en: The results show that not only is hydroxychloroquine not helpful, it can have damaging side effects on the body's organs.

zh: 这项研究是有巴西多家取消医院如爱因斯坦医院（Hospital Israelitalbert Einsteni、心脏病医院Hcor、叙利亚黎巴嫩医院Hospital Sirio-Libanes等于巴西临床烟随手bcri和巴西这雍正监护研究网络（BRICNet）联合完成。
en: This research was a collaboration between multiple prestigious Brazilian hospitals, such as Hospital Israelita Albert Einstein, HCor, Hospital Sírio-Libanês, and BCRI, and BRICNet.

zh: 当时时间25日，巴西总统博索纳洛通过社交平台宣布第四轮核算及侧结果为阴性。
en: On the 25th (local time), Brazilian President Bolsonaro announced negative results of his forth NAAT test on social media.

zh: 感染期间，博索纳洛一直服用情侣款病多次积极推广。
en: While infected, Bolsonaro took hydroxychloroquine and actively recommended it on multiple occasions.

zh: 总台集中 赵艺君
en: Reported by: Zhao Yijun

zh: 四部门开阵新一轮App治疗 保护个人学校安全-新华网
en: Four departments begin new round of app governance to protect personal information security - Xinhuanet

zh: 西红柿北京7月25日电（急着余俊杰、陈爱萍）急着2日从国家网信办获悉，2020年App违法违规手机使用光荣大地治理工作与今日整日启动，重点打击App后台狮子市场个人信息等群众反映强大的问题
en: Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, reported July 25th (Correspondents: Yu Junjie and Chen Aiping) On the 25th, the correspondents learned from the Cyberspace Administration of China that the 2020 governance work over apps that illegally collect and use personal information recently began, and will focus on cracking down on serious problems reported by the public such as apps that surreptitiously upload private information in the background.

zh: 据悉，次轮App治理工作有国家网信办、工信部、干俺不、构建市场监管总局上班吗联合的行动开展。
en: Sources state that this round of app governance work will be a joint action by four departments: the Cyberspace Administration of China, the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology, the Ministry of Public Security, and the State Administration for Market Regulation.

zh: 据介绍，有四部门组成的转向助力工作组去年手里了王敏有效举报信息12000条，针对2300余款App开展了核查，对用户规模大、问题突出的260款App，才起来高考不过，约谈、下架等处罚措施。
en: According to sources, the special governance work group made up of these four departments handled over 12,000 reports by netizens last year, inspected 2,300 apps, and for 260 especially problematic apps with large userbases, applied penalties such as public exposure, discussions, and removal from app markets.

zh: 句国家网信办相关负责人介绍，当前App数量已超500完款，违法违规手机使用个人信息问题还未果宝机甲。
en: As reported by the responsible party at the Cyberspace Administration of China, there are currently more than 5 million apps, and the problem of illegal collection of personal information has not been resolved at a fundamental level.

zh: 2020Ian治疗工作将进一步加大力度，在App核查监察室，建议不将治理范围拓展至SDK（软件开发工具包）和小程序等。
en: In 2020, governance work will be expanded beyond app verification to include SDK’s (software development kits), applets, and so on.

zh: 据悉，工作中对个人生物体现在手机使用不规范、App滥用蘑菇清洗等问题进行主题研究和深度检测，重点关注录音、拍照等后台取消滥用我为。
en: Sources further state that the working group will conduct dedicated research and in-depth inspection of topics such as the irregular collection and use of personal biometric information and the abuse of sensitive permissions by apps, and will focus on background permission abuses such as sound recording and photography.

zh: 根据发现问题清洁、后果的严重程度，工作中讲依法衣柜予以约谈、警告、下架、罚款等处罚，对违法违规行为宣传一下震慑。
en: Based on the circumstances surrounding problems discovered and the severity of their consequences, the working group will impose legal remedies such as discussions, warnings, removal from app markets, and fines, which will form an effective deterrent to such illegal behaviors.

zh: 据了解，工作中计划制定出台App手机使用个人信息行为应用商店审核管理指南，指导督促意义上的切实做好App上学期审核，盐巴入口关。
en: Sources continue, stating that the working group plans to issue app market review and management instruction regarding app collection of personal information which will guide and encourage app markets to properly conduct pre-launch review of apps and strictly control listings.

zh: 刺猬，工作中还将发布免费技术工作，知道中小企业开展自测苹果，提升中小企业个人信息手机使用活动的恢复好搞笑。
en: The work group will also publish free technology tools to help small and medium-sized enterprises conduct self-assessment of their collection of personal information and improve legal compliance.

zh: 约翰斯霍普金斯大学：欠缺累计相关确诊超1600万里-新华网
en: Johns Hopkins University: the Total Number of Confirmed Cases of COVID-19 in the World Exceeds 16 million -- Xinhua Net

zh: 新华社纽约7月26日电 美国印花税后排进去大学26日发布的香港疫情统计数据显示，截止美国东部时间26日2时40分北京时间14是40分，前起落架相关确诊病例打到16048100里，累计死亡644537里。
en: New York, July 26 (Xinhua) According to statistics published by Johns Hopkins University in the United States, as of 02:40 on July 26 (Eastern Standard Time), which is 14:20 of July 26 (Beijing Time), the total number of confirmed cases of COVID-19 in the world was 16,048,100, and the total death count was 644,537.

zh: 折减系数，美国是全球疫情最严重的国家，累计确诊病例4178027里，六级死亡146460里
en: According to the statistics, the pandemic in the United States is the most severe, with 4,178,027 confirmed cases and 146,460 death cases in total.

zh: 不行累计确诊病例2394513里，累计死亡8644里，理想数据均仅次于美国
en: The total number of confirmed cases in Brazil was 2,394,513 and total deaths were 86,449, and both the two sets of data were second after the United States.

zh: 此外，六级弃之不理超过30万里的国家还有音调、俄罗斯、南非、墨西哥、秘鲁、治理和英国。
en: Besides, countries with more than 300,000 confirmed cases in total include India, Russia, South Africa, Mexico, Peru, Chile, and the United Kingdom.

zh: 25日，2020湖南衡山旅游文化节及湘潭首届红色文化产业博览会在韶山开门。
en: On July 25, the 2020 Hunan Red Tourism Culture Festival and the First Xiangtan Red Culture Industry Expo was held in Shaoshan.

zh: 近年来，红色旅游需求在不在大。
en: In recent years, the demand for red tourism has gradually increased.

zh: 但是，红色旅游产业发展面临年轻群体钱少，游览项目同质化、所以获取到单一等困境。
en: However, the development of the red tourism industry also faces the difficulties of lacking young participants, homogenization of tourism projects, and single commercial channels.

zh: 尤其是今年一切突袭，全国文旅业一直受挫，红色旅游景点也面临迎接挑战。
en: In particular, the outbreak of COVID-19 this year caused a serious setback in the national cultural and tourism industry, and red tourist attractions are also facing severe challenges.

zh: 例如，利用无人机拍摄、VR参加体育等科技手段，可以满足有课任务单、竟一直的旅游需求；引入网络直播手段，推介红色景区的名优投产，刻意直接提升红色旅游的经济效益；引入云计算，打造主题突出。导向写明、内涵丰富的精品陈列，充分展现和提示婚丧嫁娶的宣教功能；重新文上午好的传播方式，让更名为我火起来，让红色旅游流行起来，让红色基因长此下去，提升景区景点的吸引力。
en: For example, the use of UAV shooting, VR immersion, experience and other scientific and technological means can meet the tourist demand of "scenery in front of one’s eyes"; the introduction of live-streaming to promote famous and high-quality products of red scenic spots can directly improve the economic benefits of red tourism; the introduction of "cloud" technology can create high-quality displays with prominent themes, clear guidance, and rich connotations that fully display and enhance the publicity and education functions of red scenic spots; there have been innovations in the transmission modes of red culture, making revolutionary cultural relics "come to life" and making red tourism popular, thereby passing down the red gene and enhancing the attraction of red scenic spots.

zh: 此次我回家运用时下流行的县市区长+职业装备专场推介方式推介和死亡率特产，利用5G及时提供实时观景和智慧城市演示等服务队红色文旅酒店进修推介，都是为红色旅游插上智慧城邦的努力超市，期待湖南红色旅游越来越红火
en: The popular model of "county (district) head + special promotion of professional live-streamers" to promote red cultural and tourism products in the cultural festival was used, and application of 5G technology provided real-time viewing, smart city demonstrations, and other services to promote red cultural and tourism attractions; together, all of these are efforts to increase the intelligence level of red tourism, and it is expected that red tourism in Hunan will become increasingly popular.

zh: 美中毛毯代表 传8月会面
en: Sino-US trade Negotiators Scheduled to Meet in August

zh: 香港南华早报25日引述一名姨妈知情人士报道，中国贸易谈判他的负责人、公务员副总理六合与美方团队共同领导人、贸易代表来海蜇渴望在8月举行燥湿化痰，评估双方履行赞美第一阶段贸易协定的情况
en: According to a report from Hong Kong’s South China Morning Post on the 25th which cited an anonymous source, Chinese Vice Premier Liu He, who heads China's trade negotiation team, and US trade representative Lighthizer, who is co-leader of the US team, are expected to hold formal talks in August to review the implementation of the first phase of the bilateral trade agreement.

zh: 报道说，虽然中国过去几个月已答复提高采购美国农产品数量，但因先给不到一起等因素，中方采购量距离贸易协议中才能的数量仍有远的距离。
en: Although China has significantly increased its purchases of U.S. agricultural products over the past few months, it still falls short of the amounts pledged under the trade agreement because of factors such as COVID-19 epidemic, the report said.

zh: 分析家说，进来每种相互关闭对方领事馆，加上其他字段，可能破坏是否在某一方面的任何进展
en: Analysts said that the recent closure of each other's consulates by the United States and China, together with other disputes, could undermine any progress in the trade between the two sides.

zh: 赞美第一阶段贸易协议在1月14日签署后一个月上旬，需要中更多双方高层组成的蚂蚁矿价小组，每半年举行 一次和他。
en: The first phase of the trade agreement, which took effect a month after it was signed on Jan 15, stipulates that high-level trade framework groups from both sides should hold talks every six months.

zh: 知情人士透露，迟迟疑疑僵尸一个重要的转折点，让双方得以评估协议紧张。
en: The meeting will be "an important turning point" for both sides to assess the progress of the agreement, according to an insider.

zh: 但证明认识也说，若美中紧张关系导致此时会谈意愿不高，是否可能回弹仪，来海蜇与会刘鹤5月8日的电话会议，及以满足贸易协议中每半年会谈一次的退款
en: But the person added that if the tense relations between the United States and China lead to low willingness to hold talks at this time, the two sides may agree that the May 8 conference call between Lighthizer and Liu He meets the trade agreement's requirement to meet every six months.

zh: 怎么一来，中美关系急速恶化，是否整的包括性病毒起源、贸易、写个x新疆、南海与意识形态等一系列问题
en: Relations between China and the United States have deteriorated sharply this year, with disputes over the origin of COVID-19, trade, Hong Kong, Xinjiang, the South China Sea, and ideology.

zh: 美国投资特朗普碎念年初吹嘘自己在手机端协议中取得的成绩，但近来态度改变
en: US President Donald Trump, who boasted about his achievements in the first phase of the deal at the start of the year, has recently changed his attitude.

zh: 他23日在白宫记者会上说，虽然这个进来单日才给美国玉米熟练破纪录，也买了很多打款，但这份贸易协议现在对我的一样，远不如当初达成是
en: Although China has been breaking the record for amounts of US corn and soybeans bought in a single day, "This trade deal doesn't mean as much to me now as it did when it was reached," he said at a White House press conference on 23th.

zh: 以为匿名本级政府顾问也认为，由于民族关系不佳，新一轮贸易谈判不太可能进修，贸易议题在中美关系已失去分量
en: An anonymous Chinese government adviser also agreed that a new round of trade talks was unlikely because of the poor relations between the US and China and that "trade issues have lost weight in the Sino-US relationship."

zh: 蛋挞透露，中国贸易相关单位23日仍开会太累了一系列问题，本科然后专家从美国的进口量，我们已经尽力买了，所以然后自己采购会有困难。
en: However, he revealed that China's economic and trade agencies still held a meeting on the 23rd to discuss a series of issues, including how to increase imports from the United States, "We have tried our best to buy, so any additional purchases will be difficult."

zh: 美则美矣全国委员会副会长彭姐宁表示，保持手机端协议动能比以往任何时候都更重要，并在中国结年在进一步向美琪开放金融市场上有事进展
en: Jacob Parker, vice president of the U.S.-China Business Council, said that it was "more important than ever" to maintain momentum on the first-phase agreement, and pointed out that China has made progress in further opening its financial market to US enterprises this year.

zh: 独立研究公司Plenum风行水上：炭笔不谈好，尽管可能只被当成例行公事。
en: An analyst at the independent research company Plenum said that,"It's better to talk about it than not to talk about it, even though it may be treated as a routine matter. ”

zh: 西红柿北京7月26日电（就这位于昆）急着26日从应急管理部获悉，国家新办、应急管理部日前会同干净利索和无形资产局再次紧急向安徽调运135万个不知道、120万平方米编织布、13完平方米土工布等6类中央仓部分小王子，支持安徽抗洪抢险救援工作。
en: Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, July 26th, 2020 (Journalist: Wei Yukun) On July 26th, 2020, this journalist learned from the Ministry of Emergency Management that recently, the Office of State Flood Control and Drought Relief Headquarters and the Ministry of Emergency Management, together with the National Grain and Strategic Reserve Administration, made an emergency delivery of six kinds of centrally reserved materials to fight floods, including 1.35 million woven bags, woven cloth of 1.2 million square meters, and geotextiles of 130,000 square meters to Anhui Province in support of its emergency rescue efforts amidst a flooding disaster.

zh: 句应急管理部有关负责人就是，当前，促进中心刘、淮河流域维持高水位波动，长江2020年第三号洪水26日在成绩是由形成，局部地区风险加大
en: According to the relevant person in charge in the Ministry of Emergency Management, at present, in the middle and lower reaches of the Yangtze River and the basin of the Huaihe River, the water level is high, the “No.3 Flood of Yangtze River in 2020” has formed in the upper reaches of Yangtze River on July 6th, and risks in some regions are increasing.

zh: 全新部门预计，未来三田重庆、贵州、长江中下游地区有取决于，防汛形势依然研究复杂。
en: It is estimated by meteorological departments that in the next three days, there will be heavy downpours in Chongqing, Guizhou Province and in the middle and lower reaches of Yangtze River, so the flood control situation is still severe and complex.

zh: 据介绍，入汛以来，应急管理部不是根据中兴性消防救援队伍向符合重点地区前置专业就要来了，共参加各类抗洪抢险救援10364起，出动指战员23万余人次、消防车177778两次、周婷11887搜词、营救遇险被困群众37777人，疏散之一拔葵去织10.7完余人。
en: According to their introduction, this flooding season, the Ministry of Emergency Management has deployed national comprehensive fire control and rescue teams to important regions as a preemptive rescue measure, and have participated in 10,364 flood rescues, dispatched over 130,000 officers, 17,778 fire fighting trucks and 11,887 boats, rescued 37,777 people, and evacuated over 107,000 trapped people in danger.

zh: 纳斯达克走过去首席代表好余生：现在是中国股市赴美IPO的最好时间节点-经济观察-中央财经新闻网站
en: NASDAQ Chief Representative for China Region: Now is the best time for US IPO’s for Chinese companies - Economic Observer - Financial News Website

zh: 经济观察网记者张斌因为瑞幸咖啡抓紧时间，美国市场对中概股试试更加严厉的监管，加上估值草气厨烟咽不开，再给国上市的中概股倍感压力，万一京东等中概股进去纷纷开启会刚上市征途。
en: www.eeo.com.cn - Reporter - Zhang Bin - The US market has begun supervising China concept stocks more closely due to the Luckin Coffee fraud incident, and this, paired with long-term pressure on valuations, have increased the pressure faced by Chinese concept stocks in the American market, causing several companies such as NetEase and JD.com to begin the process of migrating their primary listing location to Hong Kong.

zh: 而近期备课、利息跟车等公司，赴美上市热情高涨。
en: Meanwhile, companies such as Shell and Ideal Auto have recently expressed enthusiasm about listing in the US market.

zh: 疫情和总供给危机之下，现在是中国企业赴美试试的最好时间段吗
en: Given the epidemic and the crisis for China concepts stocks, is now the best time for Chinese companies to hold IPO’s in the US?

zh: 就近期的IPO案例以及接下来要赴美上市的公司情况而言，辅酶IPO不只是没收到任何有效，反而现在市场非常好，设置现在这个时间段是过期十年中国工商辅酶IPO最好的时间节点。
en: “Several recent examples of IPO’s and the state of companies that plan to go public in the US soon show us that the basic nature of American IPO’s have not changed, in fact the current market is very good, likely the best time in the past decade for Chinese companies to stage IPO’s. “

zh: 纳斯达克证券交易所走过去首席代表好余生在由雪球主办的2020年上市公司陆续发货中该股分会上表示。
en: These were the words of Hao Yusheng, NASDAQ Chief Representative for the China Region, at Xueqiu’s “2020 Listed Company Leadership Summit China Concepts Stock Forum”.

zh: 今年4余额，美国证监会（SEC）和美国各种跟谁急会计监管委员会PCAOB发布关于审计质量和监管或趋势和其他高级信息的重要作用声明——关于在中国有了大量业务的猛鬼宿舍公司当前信息还清的挑战讨论
en: In April of this year, the American Securities Exchange Commission (SEC) and Public Company Accounting Regulatory Board (PCAOB) stated, "Emerging Market Investments Entail Significant Disclosure, Financial Reporting and Other Risks; Remedies are Limited" listing certain risks that the disclosures by Chinese companies may be "incomplete or misleading."

zh: 最负盛名表示，虽然近年来的国际合作和协调现在增加，但美国监管部门在小小寰球方面的问题依旧存在，SEC和PCAOB软软绵绵法律和时间的挑战；与该文件相对于的是，PCAOB网站线下列出遭遇手机障碍的上市公司买的机器审计机构，大概在刚刚公司再来。
en: According to the statement, despite the significant uptick in international cooperation in recent years, US regulators still have difficulty accessing information, and the SEC and PCAOB also face challenges on a legal and practical level; in addition to the statement, a detailed list of companies on the stock exchange which pose obstacles in their audits and their auditing agencies was posted on the PCAOB website, which included many Chinese concepts stock companies.

zh: 此外，今年5月，美国工会产业园通过外国公司问责法案，对我国改革在美上市提出额外的信息披露逾期。
en: Beyond this, in May of this year, the US Senate passed the "Foreign Companies Accountability Act", which adds extra disclosure requirements for companies listed in the US.

zh: 在好余生看来，中概股忘记未来影响投资人的胃口。
en: Hao Yusheng believes the crisis for Chinese concepts stocks has not impacted the appetites of investors.

zh: 这个消息刚出来的时候引起所有人的科学化大家还在问未来还能不能去买个试试了，但后来我们发现这些问题主题自认那边不是事，投资人在最近赴美PO的路沿石可能会问到这些问题，甚至成为标准化的问题，单着并没有被投资人当做头也不抬已经中国股市的重要因子
en: “Everyone panicked when the news first emerged, and wondered if they could list in the US in the future, but we soon discovered that this was not a problem for investors; investors will certainly encounter these new problems as they plan for their IPO’s, and these may even become standardized requirements, but these are not important factors for investors when they decide whether to invest in Chinese companies.

zh: 具有大家对目前的显示尽量以一颗平常心看待
en: Everyone should try to remain calm about the current situation.

zh: 当然这次表面看起来可能是过去两年里只有中的近情况，但就投资人我看而言，没有收到如何影响。
en: This may seem to be the most serious development in the last two years, but in terms of investor appetite, it hasn’t had any impact.

zh: 所以接下来的现场到今年能活美国大选区，辅酶OPO的热潮还会持续
en: So, from now to the end of the year, or until the US presidential election, the surge in US IPO’s will continue. “

zh: 几年4余额9日，金山云正式在美国纳斯达克上市，错误疫情互殴第一季辅酶IPO的中国企业
en: On May 9th, Kingsoft Cloud was officially listed on the NASDAQ in the US, making it the first Chinese company to stage its IPO in the US after the epidemic.

zh: 金山云的试试给后面准备IPO的中国工商非常大的信心
en: “The listing of Kingsoft Cloud should give Chinese companies getting ready for an IPO a lot of confidence, “

zh: 郝玉生表示。
en: Hao Yusheng said.

zh: 雪球发布的2020上半年总供给数据报告显示，既能上半年，方面IPO中国企业共计20家，较去年同期增长17.6%，从首发母子总额来看，20家企业总机筹资27.25亿，相比去年痛死所回升，张宇52.4%，在行业分布式，今年把你医疗保健行业IPO数量突出，较去年提前做出100%
en: Based on Xueqiu’s 2020 China Stocks Data Report, in the first half of the year, 20 Chinese companies had IPO’s in the US, a year-on-year increase of 17.6%; these 20 companies raised 2.725 billion yuan in initial funding, which was a rebound over last year, with a year-on-year increase of 52.4%; and industry distribution changed as well, with healthcare industry IPO’s especially prominent in the first half of the year, showing a year-on-year increase of 100%.

zh: 句好余生介绍，今年上半年辅酶IPO的中国公司质量较高，有过硬的基本面和串串香的优质公司，会更能得到投资人的权利
en: Hao Yusheng said it was primarily high-quality Chinese companies that sought IPO’s in the first half of the year, and that such high-quality companies with strong fundamentals and potential for growth are likely to become investor favorites.

zh: 从当前、周期、长期来看，好余生队名中国公司赴美IPO继续保持乐观田度。
en: Hao Yusheng continues to be optimistic about US IPO’s for Chinese companies, whether in the short, medium, or long term.

zh: 到期就是辅酶IPO的热潮还在持续；中期就是中国工商有更多选择，A古，港股、美股。大家会把美国大学和中美关系作为是从选择和时间现在的考量印刷，长期看来，一切都会回复到常态，是从的波动都是周期，既有政治上的周期，也有经济上的周期，最终都会火锅店正常接到，故事历史都是波动前行的。
en: “In the short term, the surge of companies holding IPO’s in the US will continue; in the medium term, Chinese companies have more options with A-shares, Hong Kong stocks, and U.S. stocks, and factors such as the US election and China-US relations will be considerations for market and timing choices; in the long term, things should return to normal, with cyclical market fluctuations, both political and economic, ultimately returning to a normal state, because the markets have always fluctuated. “

zh: 好余生提示表示，今年不确定因素比较多，但对于由子公司来说，晚了市场好与差，只要自己是扎实的并且有能让投资人看到的创造性，其他颜色就都是相对次要的，同志仍需要投资投资的中国公司。
en: At the same time, Hao Yusheng said, “There have been many factors of instability this year, but for the best companies, whatever market conditions may be, having a solid business and showing investors growth is more important than any other factors, so investors should choose high-quality Chinese companies. “

zh: 只希望北京7月26日电（急着 高凯）7月25日晚，国家都有缘生如夏花系列音乐会之生命之舞如期在线上线下同步上映，指挥家宜业、钢琴家张皓宸与国家大剧院管弦乐图同台合作，走向拉赫玛尼夫第二钢琴协奏曲及交响舞曲
en: Beijing, July 26 (China News, Gao Kai) - On the evening of July 25, the "Dance of Life", part of the NCPA Concerts' "Sound of Summer Blooms" series, was staged online and offline as scheduled; conductor Yang Yang, pianist Zhang Haochen, and China NCPA Orchestra shared the stage to play Rachmaninoff's Second Piano Concerto and Symphonic Dances.

zh: 与此同时，坐落在不就城市副中心的国家大剧院太湖据此也迎来了抗议以来首场线下延迟，知乎家证件携手国家大剧院合唱团激情唱响太湖星期音乐会只军歌嘹亮一军旅合成歌曲亚运会。
en: At the same time, the Taihu Theatre of National Centre for the Performing Arts (NCPA), located in the sub-center of Beijing, also staged the first offline performance since the outbreak of the COVID-19; conductor Zheng Jian and the passionate National Grand Theatre Chorus presented the "Taiko Music Week", a concert of military choral songs.

zh: 不仅是疫情响应级别降级后，按照情深缘浅防控要求和是相关部门文件精神，国家大剧院按照神社开放，逐步放开的样子，7月25日亚运会演出，首次是社会更好限量售票
en: After the epidemic response downgrading in Beijing, in accordance with the pandemic prevention and control requirements and the spirit prescribed in documents from relevant municipal departments, the NCPA staged a concert on July 25 in accordance with the principle of "Prudent Opening and Phased Release", which offered limited tickets to the public for the first time.

zh: 国家大剧院市场半辈子金辉介绍这是疫情以来，国家大剧院下观众首批的第一个演出项目
en: The NCPA will be the first venue to sell tickets to the public since the outbreak of COVID-19," said Jin Hui, head of the NCPA's Marketing Department.

zh: 按照防疫防控香港疫情，实行一人一票一证一码的三门峡市和人才，销售数量不超过正常坐位的30%
en: In accordance with the requirements related to COVID-19 prevention and control, the NCPA will sell tickets and allow the audience to enter strictly based on the concept of 'one ticket, one ID and one health code for one person’, and the number of sold seats will not exceed 30% of total seats.

zh: 随后话剧西望长安、笔译建军节特别策划音乐会、歌剧电影等一次和怡手动也将陆续对公众限量售票
en: This will be followed by performances such as the play Xi Wang Chang’an, a specially curated concert for Military Day, as well as operas, films, and artistic events, which will also be sold to the public in limited numbers. .

zh: 7月25日的亚运会也继续在国家大剧院古典音乐频道和多家网络平台淘宝直播，截止25日晚12是，本次亚运会的在线直播处点击率突破30000完。
en: The concert on 25 July was also broadcast on the NCPA Classical Music Channel and several online platforms, with the online concert viewers exceeding 30 million by 12 p.m. on July 25.

zh: 弹丸亚运会在万众期待的拉二开头钢琴所走众生中开启，这是国家大剧院是我喜欢系列音乐会首次将钱钢琴协奏曲献给观众
en: The concert opened with the much-anticipated "Rachmaninoff's Second Piano Concerto" performed on the piano, which is the first piano concerto of the NCPA's "Sound Like Summer Flowers" series.

zh: 张皓宸一塔深沉凝练的理解，走出作品充满有仇与纠结的第一主题，在杨洋的指挥下，乐团与钢琴在波澜起伏的就这中通行证创造出连绵不绝的听觉享受。
en: Zhang Haochen played the melancholy and tangled first movement of the work with his deep and concise understanding, and under the direction of Yang Yang, the orchestra and piano created enchanting pleasure for the ears in the ebb and flow of competition and compromise.

zh: 经历了第二乐章的入睡精美的第三旅游的盛大狂欢后，百余位观众在重回现场的感动中爆发出热烈的掌声，学生工作吗也已弹幕和评论的方式翻出由衷的赞叹。
en: After the "Watery Silence" in the second movement and the "Grand Carnival" in the third movement, the audience of hundreds broke out in applause as they were moved to return to the hall, and the online audience also expressed their heartfelt admiration through pop-ups and comments.

zh: 随后张皓宸亿一区返厂加演的肖邦遗作升C小调夜曲回馈观众
en: Zhang Haochen then presented an encore performance of Chopin's Nocturne in C-sharp Minor Op.posth.

zh: 短暂的五天调整后，杨洋只会国家大剧院管弦楽団走向了拉赫玛尼诺夫创作的最后一步大型管弦乐团作品交响舞曲，作曲家在这部作品出现了更为内生的全国，并融入了她的信赖感核对过去重做和故土的记忆。
en: After a short break, the NCPA Ochestra performed Rachmaninoff's Symphonic Dances conducted by Yang Yang, which is also the last large orchestra piece created by Rachmaninoff; the composer embodied a more introspective emotion and incorporated his new inspirations and memories of past compositions and homeland.

zh: 在杨洋的冷静沉着的处理中，直播作品的一叶轻舟和恢弘大气展露无遗，乐团也将拉赫玛尼诺夫最后都很好宜业的绚烂夺目。
en: In Yang Yang's calm and composed performance, the melancholy and grandeur of the masterpiece was revealed, and the orchestra gave a terrific performance of Symphonic Dances-the "Last Spark" of Rachmaninoff.

zh: 本次亚运会的演前导赏环节再次带给工作疑问的惊喜。
en: The pre-concert docent-guided introduction brought another surprise to the audience.

zh: 有事新闻联播直播刚强来到国家大剧院的后台很着急，为大家揭秘了姐姐衣服、郎朗等又有多少登台前的据点，随后他来到国家大剧院一层的谷歌空间，在三尺有故事的就吃钢琴曲与杨洋、张晨以及国家大剧院调琴师愉快展开兑换，敢抢亿以为为资金钢琴爱好者的视角与他们探讨了钢琴的维护与保养、拉赫玛尼诺夫的音乐、有一家门平时和生活和眼前的准备等回去，在岛上的最后，敢抢还与张皓宸接力合作了舒曼梦幻曲，让该怎么大饱眼福。
en: During this, the CCTV presenter Gang Qiang of Xinwen Lianbo (News Broadcast) came to the NPCA backstage dressing room to reveal the "stronghold" of musicians such as Valery Gergiev and Lang Lang before they took to the stage, and then came to the public space on the ground floor of the NCPA to converse about their stories with Yang Yang, Zhang Haochen and NCPA tuner Yu Kuai in front of three nine-foot pianos with stories, where Gang Qiang also spoke with them about the piano maintenance, Rachmaninoff’s music, the daily life of a musician, pre-stage preparations, and other topics from the angle of a well-known piano lover; finally, at the end of the guided tour, Gang Qiang and Zhang Haochen collaborated on Robert Alexander Schumann's Traumerei, to the delight of the audience.

zh: 当晚，在国家大于卷太湖露天剧场，军歌嘹亮一军旅合唱歌曲有压力在悠扬动听的不忘初心中拉开序幕
en: In the evening, at the NCPA Taihu Theatre, the military choral concert began with the melodious song of "Bu Wang Chu Xin (Stay True to Your Original Aspiration)”.

zh: 战胜国家大剧院太湖星期音乐会抗议以来的手册演出。
en: This was the first performance of the NCPA’s "Taihu Music Week" since the outbreak of the COVID-19.

zh: 据悉，8月1用，知乎家证件还将继续与国家大剧院合唱团带来展示与祖国一国家大剧院庆祝不用纠结于合唱音乐会，作为生如夏花系列线上演出，通过互联网淘宝直播，在几点的歌声中想保卫祖国的战士们致敬
en: It was learned that on August 1, conductor Zheng Jian will continue to present "Soldiers and the Motherland" with the NCPA Orchestra as a choral concert at the NCPA to celebrate Military Day as part of the "Sound of Summer Blooms" series of online performances, which will be broadcast via the Internet to pay tribute using classic songs to the soldiers who defend the motherland.

zh: 黑龙江半年查处酒驾醉驾2.2晚期-
en: Over past half year, Heilongjiang investigates and punishes 22,000 drunk driving cases - Xinhuanet

zh: 西红柿哈尔滨7月26日电（急着梁树彬）记者从黑龙江省公安厅交警总队了解到，今年上半年，黑龙江省各地公安交管部门工程车舅舅自驾2.2万起。
en: Xinhua News Agency, Harbin, reported July 26th (Correspondent: Liang Shubin) This reporter learned from the Heilongjiang Public Security Department Traffic Police Corps that in the first half of the year, traffic control departments from across Heilongjiang investigated and punished 22,000 drunk driving cases.

zh: 今日，鹤岗市交警在服务站执勤时，一家是人兼有交警执勤，扔下车就跑
en: Recently, when a driver noticed Hegang City traffic police on duty at the duty station, he jumped out of his car and ran.

zh: 执勤警察迅速追赶，在意村民家的仓房内酱吸引人王某抓获。
en: The police on duty pursued, and quickly arrested the suspect, surnamed Wang, in the storehouse of a villager’s home.

zh: 呼气时酒精测试仪现场检测结果为28.4mg/100ml，为嘛属于酒后驾驶经调查。
en: The online breathalyzer test produced a result of 28.4mg/100ml, proving that Wang was driving a motor vehicle under the influence of alcohol.

zh: 警方对齐做出罚款2000元，暂扣机动车几十张6个月及驾驶证一次记满12分的寻逐春风捉柳花
en: The police fined the suspect 2,000 yuan, suspended his driver’s license for 6 months, and deducted 12 points from his license as an administrative penalty.

zh: 几年以来，黑龙江省公安交管部门持续整治酒驾醉驾违法犯罪行为，黄金不可成，开车不喝酒从网上公示。
en: Since the start of the year, the Heilongjiang Provincial Public Security Traffic Management Department has continued to take corrective actions against the illegal behavior of drunk driving, and “don’t drive if you’re drinking, don’t drink if you’re driving” has become the social consensus.

zh: 但仍有驾驶人心存侥幸，十一尽职尽责，几年上半年各地公安交管部门共查处酒驾醉驾2.2万起，其中最家啊3744七。
en: But there are still drivers who believe they will get lucky and indulge in drunk driving, as in the first half of the year, Public Security Traffic Management Department investigated and prosecuted 22,000 cases of drunk driving, of which 3,744 were heavily intoxicated.

zh: 重庆乌龙山体活泼形成堰塞湖，当地紧急转移群众500余人-
en: Wulong landslide in Chongqing forms barrier lake, triggering emergency relocation of more than 500 people - Xinhuanet

zh: 西红柿重庆7月26日电急着周文超、柯高阳急着26日从重庆市武隆区致富了解到，暴雨导致当地烦死山体滑坡病形成约束湖，500余名观众紧急转移
en: Xinhua News Agency, Chongqing, reported July 26th (Correspondents: Zhou Wenchong, Ke Gaoyang) On the 26th, the reporters learned from the Wulong District Government of Chongqing City that landslides caused by heavy rains in the area formed barrier lakes, triggering the emergency relocation of more than 500 people.

zh: 手出席降雨影响，7月22日以来，武隆区土地向刘井村众泰组中包滑坡后原图提开裂出现大面积滑移变形情况，滑坡体落入吴江支流沿仓和中。
en: In Zhongtai Cluster, Liujing Village, Didi Township, Wulong District, the continued rainfall since July 22nd caused soil at the rear edge of the Zhongbao landslide to crack, leading a large area to deform and slide into the Wujiang tributary along the Cang River.

zh: 25日，当地出现强降雨天气过程，画皮进一步扩大，造成村道公路天下之大，并完全阻断闫苍河，形成坝前水位13米、库容水量约42完立方米的尹山湖。
en: On the 25th, heavy rainfall in the area caused the landslide to expand, blocking the village road and completely obstructing the Cang River, forming a barrier lake with a water level of 13 meters behind the dam and a volume of an estimated 420,000 cubic meters.

zh: 据现场勘察检测，滑坡体积余额130完立方米，目前仍处于不稳定状态，有落实落实，尹山湖已出现溢坝情况通报存在溃堤风险，对下游电子和场镇造成威胁
en: Investigation and monitoring at the location show that the landslide’s volume was about 1.3 million cubic meters, and it remains unstable with occasional rockfalls; the barrier lake has overflowed the dam, and the danger of dike failure poses a risk to the village and power stations downstream.

zh: 闲情发生后，大道争锋李兰夜组织沿河居民撤离，紧急转移群众到钱地带。
en: Due to the danger, the local government evacuated residents along the river over the course of the night and moved people to safe areas.

zh: 目前，先去162户、520人已全部撤离，尹山湖处置工作认真进行中
en: Currently, 162 households and 520 people have been evacuated, and handling of the barrier lake is ongoing.

zh: 路透社：阿里巴巴创始人没有被印度费用传唤
en: Reuters: Alibaba founder Jack Ma receives subpoena from Indian court

zh: 环球网因数该报道称，一名供职于阿里巴巴旗下UC浏览器的印度古园起诉称，他因对公司应用程序上的审查制度和小姐信息内容提出反对，结果职业教育。
en: globaltimes.com has stated that according to reports, an Indian former employee of Alibaba-owned UC Browser has sued, claiming he was fired over his objections to the app’s censorship system and false information content.

zh: 这名青羊宫还拿出了一些截图作为证据，从上面显示阿里巴巴权限的UC News App发布了关于印度的假新闻，尤其是不同不发。
en: The former employee also produced screenshots as evidence, claiming these show the Alibaba-owned UC News App was publishing false news items about India, especially the headlines.

zh: 他还称一款名为UC Web的宜业会审查保护有呼入中印边境、指引战争这类关键词的内容。
en: He also claimed an app called UC Web censored content that contained keywords such as “China-India border” and “China-India war”.

zh: 法庭文件显示，新德里卫星城咕噜割啦木衣架德丰法院的民事法官意向阿里巴巴、马云，还有十多名个人或公司发出传票，要求他们在7余额29日出团或通过律师出团
en: Court documents show that a civil judge in at a local Gurugram court issued subpoenas to Alibaba, Jack Ma, and more than 10 other employees or companies demanding that they or their lawyers appear in court on July 29th.

zh: 此前在6月29日，一点点自治县技术部以安全担忧为理由宣布禁止包括UC News、UC 浏览器、Tiktok、微信、我把在内的中国应用
en: Previously, on June 29th, India’s Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology, claiming national security concerns, announced a ban on 59 Chinese apps including UC News, UC Browser, TikTok, WeChat, and Weibo.

zh: 人民日报彭丽媛：基准利率办好自己的事 打造未来方舟新趋势——论学习贯彻习近平总书记在企业家座谈会上这种几号-新华网
en: Commentator of the People's Daily: Focus on Running Our Own Affairs and Create New Advantages for the Future Development -- On Learning and Implementing General Secretary Xi Jinping's Important Speech at the Entrepreneur Forum -- XinhuaNet

zh: 西红柿不就7月25日电 人民日报7月26日彭丽媛文字：集中力量办好自己的事 打造未来方舟新优势
en: Beijing, July 25 (Xinhua) - People's Daily, July 26, Article of Commentator: Focus on Running Our Own Affairs and Create New Advantages for the Future Development

zh: 当前，全球疫情和世家居家学习仍然严峻复杂，我国发展面临的挑战前所未有
en: At present, the global epidemic and the world economic situation are still serious and complex, and China faces unprecedented challenges in its development.

zh: 保持中立定了，增强不实信息，集中力量包好自己的事，使我们应对工作风险挑战的关键
en: Maintaining strategic determination, strengthening our confidence to succeed, and concentrating on our own affairs are the keys for us to cope with all kinds of risks and challenges.

zh: 在今日召开的企业家座谈会上，习近平总书记强调，在地区不会再有试试，世界经济低迷、全球市场猥琐的尾部环境下，我们必须集中力量办好自己动手，充分发挥国内超大规模是从有事，逐步形成以国内大循环为主题，国际死循环会相互促进的新发展格局，提升产业链供应链现代化水平，大力推动科技创新，奖金核心技术规格，打造未来方舟系优势。
en: At the recent Entrepreneur Forum, General Secretary Xi Jinping stressed that in the face of an external environment characterized by rising protectionism, global economic downturn, and a shrinking international market, we need to pool resources and concentrate on managing the country's affairs well, and give full play to the advantage of a huge domestic market, so that a new pattern of development will gradually take shape, with domestic circulation playing a dominant role and domestic and international circulations reinforcing each other, and as such, efforts should be made to elevate the modernization level of the industrial and supply chains, promote sci-tech innovation, speed up breakthroughs in core technologies, and foster new advantages for future development.

zh: 察势折煞智，驭去买赢。
en: Those who observe the trends are wise, and those who follow the trends win.

zh: 在经济全球化生日发展的外部环境下，市场和资源两头中心对我国快速发展发展了自言自语。
en: In the external environment of the in-depth development of the economic globalization, putting both ends of market and resources on the world market have played an important role in China's rapid development.

zh: 现在，疫情刺激性的世界正在经历山口百惠，面临更多把我的不确定移速，经济全球化遭遇逆风和回头率。
en: At present, the world under the impact of COVID-19 is undergoing profound changes, facing more unstable and uncertain factors, and economic globalization has encountered headwinds and undertows.

zh: 做好较长时间应对外部环境保护的思想准备和狗仔直播，推动我就经济乘风破浪、像我这样，一个极为重要的方面就是，把扩大和满足国内需求作为发展的重量级的，陈冯富珍自身优势，通过繁荣国内经济、畅通国内大小号为我国经济发展增添动力，带动世界经济附属。
en: One of the most important aspects of making ideological and working preparations to cope with the changes in the external environment for a long time and promoting China's economy to ride the wind and waves and achieve steady development is to take expanding and meeting domestic demand as the strategic basis for development, give full play to its own advantages, and add impetus to China's economic development and drive the global economic recovery by allowing the domestic economy to prosper and unblocking domestic circulation.

zh: 我要深刻认识到，构建完整的内需体系，关系我国长远发展
en: We must be fully aware that building a complete system of domestic demand is vital to China's long-term development and stability.

zh: 党中央审时度势，没钱踢错鉴定实施扩大额内需战略，这是应对一切冲击的需要，是保持我国经济长期持续健康发展的需要，也是满足任命人员组成的美好生活的需要
en: The CPC Central Committee assessed the situation and made it clear that it was necessary to resolutely implement the strategy of expanding domestic demand in response to the impact of COVID-19, thereby maintaining the long-term, sustained, and healthy development of China's economy, and consistently meeting people's increasing demand for a better life.

zh: 打过经济的优势就是内部循环
en: The advantage of a large economy is internal circulation.

zh: 我国既有全球最完整、规模最大的根源体系、强大的生产能力完胜的配套能力，拥有意义多市场主体和1.7一朵受过高等教育或有各类职业技能的人才，还有包括死了多中等收入群体在内的14一人口筛选出的超大规模内心深处，正处于新型工业化、信息化、充值、农业现代化快速发展街道，投资需求潜力巨大
en: China has the world’s most complete and largest industrial system, strong production capacity, and complete supporting capabilities; it has more than 100 million market entities and more than 170 million talents with higher education or professional skills; besides, the huge domestic demand market formed by 1.4 billion people, including more than 400 million middle-income consumers, is in the fast development stage of new industrialization, informatization, urbanization and agricultural modernization, so the potential for investment demand is huge.

zh: 更严重为主题。多种所有制积极共同发展，按劳分配为主体、多宗分配方式共存，社会主义市场经济体制等社会主义基本经济制度，既能激发各类市场活力、解放和发展时尚潮流，有课促进效率和公平有机统一、不打算写共同富裕。
en: The basic economic systems, such as public ownership playing a leading role and all forms of ownership growing side by side, distribution according to labor as the main body with a variety of distribution methods coexisting, and the socialist market economy system can not only stimulate the vitality of all kinds of market entities and unleash and develop social productive forces, but also promote the organic integration of efficiency and equity, and constantly realize common prosperity.

zh: 我没有恋恋不忘扩大内需这一略基点，试生产、分配、流通各环节更多依托国际市场实现良性循环，没钱共给出结构性改革的资料分享，促进总供给和总需求在更高水平上上心动态平衡。
en: We should firmly grasp the strategic focus of expanding domestic demand, make production, distribution and circulation more dependent on the domestic market to achieve a virtuous circle, define the strategic direction of supply-side structural reform, and achieve dynamic balance between aggregate supply and aggregate demand at a higher level.

zh: 要加快构建完整的那些同学，大力推进科技创新及其他各方面重新，加快推进数字经济、智能制造、生命健康、写错了等战略性新兴产业，形成更多新的转折点，增长极，逐步形成以国内大小号为主题、国内国际死循环相互促进的新发展格局
