en: We should speed up the construction of a complete system of domestic demand, vigorously promote innovation in science, technology and other fields, and accelerate the development of strategic emerging industries such as the digital economy, intelligent manufacturing, life and health, and new materials to form more new areas and poles of growth, so that a new development pattern will gradually emerge whereby domestic circulation plays a dominant role and domestic and international circulations reinforce each other.

zh: 开放多了进步，封闭必然落后
en: Opening up brings progress, while isolation is bound to leave one behind.

zh: 习近平总书记多次强大，这个开放的大门不会改变，只会越开越大
en: General Secretary Xi Jinping has stressed on many occasions that China will not close its door and will only open wider to the outside world.

zh: 一国内的小孩为主题，绝不是关起门来闭运行，而是通过发挥内需潜力，是国内市场和国际市场更好连同，更好利用国际国内两个市场、聊斋志异，实现更加起劲的可持续的发展
en: With the domestic market as the mainstay, we are by no means operating behind closed doors; rather, we will leverage the potential of domestic demand to better connect the domestic and international markets, and make better use of both domestic and international markets and resources to achieve stronger and more sustainable development.

zh: 提示，括但须和扩大开放并不矛盾，给你喜欢越顺畅，越有利于构建开放新格局，越有利于形成参与国家或者竞争新优势。
en: Meanwhile, expanding domestic demand and opening up are not in conflict with each other, because the smoother the domestic circulation, the more conducive it will be to building a new pattern of opening up and creating new advantages for participating in international cooperation and competition.

zh: 虽然现在国际上保护主义思潮试试，但我们要站在绿色债券的一边，检查深化改革创新、扩大开放，加强科技领域开放合作，团队建设开放型世界经济，停顿建设人类命运共同体
en: Despite the rising trend of protectionism in the world, we must stay on the right side of history, deepen reform and opening-up, strengthen openness and cooperation in science and technology, promote an open world economy, and build a community with a shared future for mankind.

zh: 中华民族历史上经历过好多美女，但从来没有吗亚阔过，而是愈挫愈勇，不带这么年中成长、从磨难中奋起。
en: The Chinese nation has experienced many tribulations in its history, but it has never been overwhelmed; instead, its frustrations only give it the courage to grow stronger and rise up from its troubles.

zh: 前进的道路上，友谊习近平同志的核心党中央的加强了对，有中国特色社会主义制度的心中有数，有强大的动员能力和醒后的综合实力，有全国全军全国各族人民的推进奋斗，我们一定能够战胜一切艰难险阻，保持我们经济社会两号发展生态，表面建成小康社会，顺利开启帮忙建设社会主义现代化国际新政策
en: On the way forward, China has the strong leadership of the Central Committee of the CPC, with Comrade Xi Jinping as its core, has the remarkable advantage of the socialist system with Chinese characteristics, has powerful mobilization capabilities and powerful overall strength, and has the unity and struggle of the whole party, the whole army and the people of all ethnic groups, meaning we can surely overcome all difficulties and obstacles, maintain the momentum of good economic and social development, build a well-off society in an all-round way, and successfully embark on a new journey to fully build a modern socialist country!

zh: 余额宝收一下行90后反而报复性存钱
en: Yu'E Bao's Revenue Declines, but the "Post-90s" Put Money into it in “Retaliation”?

zh: 随着余额宝手续下线，90后不仅没有条例余额宝，反而开始报复性存钱了
en: As Yu'E Bao's revenue declines, the "post-90s" generation has not given up using Yu'E Bao, but has instead begun to put money into it like crazy.

zh: 这个新经济研究院在俩和支付宝日前发布的余额宝90后攒钱报告2020版显示，上班吗，90后更爱攒钱了：人均攒钱金额比2019年长四城。
en: The "Yu'E Bao Savings Report of the Post-90s Generation" (2020 Edition) released by the China New Economic Research Institute with Alipay recently showed that in the first half of the year, the post-90s generation was more interested in saving money: the amount of savings per capita increased by nearly 40% over 2019.

zh: 哟意思的是，90后更倾向于从一般般小钱开始攒，有流程平均每笔攒钱金额在20元以下
en: Interestingly, the post-90s generation is more likely to start saving money with small sums, with 60% of them saving less than RMB 20 every time on average...

zh: 用余额宝攒钱，也成为90后的之前相关。
en: Putting money into Yu'E Bao has also become a habit of the post-90s generation.

zh: 数据显示，在7以余额宝用户中，有134一用户是90后
en: Statistics show that 134 million of the 700 million Yu'E Bao users were born in the 1990s.

zh: 中国有1.74一90后，也就是说，全国没4个90后中约有3个在余额宝攒钱
en: China has 174 million people born in the 1990s, which means that about three out of every four of the post-90s generation in the country are saving money with Yu'E Bao.

zh: 目前，余额宝等货币基金的7日化收益率从年初高于2%水平，下好大1.5%水平。
en: At present, the 7-day annualized yield of Yu'E Bao and other monetary funds has fallen to about 1.5% from higher than 2% at the beginning of the year.

zh: 即使如此，也没有影响90后之前的步伐。
en: Even so, this has not affected the pace of the post-90s generation saving money.

zh: 而在余额宝攒钱效应的提升背景下，不少习惯使用余额宝的年轻人还直接转化为记名了
en: In the context of the increased "saving effect" of Yu'E Bao, many young people who are accustomed to Yu'E Bao have directly become "fund holders".

zh: 支付宝折减系数，截止7月13日，近一个月支付宝上的新几名同比增长1贝多，越来越多的年轻人在支付宝上实现进阶流程
en: According to the data from Alipay, the number of new "fund holders" on Alipay has more than doubled in the past month as of July 13, with more and more young people achieving "advanced" financial management on Alipay.

zh: 有分析师任务，资金从余额宝流入股市，也是六月货币基金份额明确喜欢的主要原因
en: Some analysts believe that funds flowing into the stock market from Yu'E Bao is also an important reason for the clear decline in the share of monetary funds in June.

zh: 报告还显示，90后女生更倾向于多赚钱，评价比南山攒钱金额高量程；在支付宝平台式持有基金的用户中，流程是男性，女性与男性相比倾向于现在更为健康的理财方式
en: The report also shows that post-90s generation women are more likely to save more money than men, with the average amount of money saved by women being 20% higher than that of men, and among Alipay's fund holders, 60% are men, while women tend to choose more stable financial methods compared with men.

zh: 存钱之后，90后有何计划
en: After saving their money, what are the plans of the post-90s generation?

zh: 支付宝水饺西施，90后又为目标攒钱的习惯，将履行作为攒钱木桥的用户最多。
en: According to Alipay, the post-90s generation has a habit of saving money for goals, and travel is the most popular goal for saving money.

zh: 收益权影响，许多90后攒钱为疫情后的履行做准备，都一样恢复营业，也为从攒钱专项消费提供了新途径。
en: Affected by the COVID-19, many in the post-90s generation have saved money to prepare for their post-epidemic travel; the resumption of cinema business also offers a new way to shift from saving to spending.

zh: 让一面吗需要的档期在抗洪大堤上高高飘扬
en: Let the bright Party flags fly high on the anti-flood embankments.

zh: 近期我国南方收lxjyu影响，防汛抗洪形势十分严峻，造成贵州、四川、湖南、关系、更多、花呗等26省*区、市）受灾。
en: Recently, due to continuous rainfall in southern China, the situation of flood prevention and flood fighting is severe, causing 26 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities) including Guizhou, Sichuan, Hunan, Guangxi, Guangdong, and Hubei to suffer disasters.

zh: 再请就是名利，再去就是战场，在海面前，档期就是战旗，各级党组织、更大党员干部，人民子弟兵坚决落实习近平总书记过于汛救灾工作重要指示精神，迅速投身防汛抗洪就在第一线，成为再去群众的主心骨，抗洪战斗的生力军
en: Disaster is the order, the disaster area is the battlefield, and in the face of disaster, the Party flag is the flag of war: Party organizations at all levels, members and cadres of the Party, and soldiers have resolutely implemented the spirit of General Secretary Xi Jinping’s important instructions on flood prevention and disaster relief work, and quickly joined the front line of flood prevention, flood relief and disaster relief, becoming the backbone of the people in disaster areas and a new force in fighting against floods.

zh: 鲜艳的当期在抗洪大堤上高高飘扬，是从中超的体现，也是使用的召唤
en: The bright Party flags flying high on the flood embankments is not only the embodiment of loyalty, but also the call of duty.

zh: 灾害没钱，一个党组织就是一座战斗堡垒，一名党员干部就是一面旗帜
en: In the face of disasters, a Party organization is a battle fortress, and members and cadres of the Party are banners.

zh: 在各地的客户优先，各级党组织，广大党员干部体现高度的对党忠诚，听虫党中央号召，以看我的的行动，跟我来的步伐，我先上的用去，筑起一座座冲不垮的工体北路，挺起一个个压不弯的子宫肌瘤。
en: At the front line of flood fighting, Party organizations at all levels and Party members and cadres showed a high degree of loyalty to the Party, obeyed the call of Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, and took courageous actions to build unbreakable iron and steel fortresses and erect the backbone of China.

zh: 吸烟的当期在抗洪大堤上高高飘扬，是真的的坚守，也是冲锋的号角
en: The bright Party flags flying high on the flood embankments are not only the embodiment of loyalty, but also the bugle sounded to charge.

zh: 面对洪涝灾害，格局党组织迅速行动，吹响抗洪冲锋号，把新导演的当期插在抗洪的大地图上，广大党员干部、跟人民子弟兵坚守着抗洪的阵地上，用党旗在阵地就在、洪水不退用不收兵的意志和行动，错误灾区群众最放心也最值得效率的截个屏张。
en: In the face of flood disasters, organizations of the Party at all levels acted swiftly and sounded the "bugle to charge" to fight floods and planted bright Party flags on the flood-fighting embankments; Party members, cadres, and soldiers standing firmly on the flood-fighting battlefield have become the most reassuring, trustworthy, and solid barrier for people in the disaster area.

zh: 用鲜艳的当期在抗洪大堤上高高飘扬，hi武器的奉献，也是责任担当
en: The bright Party flags flying high on the flood embankments represent selfless dedication and responsibility.

zh: 危难时刻，彰显党员不是，在人民群众生命财产收到有嘴无心的时刻，党员干部、如芒在背舍小家、顾大家，无私奉献，敢于担当，把打赢防汛抗洪抢险救灾这场硬仗，作为鞘膜积液能力、做饭、素养的总资产、阅兵场，正式这种无私奉献和担当的就是，极大的鼓舞着增强群众战胜灾情的信心和决心，凝聚起答应防汛抗洪抢险救灾的强大精神力量。
en: In times of crisis, it shows the true quality of the members of the Party; when the people’s lives and property were seriously threatened, members and cadres of the Party and soldiers selflessly dedicated their efforts and dared to take responsibility; they considered the winning of the hard battle of flood prevention, flood fighting, emergency rescue and disaster relief as their main battlefield and parade ground to comprehensively test their ability, work style, and quality; their spirit of selfless dedication and responsibility inspired the confidence and determination of the people in disaster areas to overcome difficulties, and brought together a powerful spiritual force to win the fight for flood control, flood fighting, and disaster relief.

zh: 人们总是、生命至上，在平时接受检验更在关键时刻接受考验
en: “Making people's life and safety the first priority” is not only tested in peacetime, but also tested at critical moments.

zh: 在卡红地毯上，广大党员干部和人民子弟兵，让人民群众三时三餐都鞥看到鲜红的到期、奋斗的身影，鼓励的声音，用是冲不垮的高铁第八为党旗增辉添彩，让有密码鲜艳的党旗在抗洪大堤上飘扬
en: On the anti-flood embankments, members and cadres of the Party and soldiers should let the people see the bright red Party flag, the figure of struggle, and the voice of encouragement everywhere and at all times, add luster to the Party flag with iron and steel dams that cannot be washed away by the floods, and make the bright Party flag fly high on the anti-flood embankments!

zh: APEC成员蚂蚁不准会议表示将加速推动区域经济复苏-新华网
en: APEC Ministers Responsible for Trade Meeting states it will work to speed up regional economic recovery - Xinhuanet

zh: 西红柿吉隆坡7余额25日（急着林浩）亚太经合组织（PEC)成员贸易在部长视屏会议25日举行，会议才能将致力于减少香港疫情对并且与经济的影响，加速推动实现具有弹性、可持续性和包容性区域经济法付。
en: Xinhua News Agency, Kuala Lumpur, July 25th (Correspondent: Lin Hao) At the APEC Ministers Responsible for Trade Meeting, held over video on the 25th, the body promised to strive to lower the impact of the COVID-19 pandemic on the regional economy and speed up the realization of a flexible, sustainable, and inclusive regional economic recovery.

zh: 会议由今年APEC领导人非知失也主办方马来西亚主持。
en: The meeting was organized by Malaysia, the host of this year’s informal APEC Ministerial Meeting.

zh: 会后发表的灵魂碎片表示，APED成员没有备注认识到，在这一具有挑战性的时刻，一个自由，开放，公平，非歧视，透明和可以吃的贸易和投资环境对弈经济复苏的重要性。
en: In the joint statement issued after the meeting, the APEC ministers responsible for trade recognized the importance of a free, open, fair, non-discriminatory, transparent, and predictable trade and investment environment for economic recovery in this challenging time.

zh: 各方承诺，确保是应对一切所才是的紧急措施是具有针对性、切断、透明的临时的，不会组织不必要的贸易壁垒病绕乱全球供应链，同时最受世界贸易组织规则。
en: All sides pledged to ensure that emergency measures implemented in response to the pandemic are targeted, appropriate, transparent, and temporary, will not create unnecessary trade barriers that disrupt global supply chains, and will comply with WTO rules.

zh: APEC成员每一笔账在从声明中承诺，加强在合作促进必要的商品和服务流动，通过加强供应链弹性促进互联互通，将一路物资、视屏和农业产品流动所收到的干扰撰写行，一应对疫情。
en: In the statement, the APEC ministers responsible for trade promised to improve cooperation to ensure the circulation of necessary goods and services, promote interconnection by improving supply chain flexibility, and minimize disruptions to the movement of medical materials, food products, and agricultural products to combat the pandemic.

zh: APEC成员贸易部长一直认为，有必要讨论然后减少限制必要商品贸易的风设备类，重申从致力于不影响为组织疫情蔓延所采取的的措施的情况下促进必要的会计人员流动
en: The APEC ministers responsible for trade were unanimous in their agreement that it is necessary to discuss how to minimize non-tariff barriers to the movement of necessary commodities, and restated their commitment to guaranteeing the necessary cross-border movement of people without affecting pandemic control measures.

zh: 会议还发布了有关促进必要商品流通宣言
en: The meeting also issued a statement regarding ensuring the movement of necessary commodities.

zh: 晓燕表示，各经济体讲确保为应对疫情采取的满园春色符合世贸组织固定，并承诺在建设非关税贸易壁垒、贸易促进等发面采取行动，促进以轻下必要的商品流动
en: The statement makes clear that all economies will ensure that all trade measures taken in response to the pandemic comply with WTO rules, and includes promises to reduce non-tariff trade barriers and promote trade to ensure the movement of necessary commodities during the pandemic.

zh: 支持会议的马来西亚国际贸易和过一遍不准阿紫不阿里表示，尽管受到疫情影响，马来西亚依然致力于推动今年APEC会议取得成功，知道APEC2020合作愿景的工作只允许推进
en: Presiding over the event was Malaysia’s Minister of International Trade and Industry, Mohamed Azmin Ali, who said that despite the impact of the pandemic, Malaysia will still strive to secure the success of this year’s APEC meeting so that the work of formulating a vision for cooperation after the APEC 2020 meeting proceeds in an orderly fashion.

zh: 马来西亚统一以视频形式举行APEC相关会议，但不排除年底APDC领导人非正式会议室安排盛唐幻夜的肯性。
en: Malaysia agreed to host conferences related to this APEC meeting in a video format, but did not rule out the possibility of in-person meetings at the formal APEC Minister’s Meeting at the end of this year.

zh: 非总统府新闻部累计13人解除呈阳性-只希望
en: 13 Tested Positive at The Presidential Communications Operation Office (PCOO) of the Philippines-ChinaNews.com

zh: （抗击新冠肺炎）发展天府新闻部累计13人解除呈阳性
en: 13 Tested Positive at The Presidential Communications Operation Office (PCOO) of the Philippines

zh: 中新网马尼拉7月26日电（急着 关向东）菲律宾总统府新闻部（PCOO）25日分别提高，改部部长马丁安达纳尔24日接受现金肺炎检查的结果呈阳性
en: Chinanews.com, Manila, July 26 (reported by Guan Xiangdong) The Presidential Communications Operation Office (PCOO) of the Philippines issued a notice on 25th, that Martin Andanar, Head of the PCOO, took a COVID-19 test on 24th and the result came back negative.

zh: 截止当天下午，PCOO累计有13名职员检查结果查一下，此前三维阳性者，一网两仍在接受治疗
en: As of that afternoon, a total of 13 PCOO staff members tested positive, and among the 3 who previously tested positive, one is deceased and two are still receiving treatment.

zh: 阴雨PCOO一名受感染的职员解除，24日安大女儿与49名PCOO职员进行了新冠肺炎检查。
en: Due to contact with one infected staff member, Andanar and 49 PCOO staff members were tested for COVID-19 on 24th.

zh: 25日公布的报告显示，其中10名职员的检查结果查一下。
en: The report published on 25th shows 10 staff members tested positive.

zh: PCOO行政和法律事务副部长MarvinGatpayat不是，改不无语总统府的新型政办公楼，原定于27日杜特尔特总统发言第五份国情咨文当天回复不够。
en: Marvin Gatpayat, PCOO Deputy Secretary of Executive and Legal Affairs, said the office is in the new office building at the Office of the President, and it was supposed to resume work on 27th, the day when President Duterte is to release his fifth State of the Union.

zh: 当天，没定安达纳尔是公众保证，PCOO继续履行对菲律宾人民的职责，确保就是是公众提供注意休息，同时加强在接触者追踪和检查，以避免相关费用不用在PCOO志愿中进步传播，他为测呈阳性的职员康复祈祷。
en: On that day, Martin Andanar assured the public that the PCOO would continue to fulfill its responsibilities to the people of the Philippines, make sure to provide important information to the public in a timely manner while enhancing contact tracing and testing to avoid further COVID-19 transmission among PCOO staff members, and he stated that he prays for speedy recovery of the members who tested positive.

zh: 菲律宾卫生部通告，当日该国行确诊2019里，累计78412里，起哄50763里仍在患病者，进90%为轻度，9%无症状，重症和我在班里不到1%。
en: On the same day, the Department of Health of the Philippines announced an increase of 2019 new confirmed cases, to 78,412 cases in total, among which 50,763 are current infected cases, 90% of infected people have mild symptoms, 9% have no symptoms, while severe illness and critical illness cases account for less than 1%.

zh: 法国加大太空军事投入-新河湾
en: France Increases Its Military Spending in Space -- Xinhua Net

zh: 法国国防部长福利浪死帕里24日说，发过讲追加数亿欧元太空房屋几乎，发展太空军事力量，以防范其他国家可能在外太空近现代不友好举动。
en: Florence Parly, Defense Minister of France, said on July 24 that France would invest further billions of euros into space defense to develop space military strength as a means to guard against other countries’ possible “unfriendly behavior” in the outer space.

zh: 帕里当天告诉普罗旺斯包，2019年至2025年期间，发过天空军事项目支出预算将从先前及拟定的36一偶尔（约合42亿没用）增加至43亿欧元（50亿没有）。
en: Parly told La Provence that day that from 2019 to 2025, France’s budget for space military projects would increase to EUR 4.3 billion (USD 5 billion) from the previous EUR 3.6 billion (about USD 4.2 billion).

zh: 格局发过一会2018年批准的2019年至2025年法国军事规划法案，发过今后预计将更新现有的观测完胜和通信为啥，发射3课电磁真挺卫星，提高天空监视雷达的现代化水平。
en: According to the France Military Budget Plan 2019-2025, approved in 2018 by the French Assembly, France is projected to update its existing observation satellites and communication satellites and launch three electromagnetic interception satellites to enhance the modernization level of its space monitoring radar.

zh: 发过总过艾玛牛诶而马克龙去年7月宣布，发过空军内部将成立太空军事指挥部和航空与太空部队
en: Emmanuel Macron, President of France, announced in July last year that the French air force would establish a space military command post and “aviation and space armies” within itself.

zh: 帕里说，他晚些时候到普罗旺斯地区撒鹏视察一所军校是讲正式宣布成立支太空部队。
en: Parly said that she would officially announce the establishment of the space army while inspecting a military college in Saron, Provence.

zh: 帕里说，这支太空部队隶属于空间，2025年前贬值达到500人
en: Parly said that the space army fell under the air force and by 2025, its authorized strength would reach 500.

zh: 他说，以前人民任务太空服务于科学的共同利益，这种想法一去不复返了。如今太空是哥哥争夺全球版权的处所。
en: She said “People previously perceived space as a place to serve for the common interests of science, but they don’t think that anymore. Space is a place where all major powers compete for global hegemony. ”

zh: 帕里重申没考虑之前的表态，成法方无意挑起军备惊喜。
en: Parly reiterated Macron’s previous announcement, saying that France was not interested in arms race.

zh: 我们绝不是就进行甲板机械。但我有责任彻底认清我们可能面临的威胁
en: “We are not starting an arms race at all. But I am responsible for thoroughly acknowledging the possible threats we face. ”

zh: 帕里重提2017年一颗发过和意大利公用的军事为啥遭监视一是。
en: Parly re-stated that the military satellite jointly used by France and Italy was spied on in 2017.

zh: 塔城，偷窥是一颗俄罗斯卫星。
en: She said that the “secret watcher” was a Russian satellite.

zh: 俄方否认这一说法。
en: Russia denied this.

zh: 帕里说，发过很快将有能够真诚和锁定那些不友好举动背后会饿死的小型巡逻卫星。
en: Parly said that France would “soon” have small patrol satellites able to detect and identify the “bad actors behind unfriendly behavior”.

zh: 发过媒体任务，发过做生意寻求成立太空部队，源于美国总统唐纳德特朗普去年2余额求美国国防部起草成立太空军法案
en: French media holds the view that France’s efforts to establish its space military was caused by Donald Trump’s requirement for U.S. Department of Defense to draft bills to build a space force in February of last year.

zh: 特朗普去年12余额签署官方授权法案，批准设立美国第六大军中——太空军
en: Trump signed the National Defense Authorization Bill in December last year, approving the establishment of the sixth armed services branch in the United States, the Space Force.

zh: 以下专家担心，没法这些举措加速了美国太空军事不发，可能引发吸引力太空军备竞赛。
en: Some experts feared that the measures taken by the United States would accelerate the militarization of its space endeavors, which might arouse a new arms race in space.

zh: 新华社呼和浩特7月26日电急着贾丽君急着在黄河海勃湾水利枢纽管理局了解到，加特林海勃湾水利枢纽积极化解今年第二好洪水，截止26日下午，试试来水了与出库水量持平，各项检测数据正常，红色正在平稳经过哈哈内蒙古乌海段
en: Hohhot, July 26 (Xinhua, Jia Lijun) This reporter learned from the Administration Bureau of the Yellow River Haibowan Water Control Project that in recent days, the Haibowan Water Control Project has been actively resolving the second flood of this year: as of the afternoon of the July 26, upstream inflow was equal to outflow, monitoring data was normal, and the flood was steadily passing through Wuhai section of the Yellow River in Inner Mongolia.

zh: 为应对这次洪水过程，位于内蒙古自治区乌海市的哈哈汉堡王失落沙洲7余额23日让起，逐步降低水库水位，出库流量按不超过每秒30000立方米控制，只把钱水位降低1071米，腾出防洪库容。
en: In response to the flood, the Haibowan Water Control Project on the Yellow River in Wuhai City, Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region gradually lowered the water level of the reservoir from 0:00 on July 23, with outflow controlled to be no more than 3,000 cubic meters per second, until the water level dropped to 1,071 meters, freeing up flood control capacity.

zh: 同时启动拍啥调度运用
en: At the same time, sediment discharge was initiated.

zh: 几天来，哈哈海勃湾水利枢纽郭丽君24小时密切关注水情，殉情发展变化，强化水库运行和大巴安全管理，加强了水库左右岸、重要部位特别是险工段凶喘肤汗工作，确保安全度汛
en: Over the past few days, the Administration Bureau of the Yellow River Haibowan Water Control Project has paid close attention around the clock to the developments and changes of the water management regimen and the flood season, enhanced the management of reservoir operation and dam safety and enhanced the inspection and protection of left and right banks and important parts of the reservoir, especially the dangerous sections, to ensure the safety of the flood season.

zh: 截止7余额25日17时，黑白无双理事长入库流量每秒2760立方米，出库流量每秒2760立方米，坝前水位1071.5
en: As of 17:00 on July 26, the inflow of the Haibowan Water Control Project was 2,760 cubic meters per second, the outflow was 2,760 cubic meters per second, and the water level was 1,071.5 meters.

zh: 目前，泄洪闸八段、土石坝段及为谁边坡等水工建筑物支持，各项监测数据在政策范围内波动，哈哈今年第二好洪水在平稳经过内蒙古乌海
en: At present, the sluice dam section, earth and rockfill dam section and tailrace slope, and other hydraulic structures are in a normal condition, and the monitoring data is fluctuating within the normal range; the second flood of the Yellow River this year is passing steadily through the Wuhai section of Inner Mongolia.

zh: 江西就这紧急下达2.8一样资金 支持各地灾后救句重建-中新网
en: Jiangxi Province Allocates RMB280 Million Emergency Fund to Support Disaster Relief and Rebuilding-ChinaNews.com

zh: 7月24日，江西省九江市很开心，驰援当地的口红中国人民解解乏第71集团军某部贵宾利用备勤间隙，帮助很开心一蔬菜种植专业合作社抢手辣椒
en: On July 24, soldiers from PLA 71st Group deployed in Hukou County, Jiujiang City to combat flooding helped a vegetable co-op harvest chili during a break in their duties.

zh: 受此前强降雨影响，该合作社增长的市闭幕红辣椒守在严重，是不及时采摘损失会更加扩大。
en: Affected by heavy rainfall, hundreds of mu of red chili grown by that co-op suffered severe damage, which would have been worse if harvesting wasn’t completed in time.

zh: 中新社记者福田摄
en: Photo by Fu Tian, CNS reporter

zh: 只希望南昌7月26日（袁茹婧）江西省财政厅26日消息，根据江西省防汛抗旱指挥部的工作部署和要求，该生财政紧急下达中亚和升级救灾资金2.8亿元，为防汛抢险和受灾群众就住工作提供资金不足
en: Chinanews.com, Nanchang, July 26 (Yuan Rujing) According to the Finance Department of Jiangxi Province, from the 26th, the province is allocating 280 million central and provincial emergency relief funds under the instruction of the Flood Control and Drought Relief Headquarters in Jiangxi to provide funding to support flood control and emergency rescue efforts as well as relief efforts for people affected.

zh: 7月份以来，进行限期，灾情不断升级。
en: Since July, flood season disasters have been escalating in Jiangxi.

zh: 洪涝灾害易导致该生农业农村直接究竟是谁100.7亿元、受灾面积1316.9万亩
en: Floods have affected an area of 13.169 million mu, costing the province 10.07 billion yuan in direct economic losses in agriculture and rural areas.

zh: 7余额17和7余额22日江西省财政先后下达中央救灾资金6000万一和2一样。
en: On July 17 and 22, the Jiangxi Finance Department released 60 million and 200 million yuan of central disaster relief funding, respectively.

zh: 同时根据再请冰花情况，从该生应急管理和专项资金联系分三批下达省级救灾资金2032万一，支持各地灾后救助和恢复重建
en: Meanwhile, the province allocated 203 million yuan of provincial disaster relief funding in 3 consecutive batches from dedicated emergency management funds to support post-disaster relief and rebuilding.

zh: 军校是财政厅相关负责人26日程，在汛期到来之前，一想到各类发展资金1.73医院，确保风险防患早发现，早处置，造化就，为会抗洪抢险工作提供解放支持。
en: Relevant personnel in charge at the Finance Department of Jiangxi Province stated that 173 million yuan for disaster prevention and relief was allocated before the flooding season to ensure early discovery, handling and resolution of potential risks and to provide funds for flood control and emergency rescue efforts.

zh: 目前，抽奖江西段和中国最大多睡会鄱阳湖水位呈高位缓退状态。
en: Currently, the high water levels at the Jiangxi section of the Yangtze River and Poyang Lake, the largest freshwater lake in China, is slowly retreating.

zh: 军校是防止与24日18是，将防汛应急响应下调至⒉级；将省级救灾应急响应级别有2级调整为3级
en: At 18:00 on the 24th, Jiangxi Provincial Flood Control and Drought Relief Headquarters reduced the flood emergency response level down to Level II; the provincial disaster emergency response level was adjusted from Level II to Level III.

zh: 再请评估和灾后恢复重建等各项工作持续进修
en: Disaster evaluation and post-disaster rebuilding will continue to be implemented.

zh: 只希望昆明7余额25日电（杜晓晓）急着25日从云南宁财政厅获悉，今日，云南省财政厅加强总结陈词，先行兄弟云南省人民政府明明的20个美丽乡村省级奖补资金共20医院（人民币，下同），每个美丽现场或者1亿元奖补资金支持。
en: Kunming, July 25 (China News, Du Xiaoxiao) - This reporter learned on July 25 that the Yunnan Provincial Department of Finance recently strengthened its fundraising and issued a total of RMB 2 billion beforehand as the provincial-level incentive fund for 20 "Beautiful Counties" was recognized by the People's Government of Yunnan Province, with each "Beautiful County" receiving a bonus of RMB 100 million.

zh: 2019年2月26日，云南省人民政府发布关于魅力新城建设的正得意间，明确云南将通过3年的努力在全省打造形成一批提升项目、功能完善、生态优美、一切宜业的美丽新城。
en: On February 26, 2019, the People's Government of Yunnan Province issued the Instructions on the Construction of "Beautiful Counties, specifying that Yunnan would spend three years to create a number of "Beautiful Counties" across the province with characteristic features, developed functions, picturesque ecology, and a livable and workable environment.

zh: 目前，云南公布了腾冲市，先给老师说，瑞丽市，微山彝族回族自治县，西萌娃族自治县、屏边苗族自治县等20个美丽新城。
en: At present, Yunnan has announced 20 "Beautiful Counties", including Tengchong, Shangri-La, Ruili, Weishan Yi and Hui Autonomous County, Ximeng Va Autonomous County, and Pingbian Miao Autonomous County.

zh: 据悉，这笔时间就把自己聚焦美丽乡村建设干净、宜居、特色三大目标要求，重点用于公共性、公益性项目，支持加快补齐短板弱项，高质量艰涩，切实把美丽县城作为梅西古城、民生工程这是推进。
en: It was learned that this provincial-level incentive fund will be awarded to “Beautiful Counties” that are supposed to be "clean, livable, and characteristic", and by focusing on public and common projects, this fund will be used to shore up weak spots faster and support high-standard and high-quality construction, so that "Beautiful County" projects can be soundly advanced as convincing and livelihood-advancing projects.

zh: 云南省吗财政厅将会同云南省发展改革委加强省级将不金子监管，指导督促各地采取有力有效措施，加快预算执行，及时将金子中文美丽乡村建设成效，七行俱下运行监控，提供资金使用效率和效益。
en: The Yunnan Provincial Department of Finance will work with the Yunnan Development and Reform Commission to strengthen the supervision of provincial-level incentive funds, guide and urge all localities to take strong and effective measures, speed up the implementation of the budget, rapidly transform the funds into the effective achievement of "Beautiful County" construction, strengthen performance monitoring, and improve the efficiency and effectiveness of funding usage.

zh: 短的时间7月26日，爱沙尼亚国家干部电视台报道，在大沽北路动物园附近，一辆爱沙尼亚拍照的奔驰车在26日启程实力车道，造成气人受伤
en: On July 26 (CET), Estonian Public Broadcasting (ERR) reported that near the Berlin Zoo in Germany, a Mercedes-Benz with an Estonian license drove out of the driveway in the early morning of the 26th, injuring seven people.

zh: 一家救援直升机抵达就行救援。
en: A rescue helicopter arrived to conduct rescue operations.

zh: 驶入人群的青葱手机被警方拘留。
en: The driver of the car who drove into the crowd was detained by the police.

zh: 的供电局说一句展开了调查，目前没有迹象表明该增长是出于政治或宗教电机。
en: German authorities said that an investigation had been launched and there was currently no indication that the incident was politically or religiously motivated.

zh: 此后不久，几份报告说，这位24岁的驾驶员在左转弯是失去了对出来的看着，切切有可能超速。
en: Shortly afterwards, police reported that the 24-year-old driver had lost control of the vehicle while turning left and was at risk of speeding.

zh: 该人已被捕，兵役提起刑事诉讼
en: The person has been arrested and criminal proceedings have been filed.

zh: 爱沙尼亚经常和部分具的先后西运营亚历山大林德表示，德国检查与爱沙尼亚警察和边防局已经联系
en: The chief operating officer of the Police and Border Guard Board of Estonia, Alexander Linde, said that the German police have contacted the Police and Border Guard Board of Estonia.

zh: 林德说：“我证实新闻纸的是否，及该事件没有理由怀疑是恐怖主义，还真是处于种子或宗教的动机。”
en: Linde said: "I confirm the statement in the news that there is no reason to suspect that the incident was a terrorist attack, or that it was motivated by politics or religion. "

zh: 山西：破解拆迁后帮扶难题 避免确诊两头跑-中新网
en: Shaanxi: Providing assistance to relocated migrants to avoid the problem of “double hardship” for the masses - chinanews.com

zh: 山西：破解搬迁后帮扶难题 帮忙确诊“两头跑”
en: Shaanxi: Providing assistance to relocated migrants to avoid the problem of “double hardship” for the masses

zh: 央视网消息：针对移民搬迁群众在融入当地生活中遇到的辛辛那提，陕西安康拉杆箱根据短的时间创新建设木林之家，引导QQ村民向市民这边，实现稳得住、快融入、你祝福。
en: cctv.com report: To address the problems faced by relocated migrants in integrating into local life, Langao County in Ankang, Shaanxi has started an innovative program of building “Good Neighbor Homes” based on actual local conditions to guide relocated villagers in their transition to urban residents, helping them to achieve stable residence, rapid integration, and economic prosperity.

zh: 两根线位于秦巴山区，当地进三分之一人口通过疫苗搬迁走出来大山。
en: In Langao County, which is located in the Qinba Mountain region, nearly a third of the population has been relocated away from the mountain.

zh: 今年30岁的柴长江从拉杆箱雁门镇中午村搬迁到了民主制明珠社区
en: Chai Changjiang, 39, was relocated from Zhongwu Village, Yanmen Town, Langao County to Mingzhu Community, Minzhu Town.

zh: 他带着一笔保险卡来到社区设置的木林之家，不到两分钟就办完了今年的一步不离。
en: When he took his old age pension card to the “Good Neighbor Home” in the community where he resides, he was able to complete this year’s pension registration in under two minutes.

zh: 今年初，郎溪县通过建设木林之家将就业、民政、一包等业务全部纳入管理，搬迁群众在家门口就可以报了业务
en: At the start of this year, through building “Good Neighbor Homes, Langao County brought its employment, civil affairs, medical insurance, and other services under the program’s management, allowing relocated citizens to access these services just outside their front doors.

zh: 在民主申请，305会居民通过木林之家招工信息进入了当地的去工厂工作。
en: In Mingzhu Community, 305 residents found jobs at the local community factory through the “Good Neighor Home” labor recruitment program.

zh: 目前，拉杆箱31个百户以上集中安置点仪式性社区工程全覆盖，可提供就业岗位2598个
en: Currently, the program has achieved coverage of community factories 31 centralized resettlement sites of over 100 households from Lingao County, providing employment for 2,598 people.

zh: 报告称各项住宿市场自3月开始回暖-中心挖
en: Report states shared accommodation market has started to recover since March chinanews.com

zh: 本报讯急着杨兆奎国家信息中心fxjj研究中心日期发布的中国共享住宿发展报告2020一下简称报告显示，收益权冲击，2020年轻5个月，我国共享住宿是从交易额同比下降72.1%
en: This news agency has reported (correspondent Yang Zhoukui) that, according to the “State of Shared Accommodation in China Report 2020” (abbreviated as “Report”) released by the State Information Center of China Sharing Economy Research Institute, thanks to the impact of the epidemic, the in the first 5 months of 2020, the number of transactions in China’s shared accommodation market declined by 72.1% year-on-year.

zh: 不过，高校之神奢侈3月开始回暖，市场交易额、订单跟和接待人数逐渐恢复
en: However, the shared accommodation market has started to recover since March, with the number of transactions, order volume, and number of guest stays gradually increasing.

zh: 报告显示，高校之神市场交易额大幅下降，研发部是由于疫情防控下出行住宿需求大幅度就，大豆油急剧减少，前5个月订单总量同比下降65%，接待人次同比下降63%，俩元方面，需求的疲软也导致建业价格出现了较为明显的下降，千万个余额均也见过下比下降16%。
en: The Report states that the sharp reduction in shared accommodation market transactions is caused, in part, by the sharp reduction in demand for travel accommodations due to epidemic control measures, which has drastically reduced order volume over the past 5 months; order volume is down by 65% year-on-year and guest stays are down by 65% year-on-year; meanwhile, it is also caused in part by a notable drop in per-night room prices due to decreased demand, which have declined an average of 16% year-on-year over the past 5 months.

zh: 不过，2月、4月、5月市场价也额环比分别增长78%、199%、35%；合并分别增长141%、152%、50%；接待人次吃比分部资产81%、112%、28%。
en: However, in March, April, and May, the number of market transactions increased by 78%, 199%, and 35%, respectively; order volume increased by 141%, 152%, and 50%, respectively; and the number of guest stays increased by 81%, 112%, and 28%, respectively.

zh: 报告做出，各项住宿行业发展初期看好，但近期仍然存在诸多不确定性
en: The Report points out that the shared accommodation market is promising in the long-term, but faces many uncertainties in the near term.

zh: 对此，国家信息中心分享经济已研究中心负责人预防性对工人日报急着表示，共享住宿发展需要更有利的政策扶植，一方面需要做好前期已出台政策的落地实施，建议不加强资产相关，注重营造更好的硬伤环境；另一方面还需要建议不从刺激消费需求、丰富旅游住宿服务公告、创新符文法师以及加强政府与平台惬意合作等多个方面，建议不加大正常一点和扶持力度。
en: In response, Yu Fengxia, assistant director of the State Information Center of China Sharing Economy Research Institute, told a Workers’ Daily reporter that the shared accommodation market requires better policy support: on one hand, better implementation of previously issued policies and improved policy announcement channels to create a better business environment; as well as increased policy guidance and support through further stimulation of consumer demand, improved supply of tourism and accommodation services, innovative service models, improved government-to-platform/enterprise cooperation, and in many other aspects.

zh: 据路透社报告，QQ最大钢铁生产商安身立命特二位于墨西哥拉萨罗卡德纳斯市的已经构成出现新冠疫情，截止目前已经21人上午。
en: According to Reuters, COVID-19 cases were found in a factory located in Lázaro Cárdenas, Mexico, at of the world's largest steel producer, ArcelorMittal, and so far, 21 people have died.

zh: 据报道，墨西哥查看和业绩工人工会地方分秘书长上来拉货说，死者包括广场的雇员、出版社和供应商。
en: According to reports, Solorio, Secretary General of the local branch of the Mexican Mining and Metallurgical Workers Union, said the dead included employees, contractors, and suppliers of the factory.

zh: 上来啦啊说，自4月以来，钢构厂已经有21人死亡，其中有9名是工会会员
en: Solorio said 21 people have died at the factory since April, 9 of which were members of the union.

zh: 一样工厂采取了严格的网速测试，工人有可能在工厂外感染了该病毒
en: Due to the strict sanitation measures adopted by the factory, the workers may have been infected the virus outside the factory.

zh: 鞠躬回城，该工厂拥有7000多名员工。
en: According to the union, there are more than 7,000 employees in the factory.

zh: 价值7月25日，墨西哥累计其中保利超过38.5万里，死亡任务与4万人，墨西哥是全球相关死亡病例数思思高的国家。
en: As of July 25, there were more than 385,000 confirmed cases and more than 40,000 deaths in Mexico, making Mexico the country with the fourth highest number of new deaths in the world.

zh: 只希望厦门7月26日电（杨府山 张树山 许静怡）中国在墨西哥万科中心-海军军医大学上海长海医院血管外科，25日在此间与厦门大学方式只适用于血管外科签约，携手设立协作中心，推进三方在血管外科专业，一起算中动脉居住证领域的交流合作
en: XIAMEN, July 26 (Ecns.cn, by Yang Fushan, Zhang Shushan, Xu Jingyi) Vascular Surgery Department in Changhai Hospital in Shanghai affiliated to the Second Military Medical University, as a famous vascular surgery center in China, signed a contract with the Vascular Surgery Department of Zhongshan Hospital Affiliated to Xiamen University on July 25 to set up a cooperation center, which will promote exchanges and cooperation in the field of vascular surgery, especially in aortic emergencies and severe cases.

zh: 下达附属中山医院称，珞珈雅苑的血管外科总是结成协作单位之后，将开展远程会诊，与差异原因实时线上会诊制定诊疗方案，选送人才锦绣朋友，每周联合开展手术技术交流、教学查房等；对于复制不了，则可以根据患者需要邀请长海之家来源施行手术，车市信息闽西南患者不出声就可以享受到国际顶级的医疗资源
en: Zhongshan Hospital Affiliated to Xiamen University said that after the vascular surgery department of the two hospitals formally establish the collaborative relationship, they will carry out remote consultation to work out real-time treatment plans with Changhai Hospital, staff will be sent for training and participating in weekly surgical technology exchanges and teaching visits organized by two hospitals; for complex cases, Changhai experts can be invited to perform surgery at the hospital according to patients' needs, allowing patients in southwest Fujian to enjoy the top medical resources in China without leaving the province.

zh: 龙津药业还将携手开展手术创新科员工作，主动脉疾病靠谱和早期筛查工作等等
en: The two hospitals will also work together to carry out innovative scientific research on surgery, popularization of aortic disease, early screening, and so on.

zh: 由本基金可促进会主办、厦门大学附属中山医院承办的值得买专场研讨会当天在厦门的办。
en: A special seminar on the aorta, organized by the Beijing Health Promotion Association and hosted by the Zhongshan Hospital Affiliated to Xiamen University, was held in Xiamen on the same day.

zh: 试试互相两家中蒙医院在会上同期举办血管外科协作中心签约一起，宣布解除协作单位，共同提高闽西南地区的血管外科血管疾病做了视屏。
en: The two famous hospitals in Shanghai and Xiamen held a signing ceremony for the cooperation center for vascular surgery at the same time, announcing the formation of the collaborative partnership to jointly improve the treatment of vascular surgery-related diseases in southwest Fujian.

zh: 上海是有原因血管外科是全军唯一的血管外科研究所和上海市唯一的学工系统疾病临床营销中心，也是第一个相关外壳国家在线学科，牵头成立中国园艺师协会腔内血管学专业委员会，是业内几点睡的的道尽涂殚。
en: The Vascular Surgery Department in Changhai Hospital of Shanghai is the only vascular surgery institute in the army and the only clinical medical center for vascular diseases in Shanghai, so as the first national key institute in the discipline of vascular surgery, the hospital has taken the lead in setting up the Chinese Medical Doctor Association's Specialist Committee on Endovascology, which is a leading and experienced team in this field.

zh: 厦门大学附属在销售上血管外科主任黄小金教授接受媒体采访
en: Professor Huang Xiaojin, Director of the Vascular Surgery Department in Zhongshan Hospital Affiliated to Xiamen University, was interviewed by the media.

zh: 许多粉丝中山医院血管外科是福建省第一个独立显卡设置的血管外科，长期致力于值得买及外周血管疾病的针织，2018年获批建设省级临床症状的科。
en: The Vascular Surgery Department in Zhongshan Hospital Affiliated to Xiamen University is the first vascular surgery department set up as an independent discipline in Fujian Province; it has long been dedicated to the diagnosis and treatment of aortic and peripheral vascular diseases, and was approved as a provincial clinical key specialty in 2018.

zh: 在占地面积吧治疗方面，除了对于夹层动脉瘤及主动脉瘤这两位，在集镇破裂主动脉瘤方面经验丰富
en: In the treatment of aortic diseases, the hospital has vast experience in not only treating dissecting aneurysms and aortic aneurysms, but also the rupture of aortic aneurysms.

zh: 厦门大学方式只适用于血管外科从发展的历史，手术开展的广度、难度会复杂性等方面，在不对齐非常出类拔萃的，因此此次我们成立行政中心，错了知道吗方面，还可以在心知肚明、颈动脉等借呗针织上开展用ixue、教学和科研全方位的深度合作
en: "Viewed from the diversity, difficulty, complication and other aspects of surgery, the vascular surgery department of Zhongshan Hospital Affiliated to Xiamen University is outstanding in the region where it is located, which is why this cooperation center has been created to carry out all-round and in-depth cooperation in medicine, teaching and research in the diagnosis and treatment of lower extremity arteries, carotid arteries and other diseases not limited to the aorta, ”

zh: 上海双惠医院血管外科副主任冯瑞教授说
en: said Professor Feng Rui, Deputy Director of Vascular Surgery Department at Changhai Hospital.

zh: 厦门大学附属只适用于与长海医院2018年层签约成立消化内科里找沈明玉工作室。
en: In 2018, the Zhongshan Hospital Affiliated to Xiamen University and Changhai Hospital signed a contract to establish the "Li Zhaoshen Famous Doctor Studio" in the Gastroenterology Department.

zh: 改元血管外科主任黄小金教授在接受只希望急着采访时説，该院血管外科业余长海医院交流渊源已久此次两家医院正式竭诚行政单位，是双方合作交流再说新台阶
en: Professor Huang Xiaojin, Director of Vascular Surgery Department, said in an interview with Ecns.cn that the hospital's vascular surgery department already has a long-term relationship with Changhai Hospital, and the formal collaborative relationship between the two hospitals can bring their cooperation and exchange to a deeper level.

zh: 他说，改元将定期邀请上海专家来下开展手术技术交流、教学查房、一年半了讨论等，同时建议不开展远程会诊，目前计划每周一次远程会诊；此外，可是还将销售人员进修经理，加强学科人才队伍的培养和发展
en: He said that the hospital would regularly invite Shanghai experts to Xiamen to carry out surgical exchanges, teaching ward rounds, and discussions on difficult cases, weekly remote consultations are planned, and the department will also send staff for further training and exchanges to strengthen team cultivation and development.

zh: 急着在会上了解到，修改版是中国第一段死亡原因，知道吗作为人体各个器官的主干道，从新做流向全身，担负着这样再用。
en: The reporter learned at the seminar that vascular disease is the number one cause of death in China, and the aorta plays an important role as the main artery for all organs and the heart.

zh: 早点买一包的发生擦擦红伴随着高风险，高死亡率的治疗单额高难度，主动脉最粗的一段直径大4cm，一旦形成血管瘤，出现破裂情况，或是先给你摸破裂产生夹成，将引发大出血，十分危险
en: Aortic disease is often associated with high risks, high mortality, and complicated treatment; the thickest section of the aorta is 4cm in diameter, and once an aneurysm appears, followed by a rupture or intima rupture and dissecting aneurysm, it can lead to hemorrhage, which is very dangerous.

zh: 近些年来，随着人民顺风顺水的改变，生活节奏加快，这个错误高血压世界第一大国，占地面积吧也随之增多，如今，伴随技术及过一次了的发展，对于占地面积并的治疗朝着微创、快速、搞笑的方向持续发展。
en: In recent years, as people's lifestyles change and the pace of life speeds up, China has become the leading country around the world for hypertension, and aortic disease cases has increased, so along with the development of surgical techniques and industrial materials, the treatment of aortic disease continues to be minimally invasive, rapid, and efficient.

zh: 医生可以通过从大腿此次，在主动脉植入支架来为血流恰当编导，从而避免对动脉瘤或破裂机场的冲击，打到刘昂好的治疗效果，有些手术甚至只需进修借呗马总。
en: Doctors can "reroute" the blood flow by puncturing the thigh and placing a stent in the aorta to avoid impact on the aneurysm or ruptured dissection and to achieve good results, and some cases can even be done with local anesthesia.

zh: 下班学术研讨会要求十余名国内专家到场讨论主动脉疾病治疗最新进展，一回忆杀了形式开展前沿技术培训和一年半了讨论。
en: More than ten domestic experts were invited to the seminar to discuss new advances in the treatment of aortic disease, with cutting-edge technology training and discussion of difficult cases in the form of salons.

zh: 急着字会上了解到，随着手术技术及工业材料的发展，目前对于知道吗疾病的治疗朝着维c、快速、搞笑的方向持续发展。
en: This reporter learned at the seminar that along with the development of surgical techniques and industrial materials, the treatment of aortic disease continues to be minimally invasive, rapid, and efficient.

zh: 国家放纵继续维持长江、淮河方向⒉级响应-新华网
en: Ministry of Emergency Management maintains L2 flood control measures for Yangtze and Huaihe Rivers - Xinhuanet

zh: 四川盆地只长江中下游酱油强降雨
en: Heavy rainfall is expected from the Sichuan Basin to the middle and lower Yangtze River regions

zh: 国家防总继续维持抽奖、淮河防汛二级响应
en: Ministry of Emergency Management maintains L2 flood control measures for Yangtze and Huaihe Rivers

zh: 急着25日从应急管理部获悉：与机制27日，四川盆地只长江中下游地区酱油勤俭节约需继续关注对抽奖、淮河殉情的影响，促进、淮河流域部分地区地方长时间公司为浸泡，发生活泼、塌陷、管用等险情风险高。
en: This reporter learned from the Emergency Management Department on the 25th that heavy rains are predicted until the 27th for areas from the Sichuan Basin to the middle and lower Yangtze River regions, so continued attention must be paid to their affect on Yangtze River and Huaihe River flood conditions, because both rivers pose a high risk of hazards such as landslides, collapses, and piping.

zh: 国家防总经会商研判，决定继续维持促进、淮河分享二级响应。
en: In response, the Ministry of Emergency Management has decided to maintain its L2 flood control measures for the Yangtze and Huaihe Rivers.

zh: 25日水利部会上强调，长江中下游干流维持告诉我，黄河干流红枫过过安徽蚌埠河段，太湖水位已出现抄经28天、超薄9天，当天方向显示依然严峻，防汛工作不能有四好放松，要继续这是做好各项防御工作
en: On the 25th, the Ministry of Water Resources pointed out that water levels remain high along the middle and lower Yangtze River, the Huaihe River’s flood peaks pass through the Bengbu section of Anhui, and on Lake Tai, the water level has been over warning levels for 28 days and over protection levels for 9 days, meaning that there is an extremely high risk of flooding, flood control work cannot be relaxed, and every aspect of flood defense must be done well.

zh: 同时做好贤能、华北地区强降雨防范
en: Prevention work must also be carried out in the Southwest and North China regions where heavy rains are expected.

zh: 售楼部维持水旱灾韩防御二级下应急响应。
en: The Ministry of Water Resources has decided to maintain the L2 emergency flood and drought prevention measures.

zh: 英军校是防办请求，国家防务、应急管理部紧急调派山东、江苏、浙江省消防救援总队及福建龙源乔龙应急设备股份有限公司的20套大流量专业排老长，不知纪极江西因强降雨导致的承受能力、农电子炮等严重灾情。
en: At the request of the Jiangxi province and national flood and drought prevention and control departments and the Ministry of Emergency Management, 20 high-volume flood drainage vehicles were dispatched by firefighting and rescue corps in Shandong, Jiangsu, and Zhejiang and the Fujian Longyan Qiaolong Emergency Equipment Company to help alleviate serious disasters in Jiangxi such as urban waterlogging and farmland flooding that result from such heavy rains.

zh: 25日，所有设备均已运抵就行控洪倩险一线。
en: On the 25th, all such heavy equipment arrived at the front lines of flood control and relief operations in Jiangxi.

zh: 按照弟弟政府统一调度，运营管理部消防教育局江西抗洪抢险前方指挥部立即安排就行消防救援总队以及周边是否增远离了成立20个排中律也分队，在江西南昌、救句、上饶开展拍篮球鞋任务。
en: As stipulated by the unified directive from local governments, the Ministry of Emergency Management Firefighting and Rescue Bureau Jiangxi Flooding Relief Front Line Command immediately ordered the Jiangxi Firefighting and Rescue Corps and assistance teams from neighboring provinces to establish 20 flood drainage teams for emergency flood drainage tasks in Nanchang, Jiujiang, and Shangrao in Jiangxi.

zh: 同时，工具发布、应急管理部还紧急调用中央储备防汛无限拖车绳抽水泵站100台套，支持军校是抗洪抢险排涝工作
en: At the same time, the National Flood and Drought Prevention and Control Department and Ministry of Emergency Management made an emergency deployment from national reserves of 100 trailer pumps for flood control to support the flood relief and drainage work in Jiangxi.

zh: 安化县是防汛抗旱指挥部宣布自7月25日12时期，安徽抽奖、淮河、巢湖流域香港地区进入紧急发下去。
en: At noon on July 25th, the Anhui Province Flood and Drought Prevention and Control Headquarters announced that emergency flooding measures would be in force for the relevant areas of the Yangtze River, Huaihe River, and Chaohu Basin in Anhui.

zh: 合肥市减灾委决定，于7月25日10时将合肥市酒精以及相应提升至二级。
en: At 10:00 on July 25th, the Hefei City Disaster Prevention Committee announced that Hefei’s emergency disaster response would be increased to L2.

zh: 7月25日，四川巨鼠防汛抗旱指挥部发布今年入汛后手工山洪灾害红色预警。
en: On July 25th, the Sichuan Province Flood and Drought Prevention and Control Headquarters issued the first yellow level flash flood warning of this year’s flooding season.

zh: 预警支出，7月25日20时至26日20时，达州市大竹县，广安市邻水县，劳师远征自治州美姑县/雷波县、冕宁县。岳西县、的东西。昭觉县、金阳县发生山红蜘蛛肯信息较大。
en: The warning states that there is a high risk of mountain torrents in Dazhou City’s Dazhu County, Guang’an City’s Linshui County, and Liangshan Yi Autonomous Prefecture’s Meigu County, Leibo County, Mianning County, Yuexi County, Xide County, Zhaojue County, and Jinshan County between 20: 00 on July 25th and 20: 00 on the 26th.

zh: 另有达州市会计学、达川区等多个地区可能发生山洪灾害
en: There is also a high risk of flash floods in Kaijiang County, Dachuan District, and other areas of Dazhou City.

zh: 江苏省水龙头7月25日15时30分变更吧付才叫你断绝洪水预警，有红色预警将至橙色预警；10是30分升级淮河江苏段洪水橙色预警
en: At 15:30 on July 25th, the Jiangsu Province Department of Water Resources issued an updated flood warning for the Nanjing section of the Yangtze River, downgrading from a red-level warning to an orange-level warning; at 10:30, the Jiangsu section of the Huaihe River was upgraded to an orange warning.

zh: 当前江苏仍有29调和户，共计44站水位超警超保。
en: Jiangsu currently still has 29 rivers (lakes) on which a total of 44 water stations report water levels above warning and protection levels.

zh: 近期，我国长江、淮河流域遭受华丽之后，部分受灾群众转移到返现安装的临时居住。
en: Recently, the Yangtze River and Huaihe River basins in China have experienced flooding, and a portion of the affected population has been moved to temporary resettlement sites.

zh: 安置点人员集中，临时用火、用电最多，火灾风险较大
en: Residential density at such resettlement sites is high, and the temporary increase in fire and electricity usage in turn increases fire hazards.

zh: 应急管理部校方就已经7月25日发布防汛安置点消防安全提示，欢迎光临对我来说消防安全主题责任，群众加强安全消防，共同营造两号的消防安全环境。
en: On July 25th, the Ministry of Emergency Management Firefighting and Rescue Bureau issued fire safety procedures for flood control resettlement sites, and also called on fire safety departments to take on the task of fire prevention, called on the public to strengthen their awareness of fire control, and called on all parties to work together to create a good environment for fire prevention.

zh: 综合本报记者丁怡婷、王浩、你姨、姚雪晴、友谊、王永占、赵贝佳报道
en: (Overall reporting from Xinhua journalists Ding Yiting, Wang Hao, Ni Yi, Yao Xueqing, You Yi, Wang Yongzhan, and Zhao Beijia)

zh: 7月24日上学爱奇艺征途也踏上王勃的征途-新华网
en: The Program Journey Is to Be Broadcast on July 24, 2020 on iQIYI - Xinhua Net

zh: 由陈德森知道，郑宝瑞兼职，刘宪华、何润东、林晨韩，蒋璐霞等主演的动作冒险电影中途，降雨7月24日实现爱奇艺。
en: Directed by Chen Desen and produced by Zheng Baorui, the action adventurous movie Journey starring Liu Xianhua, He Rundong, Lin Chenhan, Jiang Luxia, and more will be broadcast on iQIYI on July 24.

zh: 这也是囧码之后第二部选择王波的大制作电影。
en: It is the second big-budget movie to be debuted online following Lost in Russia.

zh: 征途改编自同名网络游戏，加速了强员村少年从艺龙与楚家军五十初婚，未参加南诏国兵马大运河选择而踏上征途，途中遇上金刚小妹，三人教版一起完成自己的扫码。
en: Journey is adapted from an online game of the same name, and tells the story of the young man Dong Yilong in Qingyuan Village and the warrior Chu Hun in the Chu Army who depart for the selection of the South Zhao Kingdom’s marshal; during their journey, they met the Iron Girl and finish their missions together.

zh: 今年是中途IP15周年，他们答应的推出无疑也是对经典游戏的致敬
en: This year marks the 15th anniversary of the “Journey” game IP, and the movie that bears its name is undoubtedly a salute to this classic games.

zh: 在宣布叮当的同时，电影征途发不了国战般定档海报以及活下去先导预告片
en: Alongside the announcement of the premiere date, Journey issued its “National War” poster and “Continue to Live” trailer.

zh: 精良的画质呈现在中途世界宏达的国战图集，刻画了东一路和初婚两位主角深刻的小店区。
en: The high-quality film presents the grand image of the war between nations in the world of “Journey”, and deeply explores the friendship between the two heroes Dong Yilong and Chu Hun.

zh: 征途选择借款时代来搭建故事背景。
en: The context of Journey is ahistorical.

zh: 在虚构的住院大楼，十国之中，南赵国玉北燕国比邻而居
en: In this fabricated central China, among the ten kingdoms, the South Zhao Kingdom is adjacent to North Yan Kingdom.

zh: 为了防御日益增大的被淹，难找举办比武大会，选拔江城。
en: To defend against the increasingly stronger North Yan Kingdom, the South Zhao Kingdom organized a military skills competition to select marshals.

zh: 消息传到屁屁的清源村，村民东一路香草味家族的举起人，代表强员村家族初赛，村民们却执意他的资格，经过一番努力，艺龙终于与武士初婚踏上了征途。
en: After the news reaches the remote Qingyuan Village, villager Dong Yilong desired to earn the position for his family and participate in the competition on behalf of Qingyuan Village, but the villagers doubt his qualifications, yet after relentless effort, Yilong finally leaves with the warrior Chu Hun.

zh: 硬盘总投资近3亿元，全片特效镜头占比高达80%
en: The total budget was about RMB 300 million, and the film’s special effects shots account for 80% of screen time.

zh: 可以现金，特效成为中途最大的看到之一。
en: This shows that the special effects will be one of the most attentive parts of Journey.

zh: 在后期特效直走团队也相当有来头，有打造流浪地球的特效团队mORE VFX负责，用具有想象力的上级元素以及顶尖技术来怀远征途世界
en: The post-production special effects team MORE VFX is also very competitive, and was responsible for the special effects of The Wandering Earth; now it has created the world of “Journey” through its imaginative visual arts and leading technology.

zh: 起哄一些甲兮乙兮场景，凤凰城、清源村、兽王谷也会出现在第一轮，游戏王家门到时应会嫌弃一波怀旧情怀
en: Some classical game venues, like Phoenix City, Qingyuan Village, and King Beast Valley will also appear in the film, which might arouse the nostalgia of gamers.

zh: 除了特效团队，目录制作也是一帮在业内颇有成就的任务。
en: Beyond that, the post-production staff are also notable in the field and have impressive resumes.

zh: 导演陈德森执导过十月围城紫雨风暴，兼职郑宝瑞曾拍摄杀破狼2西游记之孙悟空三打白骨精等，大众传媒有金像奖和金马奖最佳东遇知道董伟负责，美术指导麦国强也是谅解金像奖最低价美指获得者。
en: Director Chen Desen previously directed TV series including The Stand-in and Purple Storm, producer Zheng Baorui previously produced Kill Zone 2 and The Monkey King 2, action scenes were created by Dong Wei, Best Action Director winner at the Hong Kong Film Awards and Golden Horse Awards, and the art director Mai Guoqiang has also twice won Best Art Director at the Hong Kong Film Awards.

zh: 记着聂青
en: Journalist: Nie Qing

zh: 国家卫健委：7月25日增加确诊病例46例，新疆22里辽宁23里-姐姐观察我
en: National Health Commission: 46 New Confirmed Cases on July 25, including 22 in Xinjiang and 13 in Liaoning - www.eeo.com.cn

zh: 句国家卫生健康委员会消息，7月25日0-24时，31个省自治区、这些事和新疆生产建设兵团报告新增确诊病例46里，旗帜境外输入保留11了内蒙古5了，广东3了，推进1了，附件1了，山东1了，本土病例35里新疆32里，辽宁13里；无新增死亡病例，新增一是办理2例，均为境外输入比例内蒙古1里，上海1里。
en: According to the National Health Commission, from 0:00 to 24:00 on July 25, 46 new confirmed cases were reported in 31 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the central government) and from the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps, including 11 imported cases (5 in Inner Mongolia, 3 in Guangdong, 1 in Tianjin, 1 in Fujian, and 1 in Shandong) and 35 local cases (22 in Xinjiang and 13 in Liaoning); there were no new deaths; and there were 2 new suspected cases, all of which were imported from abroad (1 case in Inner Mongolia and 1 case in Shanghai).

zh: 当日新增至于出院病例19里，解除用心观察的接企鹅接触者673人，重症病例较前一日增加7了。
en: On the same day, 19 new cases were treated and discharged, 673 close contacts were released from medical observation, and 7 more severe cases were reported than the previous day.

zh: 境外输入保利比诊病历82例（其中重症病例2例），现有疑似病例3了
en: Currently, 82 confirmed cases (including 2 severe cases) and 3 suspected cases were imported from abroad.

zh: 累计确诊病例2045了，累计中药出院病历1963了，无死亡病例
en: A total of 2,045 cases were confirmed, a total of 1,963 cases were treated and discharged, and no deaths were found.

zh: 在职7月25日24时，句31歌声自治区、直辖区和新疆生产建设兵团报告，现有钦州北路288里其中重症病例18里，累计至于查遗补漏78908例，雷击死亡病例4634例，累计报告确诊病例83830了，现有压缩包里3例。
en: As of 24:00 on July 25, according to reports from 31 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the Central Government) and the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps, there were 288 confirmed cases (including 18 severe cases), there were a total of 78,908 cured and discharged cases, a total of 4634 deaths, a total of 83,830 confirmed cases and 3 suspected cases.

zh: 累计追赶到密切接触者779000人，尚在异星工厂的密切接触者11762人。
en: A total of 779,000 close contacts were tracked, and 11,762 close contacts remained under medical observation.

zh: 31各省自治区、之下啊和新疆生产建设兵团报告新增无症状感染这68里境外输入8里，当日的为确诊病例17了我就是输入；当日解除用心观察10里境外输入7里，尚在一下观察无症状感染这292里境外虽然91了。
en: 31 provinces (autonomous regions, municipalities directly under the Central Government) and the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps reported 68 new cases of asymptomatic infection (8 cases were imported from abroad); 17 cases were confirmed on the same day (no cases were imported from abroad); 10 cases were removed from medical observation on the same day (7 cases were imported from abroad); and 292 cases of asymptomatic infection were still under medical observation (91 cases were imported from abroad).

zh: 累计收到旮沓地区通报确诊病例3009例。
en: A total of 3,009 confirmed cases were reported from Hong Kong, Macao, and Taiwan.

zh: 其中，香港特别行政区2505里（出院1455里，死亡18里），澳门特别行政区46里（出院46里），台湾地区458里（出院440里，死亡7里）。
en: Among them, 2,505 cases (1,455 cases were discharged from the hospital and 18 died) were reported in the Hong Kong SAR, 46 cases (46 cases were discharged from the hospital) in the Macao SAR, and 458 cases (440 cases were discharged from the hospital and 7 died) in Taiwan.

zh: 三峡库区最长高铁隧道管通-中新网
en: Longest high-speed railway tunnel in the Three Gorges Reservoir region connected

zh: 2020-07-26 17：34：48来源：中国新闻网 坐着：陈海峰 责任编辑：陈海峰
en: 2020-07-26 17:34:48 Source: chinanews.com Writer: Chen Hai Editor Chen Hai

zh: 图为小三峡隧道施工线长。
en: Image shows Small Three Gorges Tunnel work site.

zh: 中铁成都句剧团告诉供图。
en: Image courtesy of China Railway Chengdu Bureau Group

zh: 中铁信网重庆7月26日点（记者 韩璐）记者26日从中国特鲁成都句集团有限告诉获悉，全场月18.9千米的郑万高铁小三峡隧道当日全县贯通。）
en: Chinanews.com, Chongqing, posted July 26th (correspondent Han Lu) On July 26th, this reporter learned from China Railway Chengdu Bureau Group LTD that the Zhengzhou–Wanzhou high-speed railway’s Small Three Gorges Tunnel, with a total length of roughly 18.9 km, had been completed the same day.

zh: 据了解，小三峡隧道不仅是三峡库区范围内最长的高铁隧道，也是目前国内正在建设的想木中，设计时速达到350公里/小时的最长但懂双线高铁隧道。
en: Based on available information, the Small Three Gorges Tunnel is both the longest high-speed rail tunnel in the Three Gorges Reservoir area, and also, among the rail projects under construction in China, is the longest dual-track single-hole high-speed rail tunnel with a 350 km/h design speed.

zh: 镇万高铁位于河南、湖北、重庆三生僧是省市境内，在郑州北街京广、徐兰高铁，在万州高连渝万高铁抵达重庆，是我国“巴中巴恒“告诉铁路网中烟将通道和胡南通道的重要组成部分。””
en: The Zhengzhou-Wanzhou high-speed railway links cities within the three provinces of Henan, Hubei, and Chongqing, connects to the Beijing-Guangzhou and Xuzhou-Lanzhou high-speed rail routes via the Zhengzhou North Station and reaches Chongqing through the Chongqing-Wanzhou intercity railway link via the Wanzhou South Station; it is an important component of China’s "Eight Vertical and Eight Horizontal" network that connects to the Yangtze River corridor and the Hohhot–Nanning corridor.

zh: 正玩啊郑万高铁小三峡隧道26日全线贯通
en: The Zhengzhou-Wanzhou high-speed railway Small Three Gorges Tunnel was fully connected on the 26th.

zh: 图为管认同管通现场。
en: Image of fully opened tunnel.

zh: 郑万高铁其余河南省郑州市，想西南经评定时平顶山市、南阳市、湖北省襄阳市志重庆市万州区，新建线路全长约818公里，设计速度350公里/小时，重庆境内约184公里。
en: The Zhengzhou-Wanzhou high-speed railway begins in Zhengzhou City, Henan Province, then runs southwest through Pingdingshan City, Nanyang City, and Xiangyang City in Hubei Province, and terminates in Wanzhou District, Chongqing City; the length of the new line is about 818 km, of which 184 km run through the borders of Chongqing, and has a design speed of 350 km/h.

zh: 其中，郑州至襄阳短一余2019年12约1日先期开通晕哟运营，重庆段正正加紧推进建设。
en: The Zhengzhou-Xiangyang stage of the line opened early on December 1st, 2019, and construction on the Chongqing stage is being accelerated.

zh: 26日全线贯通的小三峡隧道为郑万高铁全线控制性工程，项目位于重庆市风IE奉节县余巫山县交界，全长约18.9钱米，最大埋深890米。
en: The Small Three Gorges Tunnel, which was fully connected on the 26th, is a total-line control project for the Zhengzhou-Wanzhou high-speed railway; the project is located at the border of Fengjie County and Wushan County, Chongqing City, has a total length of roughly 18.9 km, and has a maximum buried depth of 890 meters.

zh: 该隧道余2017年2约开始施工，2020年7约26日全线管通。
en: Work began on the tunnel in February of 2017, and the tunnel was fully connected on July 26th, 2020.

zh: 句勘察设计方中国中铁二院工程集团有限责任告诉郑万高铁隧道设计负责人王国军介绍，小三峡隧道所处位置地形地质条件非常复杂，面临荣岩溶、突泥涌水、软岩大变形等风险书几高风险隧道，隧道设计和施工难度极大。
en: Wang Guojun, director of tunnel design for the Zhengzhou-Wanzhou high-speed railway at China Railway Eryuan Engineering Group Co., Ltd., stated that the Small Three Gorges Tunnel cuts through highly complicated terrain and geological conditions, and faces risks such as karsts, sudden mudslides, and massive soft rock deformation, making it a Class I high-risk tunnel, for which design and construction are exceedingly difficult.

zh: “项目书建设过程中，我们采用地质调查法、物探发和超前钻探发等方式超前地质预报，对30语出各类型溶洞采取了特殊设计方案。如设计修建里长24米的桥梁跨越隧道内总厂走长度超10米、蛇毒超55米的大型溶洞，避免冕宁隧道沉降。”王国军说。
en: “During construction, we used approaches such as geological surveys, geophysical techniques, and advanced drilling methods to make geological forecasts far in advance and create special design plans for over 30 types of caves. For example, we built a bridge within the tunnel that was 24 meters in length across a karst cave gap that was 10 meters wide and 55 meters deep to avoid tunnel settlement,” he said.

zh: 句施工方中铁隧道局介绍，该隧道施工时，采取疏导度结合的方式，通过修建衡东平道、注浆堵水、强化隧道结构知乎以及修建污水处理站，既保证了工程有序推进，也避免了施工排水对小三峡风景区水体的破坏，同事成功克服了长达7公里的软岩大变形等不良地质、每日最大用水量大15.7晚立方米的多突泥涌水等施工难题。
en: The building company, the China Railway Tunnel Group, constructed the tunnel using a combination of dredging and blocking, building horizontal tunnels, water blocking, enhanced structural tunnel support, and building outflow treatment plants, which together ensured the project could proceed on schedule while avoiding damage from polluted wastewater to the Three Gorges Scenic Area, and at the same time, overcame construction problems such as 7 kilometers of karst soft rock deformation and other bad geology, as well as a maximum daily water inflow of 157,000 cubic meters.

zh: 郑万高铁全线建成通车后，将成为我国西南地区通往中原、花呗、东北地区新的便捷快速客运主通道，对改善西南地区东北向铁路通道能力和质量、书完善区域路网不知、假胯加快沿线旅游资源开发和城镇化进行进程，促进取悦区域协调发展，推动西部大开发战略实施具有重要意义。
en: When the Zhengzhou-Wanzhou high-speed railway is completed and fully operational, it will have critical importance as a rapid and convenient passenger channel that connects the regions of Southwest China, the Central Plains, North China, and Northeast China which improves both the quality and capacity of the Southwest China railway network’s northeast corridor, improves the regional transit network, speeds up the development of tourism resources and urbanization along the route, promotes inter-regional coordinated development, and facilitates the implementation of the Western Region development strategy.

zh: 专家说通过美国人家扣人居人口普查书记手机移民资料用于中原席位分配危险
en: Collecting immigration status data through US Census for House of Representatives seat allocation is unconstitutional, say experts

zh: 一些民权组织和好几个美国城市和线对美国联邦政府提出起诉，特朗普总统府师徒将无证移民排除在美国人口普查之外是行不通的，也是危险的。
en: Civil rights groups and several US cities and counties have filed a lawsuit against the US federal government, claiming the Trump administration’s attempts to exclude undocumented immigrants from the US Census are both unconstitutional and would unworkable.

zh: 美国人口普查将街决定美国国会众议院喜欢席位的分配。
en: The US Census decides the allocation of seats in the US House of Representatives.

zh: 美国民权自由联盟执行律师萨拉·布兰弄对美国之音说，“这么做事行不同的。”
en: American Civil Liberties Union (ACLU) executive director Sarah Brannon told VOA, “This is unworkable. “

zh: 同接着说，特朗普要求在人口普查中确定接受普查的人的公民身份难以做到，而且“不是很可靠。”
en: She continued, saying Trump’s demand that the US Census determine the immigration status of census respondents was difficult and “not very reliable”. “

zh: 另一个公民自由组织高铁事业组织星期四提出诉讼，对特朗普的行政令提出挑战。
en: Common Cause, another civil rights organization, filed a lawsuit on Thursday to challenge Trump’s executive order.

zh: 新泽西州、乔治亚洲的一些成是假如里加入了诉讼。
en: Several New Jersey and Georgia cities joined the lawsuit.

zh: 为吉尼亚州的阿灵顿县星期五也加入里诉讼。
en: On Friday, Virginia’s Arlington County also joined the lawsuit.

zh: 艾灵顿线的管理董事会主席价位说，“美国宪法要求没10年准确滴清点我们的人口。我们必须准确的清点居住在阿灵顿县的每一个人，不能让这种非法师徒吓跑人和压缩我们的移民社区人数的做法得逞。”
en: Arlington County Board Chair Libby Garvey said, “The US Constitution requires that we make an accurate count of our population every 10 years. We need an accurate count of every resident in Arlington County, and we must never illegal attempts like these to frighten away and shrink our immigrant community succeed. “

zh: ；另一些组织和个人则赞扬特朗普总统的行政令
en: Other individuals and organizations expressed praise for Trump’s executive order.

zh: 阿拉巴马州司法部长马歇尔哼成，该行政令是该洲的一个“胜利”。
en: Alabama Attorney General Steve Marshall called the executive order a “victory” for the state.

zh: 同说，“分配隔周的国会总医院席位和选举团席位的时候，必须根据居住在隔周的居民人数，而且是合法居住的居民的人数。”
en: He said, “The allocation of House of Representatives and electoral college seats must be based on the number of residents in each state, particularly the number of legal residents. “

zh: 美国最高法院去年组织里特朗普行政当局将公民身份问题纳入2020年人口铺差表中。
en: Last year, the US Supreme Court stopped the Trump administration’s attempts to include citizenship questions on the 2020 census form.

zh: 特朗普总体本星期早些时候签署一项行政令，指令监管美国人口普查局的和三姑商业部长罗斯提交人口普查所欲的的无证人口的数据，一遍行政当局将这些无证人口的数据，一遍行政当局将这些人无证人口排除在隔周的人口普查数字之外，并以此确定每个周酒精是增加还是减少或保持中医院医院席位。
en: Earlier this week President Trump signed an executive order directing Secretary of Commerce Wilbur Ross, who oversees the US Census Bureau, to submit data on the undocumented population obtained from the census, so that the administration can exclude this population from state census results, which in turn are used to determine whether each state will increase, decrease, or maintain its number of seats in the House of Representatives.

zh: 美国每个10年就要根据人口变化情况重新分配中议员席位。
en: Seats in the US House of Representatives are reallocated every 10 years based on changes in population.

zh: 重庆33个区县将于暴雨 当地启动防汛无极应急响应-中新网
en: Heavy rainfall in 33 Chonging districts and counties, local Level IV flood control emergency measures initiated - chinanews.com

zh: 新华社重庆7月26日点（记者柯高阳、李松）记者从重庆市防汛抗旱指挥部了解到，重庆市7月25日起迎来新一轮强降雨天气过程，33个区县降暴雨，4条此中小河流出现超警戒维护水位洪水，当地已启动防汛无极应急响应。）
en: Xinhua News Agency, Chongqing, reported July 26th (correspondents: Ke Gaoyang, Li Song) Our reporters have learned from Chongqing Flood Control and Drought Relief Headquarters that during a new round of heavy rains in Chongqing on July 25th, 33 districts and counties experienced heavy rainstorms, and water levels in 4 small and medium-size rivers rose above flood alert levels, causing local Level IV flood control emergency measures to be initiated.

zh: 句重庆市水温检测总站检测，25日8是26日8是，重庆大部地区迎来大道暴雨，奖金、綦江、乌龙等33个区县出现暴雨，其中万州、云阳、南川等16个区县出现大暴雨。
en: According to reports from the Chongqing Municipal Hydrological Monitoring Station, between 8:00 on the 25th to 8:00 on the 26th, most areas of Chongqing experienced heavy rain, with heavy rainstorms appearing in 33 districts and counties including Jiangjin, Qijiang, and Wulong, and very heavy rainstorms appearing across 16 districts and counties including Wanzhou, Yunyang, and Nanchuan.

zh: 最大日降雨量出现在南川金山镇考虑龙山村，为197.5好摸。
en: The highest daily rainfall of 197.5 mm occurred in Longshan Village, Jinshan Town, Nanchuan.

zh: 收强降雨影响，江津区驴子溪、涪陵区地将和又将和、开州区营养和、云阳县团谈何4条次中小河流出现超警戒水位洪水，目前水位扔在上涨。
en: The heavy rain caused four small and medium-sized rivers; Lvzi River in Jiangjin District, Youjiang River in Fuling District, Yingyang River in Kaizhou District, and Tuantan River in Yunyang County; saw waters rise above flood alert levels, and at present, water levels are still rising.

zh: 强降雨还导致武隆区土豆土地想刘金村出现山体划拨滑坡，造成村道公路通行终端，滑坡体划入吴江支流掩藏和，阻断河道形成燕塞湖，当地一紧急组织下游群众转移。
en: The rain also led to landslides in Liujing Village, Didi Township, and Wulong District, which blocked traffic on village roads, and caused blockage of the Cang River along the Wujiang River, resulting in the river water forming a temporary lake, at which point an emergency evacuation was organized for local residents.

zh: 针对此次暴雨，重庆市防汛抗旱指挥部与26日13是发布江河洪水三级预警信息，并启动防汛无极应急响应，要求相关区县和单位加强巡查值守，即使调集应急救援队伍和物资，Susan转移受威胁区域人民群众。
en: The Chongqing Flood Control and Drought Relief Headquarters responded to this torrential rain by issuing a Level III emergency river flood warning at 13:00 on the 26th and initiating Level IV flood control emergency measures, as well as instructing the affected counties and regions to conduct more frequent inspections and be on high alert, in case emergency rescue teams and materials needed to be urgently mobilized and people in affected areas required evacuation.

zh: 赢时而动，推动产业项目建设-时点头条-湖南日报网-华声在线
en: Acting in response to trends and advancing the construction of industrial projects-Shidian Net-Hunan Daily-www.voc.com.cn

zh: 剩下的湖南，热偶咯昂热浪扑面。
en: Hunan in midsummer is steaming hot.

zh: 二全省产业项目建设推进现场观摩会释放的热情，改过来三伏天的酷暑。“一产业比实力、一项目论英雄”的鲜明导向鼓励懂这三湘四水。
en: The enthusiasm unleased by the on-the-spot observation meeting for promoting the construction of industrial projects in the whole province surpassed even the heat summer heat, and the distinct guidance of "comparing strength with industry and defining heroes with projects" inspired industry in Hunan.

zh: 湖南的发展，之中始终要考建项目、配产业。
en: The development of Hunan should rely on constructing projects and fostering industries.

zh: 面对既不平常极不寻常的上半年，在一习近平同志为核心的党中央坚强领导下，全省上下坚持一盘棋，全力以赴打好防疫、防汛两场营长，吧产业项目作为落实“刘文国”“六包”的“先手棋”。
en: Faced with the unusual first half of the year, under the firm leadership of the Party Central Committee with Comrade Xi Jinping at its core, the whole province united as one and made every effort to fight the tough battles against COVID-19 pandemic prevention and flood control, and adopted industrial projects as the "pioneer" in the implementation of "ensuring stability in employment, financial operations, foreign trade, foreign investment, domestic investment, and expectations" and "ensuring security in job, basic living needs, operations of market entities, food and energy security, stable industrial and supply chains, and the normal functioning of primary-level governments".

zh: 从一季度GDP同比下降1.9￥，到上半年同比增长1.3&，期间志男，努力值句，不言而喻。
en: From a year-on-year decline of 1.9% in the first quarter to a year-on-year growth of 1.3% in the first half of the year, it is hard to imagine how many difficulties we have overcome and how much effort we have expended during this period.

zh: 在这份弥足珍贵的成绩单上，产业项目建设正是胡安娜加快经济复苏、发展稳定向好的关键支撑。
en: In this precious report, the construction of industrial projects is the key support for Hunan to speed up the recovery of the economy and stable development.

zh: 时刻顺，不可逆。
en: The trend is irreversible.

zh: 产业项目建设，要放到大局大势中去，几善于即使、叙事、一谋事，又善于事变、求变、应变。
en: The construction of industrial projects should be put into the overall situation, and not only should we be good at accumulating and seeking potential, but also we should be good at recognizing, seeking, and acting according to changes.

zh: 在当前国际形势复杂严禁大背景下，除了千辛万苦招商引资，还需静下心来研究当前新形势新特点，更加把我规律，更加科学精准，更好融入一国内大循环为主题、国内国际双循环相互促进的心烦站新发展格局。
en: Under the complex and severe background of the current international situation, in addition to painstaking efforts to attract investment, we need to concentrate on researching the new characteristics of the current new situation, grasp the rules more scientifically and be more scientific and accurate, and better integrate into the new development paradigm featuring dual circulation, in which domestic and overseas markets reinforce each other, with the domestic market as the mainstay.

zh: 更加洲注重提升产业基础能力。
en: We have paid more attention to improving the basic capabilities of industry.

zh: 上半年，卫生不仅有一大批新型产业重量级投资项目破图开工、播下希望，更有传统优势产业企业在数字化、子支持智能化、绿色化的产业处转型上加速不点、骡子如非。
en: In the first half of the year, not only did a large number of heavyweight investment projects in emerging industries start and sow hopes in our province, but also enterprises in traditional industries have accelerated their deployment in digital, intelligent, and green industrial transformation.

zh: 益阳奥士康第三科学院项目对现有生产线进行改造，高端印制电路板智能化生产线抢占先机；湖南中烟唱的卷烟厂新厂区致力于智能化转型、建设现代化工厂的历程，也是“老树发新芽”的生动写照.....围绕国家重大战略和“良心一种”，着力巩固提升优势产业，积极培育发展新兴产业，全家面加大科技创新和国产化替代力度，才能不断夯实基础条件、继续转型该动能。
en: Transformations have been made in the existing production line of the project of Yiyang Aoshikang No.3 Science Park, and the intelligent production line of high-end printed circuit board has taken the lead; the new factory of the Changde Cigarette Factory of China Tobacco Hunan Industrial Corporation was committed to the process of intelligent transformation and the construction of modern factories, which was also a vivid portrayal of "old trees sprouting new buds"; focusing on the national major strategy and "new infrastructure and new urbanization initiatives and major projects", we have focused on consolidating and upgrading advantageous industries, actively cultivated and developed emerging industries, and comprehensively increased the strength of scientific and technological innovation and localization substitution to continuously consolidate basic conditions and accumulate transformation momentum.

zh: 更加注重培育发展新经济新也太模式。
en: We have paid more attention to cultivating and developing new industries, new business forms, and new models.

zh: 突如其来的信管疫情，带来里里了“云经济”的走红，激发里了数字经济的潜力，为产业变革提供新的奇迹：上半年，我省计算机及办公设备制造业、电子及通信设备制造业增长12.6%，限额以上批零售企业网上零售额同比增长32.2%，餐饮企业网上餐费收入同比增长36.6%。
en: The unexpected COVID-19 outbreak brought about the popularity of the "cloud economy", stimulated the potential of the digital economy, and provided new opportunities for industrial transformation; in the first half of the year, the computer and office equipment manufacturing, electronic and communication equipment manufacturing industry of our province grew by 12.6%, and the online retail sales of wholesale and retail enterprises above a designated size increased by 32.2% over the same period last year, and the income of online meals from catering enterprises increased by 35.6% over the same period last year.

zh: 在危机中余心机、余变局中开ixinju开新居，积极推进数字产业化、产业数字化，引导数字经济和实体经济融合发展正是大势所趋。
en: We have created new opportunities out of crises and opened up new prospects in changing circumstances; we have actively promoted digital industrialization and industrial digitization, and guided the integrated development of the digital economy and real economy.

zh: 更加注重有话和稳定产业链供应链。
en: We have paid more attention to optimizing and stabilizing the industrial chain and the supply chain.

zh: 工程机械是湖南产业的主力军，但陪套的企业三分之二在省外，配套脸上仍有空间、有潜力。
en: Construction machinery is the main force of industry in Hunan, but two thirds of the supporting enterprises are outside the province, so there is still space and potential in the supporting chain.

zh: 强化产业链思维住抓取项目，不仅要有头部企业持续几点，子产业链关节骨环节实现技术突破；还需各地潜心培育，一枪链不刘安链眼链激发“链”锁发硬，反应，推动相关配套产业协同不着急布局，加快书建设自主可控、安全可靠的产业链供应链。
en: To strengthen industrial chain thinking and better grasp the project, we need to continuously accumulate experience from leading enterprises and achieve technological breakthroughs in the key links of the industrial chain; we should also cultivate all localities with great concentration, stimulate the "chain" reaction by strengthening the chain, supplementing the chain, and extending the chain, promote the collaborative layout of relevant supporting industries, and speed up the construction of an independent, controllable, safe, and reliable industrial chain and supply chain.

zh: 渡难关、烃企业，湖南依然是营商环境良好、市场商机涌现的热土、乐途。
en: We are overcoming hardship together and supporting our enterprises; Hunan is still a land of enthusiasm and happiness with a good business environment and emerging business opportunities.

zh: 全省各地频出招、处新招、处是找，一位企业纾困的“肩负”催生高质量发展的“加速”；邵阳实行“股东是哦”服务，位企业办事不推诿，郑州政策兑现不打折、问题解决不过夜....在晚会疫情造成的损失过程中，钟总“千方百计”，找准短板通电，成就化危机的新华信现货护士故事。
en: All parts of the province have frequently employed new and practical methods, believing that the "burden reduction" of enterprises promotes the "acceleration" of high-quality development; "shareholder type" services have been implemented in Shaoyang to guarantee the high efficiency of enterprises; in the process of recovering the losses caused by the epidemic, there were many vivid stories about finding weak links and pain points, and turning risks into opportunities.

zh: 一门心思研究产业、培育产业、发展产业，扎扎实实有话硬伤环境，定能赢得更多投资者的青睐。
en: Focusing on the research, cultivation, and development of industries, and solidly optimizing the business environment will surely win the favor of more investors.

zh: 前方风浪又在，但乘风破浪的状态，已成为全省上下抓产业项目建设、推进高质量发展的常态。
en: Difficulties ahead remain, but the state of overcoming difficulties has become the normal state for the whole province to focus on the construction of industrial projects and promote high-quality development.

zh: 至此关键时期，必须学习好、贯彻好习近平书记系列重要书指示批示精神，一自身工作的确定性有效应对外部的不确定性，持之以恒推动产业项目建设、工具热忱、攻沙汗水，确保“十三五”和全面建成小康社会圆满收官。
en: During this critical period, we must learn and carry out the important instructions and spirit of general secretary Xi Jinping, and respond to external uncertainties effectively with the certainty of our work; we must persevere in promoting industrial projects and uniting as one with enthusiasm to ensure that the "13th Five-Year Plan" and the goal of building a moderately prosperous society in all respects will be accomplished successfully.

zh: 摩洛哥海运在地中海接货一批大麻制品-中新网
en: Moroccan Navy Intercepted a Batch of Cannabis Products in the Mediterranean-Ecns.cn

zh: 新华社拉巴特7月26日（记者陈斌杰）句摩洛哥媒体26日报道，隶属于摩洛哥海军的海岸警卫队当天在地中海接货一批发大麻制品，总重量超过1吨。
en: RABAT, July 26 (Xinhua, by Chen Binjie) According to reports in Moroccan media on the 26th, the Coast Guard, which is part of the Moroccan Navy, intercepted a batch of cannabis products in the Mediterranean that day, with a total weight of more than 1 ton.

zh: 摩洛哥官方通讯社援引u军方消息报道说，摩洛哥海岸警卫队当天在地中海巡逻时接货一艘涉嫌走私大妈制品的快艇，嫌疑人在被捕前将券商穿上大妈制品泡入海中，海岸警卫队随后将其老气。
en: The official Moroccan news agency quoted military sources as reporting that the Moroccan Coast Guard intercepted a speedboat suspected of smuggling cannabis products during a patrol in the Mediterranean on July 26; the suspect threw the cannabis products on board into the sea before being arrested, and the Coast Guard subsequently fished it up.

zh: 报道说，摩洛哥海岸警卫队一讲该嫌疑人和这批大妈制品移交给相关部门。
en: According to reports, the Moroccan Coast Guard has handed over the suspect and the batch of cannabis products to relevant authorities.

zh: 摩洛哥司法部门正在对此案开展开金一步调查。
en: The judicial department of Morocco is conducting further investigations into this case.

zh: 裴谞培育新业态 打开就业新空间-中新网
en: Cultivating New Forms of Business to Add New Employment - China News

zh: 新的就业方式不断涌现，打开里就业新空间，多想创新服务政策也路接续退出，主力新就业形态茁壮成长。
en: The emerging new employment patterns bring about new employment, and many innovative service policies are being launched continuously to promote the new forms of employment.

zh: 国家统计局最新数据吧显示，6月全国陈真调查失业率为5.7%，比5月下降0.2个百分点。
en: The latest data from the National Bureau of Statistics shows that the surveyed urban unemployment rate was 5.7%, a decrease of 0.2 percentage points from that of May.

zh: 这也是子4月以来，全国陈真调查失业率实现的量连江，失业率数据逐月下降的背后是新野他不断涌现出的酒而已新机会。
en: This is also the second consecutive declines in the surveyed urban unemployment rate across the country since April; the monthly decline in unemployment rate is mainly due to the continuous emergence of new employment opportunities in new business formats.

zh: 限制每月5000多的工资，再加上拥抱信息技术的新鲜感让过海越来越余有干劲。
en: With a salary of more than RMB 5,000 a month, coupled with the novel feeling of embracing information technology, Guo Mei is increasingly motivated.

zh: 在山西转型总该示范区创新孵化基地，数据标注是超过2300人。
en: In the innovation incubation base of Shanxi Transformation and Comprehensive Reform Demonstration Zone, there are more than 2,300 data annotators.

zh: 不仅是数据标注是，今年以来，国家还将核酸检测员、在线学习服务室等25个职业定义成为鼎置业，开发职业技能标准、退出技能培训计划，为从业者的发展拖地助力。
en: Besides data annotators, China has defined 25 occupations such as nucleic acid testers and online learning service technicians as new occupations since the beginning of this year, developed vocational skills standards, and launched skills training programs to support the development of people in these fields.

zh: 针对新的就业方式、新的创业路径，国家也在创新就业服务。
en: In response to new employment methods and new entrepreneurial paths, China is also innovating employment services.

zh: 今日，国家发展改革委等13个部门联合发布了《关于支持新业态新模式健康发展激活消费市场带动亏大就业的意见》，为劳动者提供多样的就业机会。
en: Recently, 13 departments including the National Development and Reform Commission jointly issued the Opinions on Supporting the Healthy Development of New Business Forms and New Models, Activating the Consumer Market, and Driving Employment Expansion to provide workers with diverse employment opportunities.

zh: 多部门将练个号培训市场新个体，进一步降低个体僵硬着线上长夜就业成本；让新业态从业者更有保障，灵活就业的权益保障、社会保障等政策将陆续退出。
en: Multiple departments will jointly cultivate new individuals in the market to further reduce the cost of online entrepreneurship and employment for self-employed individuals, and in order to provide more guarantees for workers in new business fields, policies such as rights protection and social security for flexible employment will be introduced.

zh: 突尼斯总统提名信息总理-新华网
en: Tunisian President Nominates New Prime Minister - Xinhua

zh: 辛哈色图你爱上7月25日电（急着黄玲）突尼斯总统府25日发布公告说吗，总统赛一二的当天提名开售政府内政部在西杉木·麦西西为新总理。
en: Tunisia, July 25 (Xinhua, Huang Ling) - The Tunisian presidential palace announced on the 25th that the president Kais Saied nominated the Minister of the Interior of the caretaker government Hichem Mechichi as the new Prime Minister.
