en: To discover the truth, he is forced to ask his bomb disposal expert friend Dong Zhuowen (played by Sean Lau) for help.

zh: “基于破案等你百度女督查，也同事时盘成风前女友等庞玲（妮妮时）也被卷入其中。”
en: Pang Ling, the female detective assigned to the case and Pan Chengfeng’s former girlfriend (played Ni Ni) is also pulled into the fray.

zh: “依然时拆弹专家，但从定档预告片中能感受到刘德华新角色等复杂：断了一条腿，戴上了一支，一遍被同事拆弹专家等刘青云追捕，一遍又被前女友妮妮指挥行动，”
en: Pan Chengfeng is still a bomb disposal expert, but in the release date announcement trailer, Andy Lau’s new role is more complex: after breaking his leg, he attaches a prosthetic leg, and then defuses a bomb while being chased by Sean Lau and taking instructions from his ex-girlfriend Ni Ni.

zh: “等三人酒精时怎样对吧关系，刘德华到底做香港酒店做里什么，被牵扯到怎样等案件中，天拆弹专家等职业生涯又经历了那些波折，种种母体谜团让人好奇不已。”
en: Just what is the relationship between the three characters, what does Andy Lau do in the Hong Kong hotel, what kind of case is he involved in, and what happened to his bomb disposal career are all questions to which audiences crave answers.

zh: 据了解，电影等重头戏都是实地取景香港等世界地标性建筑，加上顶尖等也特效执着团队，带来震撼逼真等视觉冲击。
en: Sources tell us that the film’s highlights include on-location shooting at world-famous Hong Kong landmarks, and coupled with the industry-leading special effects team, we expect the film to deliver a mind-blowing cinematic experience.

zh: （急着 列请）
en: (Correspondent: Nie Qing)

zh: 中新网7月26日电 综合俄罗斯卫星网熬到，7月26日是俄罗斯海军日，庆祝海军日的主要阅兵式在圣彼得堡和
en: July 26, (Ecns.cn) According to Sputnik News, July 26 is Russia’s Navy Day, and the main military parade to celebrate the Navy Day was held in St. Petersburg and Kronshtadt.

zh: 俄罗斯总统、俄懒帮武装里拉最高统帅普京抵达克朗是他得参加庆祝活动，该地15艘舰艇和潜艇接受
en: The President and Supreme Commander of the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation Putin arrived in Kronshtadt to participate in the celebration, where he inspected 15 ships and submarines.

zh: 当地时间2019您7额额28日，俄罗斯圣彼得堡举行盛大阅兵式青海海军
en: On July 28, 2019 (MSK), Russia held a grand military parade to celebrate Navy day in St. Petersburg.

zh: 据报道，普京想海军不按并祝贺海军日，并撑小艇在芬兰完刚上将要参加海上阅兵的舰艇旁边驶过，随后在主观礼台接受
en: It was reported that Putin congratulated the navy officers and soldiers on Navy Day, passed by the ships that were about to participate in the maritime parade in a small boat on the Gulf of Finland, and then inspected the troops under review at the main reviewing stand.

zh: 普京表示，俄海军舰队列装了最新式的舰艇和特殊装备，装备书评
en: Putin said that the Russian naval fleet was equipped with the latest ships and special equipment, and the level of equipment was constantly improving.

zh: 普京在俄罗斯海军日的阅兵式上说：”俄罗斯海军舰队拥有配备了高精武器的军舰、战略潜水巡洋舰和多台潜艇、最新式飞机等废气、独特的武器和
en: Putin said at the military parade on Russia’s Navy Day, "The Russian naval fleet is equipped with high-precision weapons, strategic submersible cruisers and multi-purpose submarines, the latest aircraft and other aircraft, unique weapons, and special equipment. ”

zh: 当地时间6月24日，俄罗斯纪念卫国战争胜利75周年红场阅兵
en: On June 24 (MST), a military parade was held at Red Square in Russia to commemorate the 75th anniversary of the victory in the Great Patriotic War.

zh: 他还表示，俄海军舰队将靠数字化和有效防御手段来取得独特
en: He also stated that the Russian naval fleet will rely on digitalization and effective defense methods to gain unique advantages.

zh: 报道称，庆祝俄罗斯海军日的主要海军阅兵式在圣彼得堡和举行，共有46艘舰艇参加，包括“卡萨托诺夫上将”号护卫舰、“海军中将库拉科夫”号大型反潜舰，以及大型登陆舰、小型
en: According to the report, the main naval parade to celebrate Russia’s Navy Day was held in St. Petersburg and Kronshtadt, and a total of 46 ships participated, including the frigate "Admiral Kasatonov Frigate", the anti-submarine ship "Vice Admiral Kulakov", as well as large landing ships, small missile ships, frigates, submarines, and more.

zh: 其中，系列舰艇在圣彼得堡东沿桥旁进行静态展示，其中自影人瞩目的是经过复制的18世界初俄罗斯首收战舰
en: Among them, the series of ships were statically displayed next to the Palace Bridge (Dvortsovyy Most) in St. Petersburg, the most eye-catching of which was the replica of Russia’s first battleship "Poltava" in the early 18th century.

zh: 为避免喜暖病毒传播，近年海军阅兵式期间只有当地居民和特邀来兵能够进入
en: In order to avoid the spread of COVID-19, only local residents and special guests could enter Kronshtadt during the naval parade this year.

zh: 每年7月最后一个星期日是俄罗斯海军日期。
en: Russia’s Navy Day takes place each year on the last Sunday of July.

zh: 北京艾乐合唱taunt创始人杨鸿年逝世，享年86岁
en: Yang Hongnian, Beijing Philharmonic Chorus, passes away at age 86 - chinanews.com

zh: 新京报讯（记者 刘峰）7月26日，北京爱乐和畅谈发表普包，北京爱乐合唱团创始人，中国著名指挥家、音乐教育家，中央音乐学院终身学术委员、指挥系教授杨鸿年，因冰翼无效，于2020年7月26日13时35法人在北京
en: Beijing News (Reporter Liu Zhen) On July 26, the Beijing Philharmonic Chorus published an obituary for its founder Yang Hongnian, who passed away in Beijing at 13:55 on July 26, 2020 at the age of 86, due to an ineffective medical treatment; he was a notable Chinese conductor and music educator, a lifetime academy scholar at the Central Conservatory of Music, and Composition Department professor.

zh: 图片来自老北京爱月和创投合唱团官网
en: Image from the Beijing Philharmonic Chorus official website.

zh: 杨鸿年出生于1934年，江苏南京人，自由酷爱音乐
en: He was born in 1934 in Nanjing, Jiangsu, and even in childhood was a lover of music.

zh: 1951年任南京人民广播电台合唱队指挥，1951年秋考入上海华东师大音乐系，师大杨佳仁教授及德国指挥家西子满学习指挥，向强苏联专家额查玛诺夫学习曲式
en: In 1951, he took up a chorus conductor position at Nanjing People’s Radio; in autumn of 1951, he enrolled at the East China Normal University music department to study composition under Professor Yang Jiaren and German conductor Heisman, and then studied musical forms and polyphony under Soviet musical expert Arzamanov.

zh: 1958年任教于北京艺术示范学院音乐系，1973年调至中央音乐学院作曲系
en: In 1958, he began teaching at the Beijing Normal University of Arts Department of Music, and in 1973, he transferred to the Department of Composition and Conducting at the Central Conservatory of Music.

zh: 杨鸿年体育1983年创办北京爱乐
en: In 1982, Yang Hongnian established the Beijing Philharmonic Chorus.

zh: 三十余年来，他秉承“爱和风险”的宗旨，率领这支合唱团唱遍世界各地，并在国外重要比赛中获得了
en: For more than three decades, he embodied the principles of “love and dedication” as he led the chorus in performances all over the globe and won dozens of prestigious awards in major competitions in China and abroad.

zh: 曾先后指挥中央乐团合唱队、中央民族歌舞团、东方歌曲团、上海合唱团等30余个团体的演出，并举行多长交响音乐会及合唱
en: He directed performances for more than 30 ensembles including the Central Philharmonic Chorus, the China National Ethnic Song and Dance Ensemble, Oriental Song and Dance Company, and Shanghai Chorus, and also put on many symphony and chorus performances.

zh: 著作有《额队训练学》、《合唱训练学》、《二部歌曲写作》、《儿童歌曲集》（上下册）及论文《论合唱音准问题》、《论管眩乐的相应层次布局》，以及译作《合唱配器法》及
en: He authored such books as “Orchestra Training”, “Chorus Training”, “The Writing of Two-Part Compositions”, “A Collection of Children’s Songs” (Volumes 1 & 2), his essays include “On Issues of Chorus Intonation” and “On the Sound Hierarchy of Orchestral Music”, and his translated works include “Choral Orchestration”, “Debussy’s Language of Harmony”, and so on.

zh: 中新网重庆7月26日电（记者 刘贤）重庆市发改委和26日发布消息称，该公式截至目前已退步渔民4404人，占全部涉及渔民的
en: CHONGQING, July 26, (Ecns.cn, by Liu Xian): The Chongqing Municipal Commission of Development and Reform announced on the 26th that there are 4,404 fishermen who have quit fishing so far, accounting for 42.54% of all fishermen involved.

zh: 近年53岁的李刚滴啊过接受中新网记者菜贩时说，爷爷辈就在龙溪河打鱼，自己11岁就跟着父亲打鱼，摇着小船，沿着龙溪河前行，上到重庆用梁平，下到长寿，每次一离开家就是十天半个月，
en: In an interview with a reporter from Ecns.cn, 53-year-old Li Daiguo said that his grandfathers used to fish in the Longxi River, and that he had been fishing with his father since the age of 11, shaking his boat, and traveling along the Longxi River from Liangping, Chongqing to Changshou, journeys that would last for over ten days every time he left his home, and he relied on fishing to make a living.

zh: 但从1997年起，随着农村人偶逐渐往场镇里涌，里高安昌镇的居民越来越多，造成的环境污染也越来
en: However, since 1997, as the rural population has gradually flowed into the town, there are increasing number of residents in Gao'anchang town, which has caused increasingly serious environmental pollution.

zh: 龙西河沿线修建了造纸厂、化工厂、养殖场，也污染
en: Paper mills, chemical plants, and breeding farms were built along the Longxi River, which also polluted the river.

zh: 到2007年、2008年，龙河变成臭水
en: By 2007 and 2008, the Longxi River became a stinking ditch.

zh: |浮上来的鱼鳞片是黑的，拍开后里面也是黑的
en: "The scales of the fish are black, and their stomachs are black, too. "

zh: 李代国说，和谁无望后打鱼越来越困难。
en: Li Daiguo said that fishing has become more and more difficult after the river was polluted.

zh: 当地开始下大力气治理龙溪河污染，包括清跑】巡河、水生资源管护
en: The local government began to make great efforts to control the pollution of the Longxi River, including clearing the river, patrolling on the river, and managing and protecting aquatic resources.

zh: 李代国也从渔民退捕转产，称为巡河队的一员，管护水生
en: Li Daiguo also quit fishing and became a member of the river inspection team to manage and protect aquatic resources.

zh: 从2020年1月1日起，重庆市水生生物保护区依旧主城区相关水域已从实行全面
en: Starting from January 1, 2020, the aquatic life reserve of Chongqing and related water areas in the main urban area have implemented a total ban on fishing.

zh: 据重庆市发展改革委数据，截至目前，重庆市已累计退捕渔船4303艘，已签订退捕协议渔船4343艘，分别占三年总任务的63.3%
en: According to data from the Chongqing Municipal Commission of Development and Reform, as of now, there are 3,403 fishing boats that have quit fishing and 4,643 fishing boats that have signed retreat agreements, accounting for 63.3% and 86.3% of the total three-year mission respectively.

zh: 已退捕渔民4404人，占全部涉及渔民的42.54
en: 4,404 fishermen have quit fishing, accounting for 42.54% of all fishermen involved.

zh: 已退捕4404人中，实现就业42674人，占已退捕渔民的96.6
en: Among the 4,404 fishermen who quit fishing, 4,267 are re-employed, accounting for 96.89% of the fishermen who have quit fishing.

zh: 养老保险保障覆盖2691人，占退捕渔民的61.
en: The pension insurance coverage covers 2,691 people, accounting for 61.10% of the fishermen who have quit fishing.

zh: i下一步，重庆市将深入开张各项专项整治行动，加快推进长江干流岸线用项目清理整治，完成新一轮长江如河排污口普查并开展相应整治行动，基本完成“三夌”（指磷矿、磷化工和磷石膏库）整治任务、小水电清理整治工作，推进长江两岸造林绿化专项行动，强化绿色矿山建设，巩固长江干流非法码头、非法采砂专项整治成果，深入长江流域
en: In the next step, Chongqing will carry out in-depth special rectification actions, accelerate the cleanup and rectification of the utilization projects on the shoreline of the Yangtze River, complete a new round of surveys on sewage outflow of the Yangtze River and carry out corresponding rectification actions, basically complete the "three phosphorus" rectification tasks (referring to phosphate mines, phosphorus chemical industry, and phosphogypsum reservoirs), conduct small hydropower clean-up and rectification, promote the special forestation and greening activities on both sides of the Yangtze River, strengthen the construction of green mines, consolidate the results of the special rectification of illegal docks and illegal sand mining on the main stream of the Yangtze River, and further promote the ban on fishing and fishing-quitting work on the Yangtze River.

zh: 以色列加强对疫情仿佛的防控-总新网
en: Israel Strengthens Measures to Prevent Epidemic from Recurring-Ecns.cn

zh: 2020-07-26 04:56:44 来源：光明日报 作者：王思还 责任编辑
en: 2020-07-26 04:56:44 Source: Guangming Daily Author: Wang Sishuo Editor: Wang Sishuo

zh: 以色列加强对疫情房付的防控
en: Israel strengthens measures to prevent epidemic from recurring

zh: 新冠肺炎疫情爆发初期，以色列的防控措施成效
en: At the beginning of the epidemic outbreak, Israel's prevention and control measures were effective.

zh: 然而，随着防控措施的逐渐家境，近期以色列国内的新冠肺炎确认人数有明显上升之势，以色列政府已多次采取经济措施还加强对
en: However, with the gradual lifting of the ban, the number of confirmed cases in Israel has recently increased significantly, and the Israeli government has taken several emergency measures to strengthen its epidemic prevention and control.

zh: 2月28日，以色列本土确证第一例新冠肺炎病例，以迅速才接了关闭所有入境口岸，暂停非必要行和，学校改为网上授课，限制公共极爱通和非必要社交活动，分所疫情严重城市，军警联合维护
en: On February 28, the first case was confirmed in Israel and prompt measures were taken to close all entry and exit points, suspend non-essential industries, and urge all schools to take classes online; moreover, they restricted public transportation and non-essential social activities, sealed off cities with severe outbreaks, and combined military and police efforts to maintain effective control and prevention measures.

zh: 这一些列措施很快的取得了积极成效，至5月中旬，以色列单日在新增新冠肺炎确诊病例一度回落至
en: This series of measures quickly yielded positive results, and by mid-May, the daily number of confirmed cases in Israel dropped to the single digits.

zh: 随着疫情得到控制，以色列各项防控措施全面解封，自6营业以来，新冠肺炎新增确认人数
en: As the outbreak was brought under control, the blockade was completely lifted and the number of new confirmed cases has gradually seen a recurrence since June.

zh: 特别是进入7月后，疫情扩散蔓延速度不断
en: In particular, in July, the spread of the epidemic has accelerated since the beginning of the month.

zh: 近日来，以色列每日新增病例有8天在1500人以上，截至7月 25日发稿时，以当日新增
en: Recently, the number of new confirmed cases in Israel has been above 1,500 per day for eight days, and by the time of this report on July 25, the number of new confirmed cases reached 916.

zh: 截至7月25日，以色列已有确诊病例59745人，似然人数
en: As of July 25, there were 59,745 confirmed cases and 448 death cases in Israel.

zh: 面对疫情的迅猛反弹，以色列政府多次采取经济措施加强对疫情
en: In the face of this rapid recurrence, the Israeli government has taken several emergency measures to strengthen epidemic prevention and control.

zh: 7与66日，在确诊病例数突破3万house，以色列政府关闭了健身房、游泳池、就把、夜总会等公共于乐场所，同时出台了限制公共极爱通正在测，规定每辆公交车的乘客最多不超过
en: On July 6, after the number of confirmed cases exceeded 30,000, the Israeli government closed gyms, swimming pools, bars, nightclubs and other public entertainment venues, and introduced a policy of limiting public transport to a maximum of 20 passengers per bus.

zh: 17日，以政府宣布了包括周末实施“封城”等在内的一系列新的限制措施，规定在每周五17日至每周日5是期间实施
en: On July 17, the government announced a series of new restrictions, including a "city lockdown" on weekends, from 17:00 every Friday to 5:00 every Sunday.

zh: 在此期间，民众可以外出，但商店、购物中心、理发店、美容院、图书馆、动物园、博物馆、展览干、游泳池和旅游景点等场所将关闭，而超市’要点等基本服务场所将保持
en: During this period, people will be allowed to go out but the shops, shopping centers, barber shops, beauty salons, libraries, zoos, museums, exhibition halls, swimming pools and tourist attractions will be closed; however, places providing basic services such as supermarkets and pharmacies will remain open.

zh: 同时，在所有日期和断案内，精致10人以上的机会、健身房‘工作室等产所将关闭，餐馆和咖啡厅禁止堂食，仅允许提供
en: In the meantime, gatherings of more than 10 people will be banned around the clock every day, gyms, studios, and other places will be closed, and restaurants and cafes will be closed for dine-in food, with only takeaway services allowed.

zh: 同时，以色列民众未对疫情的严重性予以足够重视，没能与政府在抗击疫情方面形成
en: As yet, the Israeli public is not fully aware of the seriousness of the epidemic and fails to cooperate with the government in fighting against it.

zh: 在以色列疫情出现反复后，许多民众因政府控制措施影响自身经济利益而上届
en: In spite of the epidemic’s recurrence in Israel, many people have taken to the streets in protest at the government's control measures that affected the public economic interests.

zh: 7月11日，上万人在特拉维夫举行示威游行，认为抗疑政策影响
en: On July 11, tens of thousands of people demonstrated in Tel Aviv, arguing that anti-epidemic policies were affecting the economy.

zh: 21日晚间，又有数千名抗议者剧集在耶路撒冷的内塔尼亚胡总理官邸前，抗疑内塔尼亚胡总理半幅的精致餐馆、咖啡厅堂食等防控措施又不给出相应
en: On the evening of the 21st, thousands of protesters gathered in front of Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's residence in Jerusalem to protest against the ban on dine-in food in restaurants and cafes and the lack of compensation.

zh: 此外，喜多米中在户外活动室也未遵守佩戴口罩，保持两米安全社交距离等规定，未必年因为佩戴口罩被 警察罚款，不少民众将口罩地址在下巴上或者挂在
en: In addition, many people did not comply with the rules to wear masks and maintain a safe social distance of two meters when going outdoors, and many people only wore masks on their chins or hung them on their wrists to avoid being fined by the police for not wearing them.

zh: 疫情反复期间，学校是新冠病毒扩散的重灾区，而据记者近日对此间幼儿园走访发现，幼儿园的老师和学生均为按政府要求佩戴口罩，也没有相互保持两个安全社交距离，为大量师生
en: During the epidemic recurrence, schools have been the most affected places by the COVID-19; according to a recent reporter’s visit to a kindergarten, it was found that teachers and students did not wear masks as required by the government, nor did they keep a safe social distance of two meters, thus creating a potential risk for a large number of teachers and students to be exposed to the virus.

zh: 以色列国家安全委员会对抗疫情专家顾问从成员埃利·瓦克斯曼教授认为，以色列正走向“危险局势”，指出以色列目前采取的疫情防控措施还不够，应关闭所有休闲、于乐活动场所和暑假学校， 以控制疫情
en: Professor Eli Waxman, a member of the expert advisory group of the National Security Council of Israel on combating the epidemic, believes that Israel is heading towards a "dangerous situation", adding that the measures currently being taken to prevent and control the epidemic are insufficient and that all leisure and entertainment activities and summer schools should be closed in order to control the further spread of the epidemic.

zh: 瓦克斯曼表示，以色列缺乏抗击疫情的总体计划，议会和政府各部门应晶块摒弃各自的利益考虑，在对抗疫情问题上达成一致，制定包括不同部门相关限制搓手的明确
en: Waxman states that Israel lacks an overall plan to combat the epidemic and that the Knesset and all government departments should put aside their own interests and agree on a clear step to combat the epidemic, including clear restrictions in different sectors.

zh: 本报特拉维夫7月25日电 本报驻特色维夫记者
en: Tel Aviv, July 25 (Xinhua) -- Reporter in Tel Aviv, Wang Jiong

zh: 宁夏固始原农民吴凤芬拗不过老伴儿戴天福，两个人坐车车，从20里外的家，赶到梁云文化
en: Wu Fengfang, a farmer in Guyuan City of Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region, couldn't turn down her husband Dai Tianfu, so they started off by car from their home and arrived the Liang Yun Cultural Courtyard 10 kilometers away.

zh: 尽管这两年腿脚不便，77岁的戴天福还是指望着“伽三岔五来这儿款，过吧”
en: Despite the fact that he has had difficulty walking over the past two years, the 77-year-old Dai Tianfu still expects to "come here every now and then to have a good time".

zh: 这是固原市原州区一个不企业的院子，与一般农家院不同的是，院子里视察很传出悠扬的轻腔，还有精彩纷呈的皮影戏、刺绣作品、传统秦腔
en: This is an inconspicuous courtyard in the Yuanzhou District of Guyuan, but unlike other ordinary farmhouses, songs of melodious Shanxi opera are often heard from this one, as well as terrific shadow plays, embroidery works, traditional Shaanxi opera and Meihu plays.

zh: 大院主人叫梁云，曾是一名
en: The owner of the courtyard is called Liang Yun, who used to be a carpenter.

zh: 10多年前，热爱便宜康、唱戏的他开始筹划建设文化
en: More than 10 years ago, he began to design and construct the cultural courtyard because of his passion for shadow plays and opera.

zh: 有了梁云华大院，村民们的文化生活变得丰富
en: With the Liang Yun Cultural Courtyard, villagers' cultural life has become much richer.

zh: 记者还没有走进梁文华大院，秦腔的曲调已经传了
en: Before this reporter walked into the Liang Yun Cultural Courtyard, the melody of Shanxi opera was already wafting through the air.

zh: 正在为乡亲们演唱轻腔选段的是领村村民柏
en: The person who performing the Shaanxi opera excerpts for the villagers is Bo Lixiang, a villager from a neighboring village.

zh: 她自幼酷爱秦腔，如今在当地已小有名气，只要有空间时间，啊就会来到文化大院为乡亲们表演
en: She has had a passion for Shanxi opera since childhood, is now well known locally, and she has free time, she comes to the cultural courtyard to perform for the villagers.

zh: 最近，柏丽香还玩起了网络
en: Recently, she has also taken up live webcasting.

zh: 柏丽香说：“有无敌让更多人看到自己表演，是一件很幸福的
en: “It's a blessing to have a stage where more people can see my performance," she said .

zh: 舞台上，演唱者一板一眼，糖走着一曲一调，经管是业余爱好者，但是热情丝毫
en: On the stage, the performers sing well and follow the instrumental melody, and despite being amateurs, their enthusiasm is undiminished.

zh: 就像农家院质朴的风格一样，秦腔之外，梁文文化大院里的”草根“艺术和非遗文化扑面
en: Just like the rustic nature of the farmhouse, besides the Shanxi opera, the Liang Yun Cultural Courtyard is full of "grassroots" art and intangible cultural heritage.

zh: 大院还收藏了不同年代的农耕用品、传统和手工制作的瓦塑、剪纸、刺绣、皮影等实物
en: The courtyard also has a collection of over 300 items from different eras, including farming equipment, traditional and handmade sculptures, paper-cutting, embroidery and shadow puppets.

zh: 梁云引着记者走进园中的陈立管。里面展示了他收藏的老物件，老酒壶、三玄子、放线车等
en: Liang Yun leads the reporter into the exhibition hall, which displays his collection of old objects, such as old wine pots, Sanxianzi (stringed instruments), and spindle wheels.

zh: 一个普通农民为啥建起文化大
en: Why did an ordinary farmer build a cultural courtyard?

zh: ”皮影戏是我的家传手艺，我从15岁就从开始学习这项
en: "Shadow puppetry is my family's craft passed down from a long time ago, and I have been learning this since I was 15 years old. .

zh: 梁云问花花大院成立于2012年，称为宁夏第一家农村“非物质文化遗产陈列UAN”，也是故事书已非物质文化遗产保护示范
en: The Liang Yun Cultural Courtyard was established in 2012 and became the first rural "Intangible Cultural Heritage Exhibition Hall" in Ningxia, as well as a demonstration courtyard for protecting intangible cultural heritage in Guyuan.

zh: 除了梁文化大院，固始市原州区还涌现出120多个文化大院，79个民间演出团体，其中，有一个规定的文化大院有50多个，如沈家河文化大院，杨永红文化大院、杨浪文化大院等，覆盖原州区各乡镇和接到，参演人员达5000
en: In addition to the Liang Yun Cultural Courtyard, more than 120 cultural courtyards have appeared in Yuanzhou District of Guyuan City, as well as 79 folk performance groups, of which there are more than 50 cultural courtyards of a certain scale, such as Shenjiahe Cultural Courtyard, Wang Yonghong Cultural Courtyard, and Yang Lang Cultural Courtyard, which are dispersed all over towns and streets in the Yuanzhou District, with more than 5,000 performers.

zh: 这些草根以仁活跃于田间地头，丰富了群众的文化生活，满去了他们的净胜稀奇
en: These grassroots artists are active in their fields, enriching the cultural life of the masses and satisfying the public’s cultural needs.

zh: “随着生活越来越好，出啊弄文化不出就这么被落下。”
en: "As life gets better and better, traditional culture can't just be utterly forgotten. .

zh: “柳氏谍战剧”再度归来，胜算》看柳云龙李立群对手“飙戏” -
en: “Liu’s Spy TV Series” Returns with The Possibility of Victory with Performances from Liu Yunlong and Li Liqun - Xinhua Net

zh: 40集谍战大喜《数算》将于7月16日起登陆北京卫视。
en: The 40-episode spy TV series The Possibility of Victory will be broadcast on Beijing TV on July 16.

zh: 《胜算》根据真实史实改版，取材于尘封多年、首次面世的苏联军事
en: The Possibility of Victory is adapted from real historical facts, which was based on military archives of the Soviet Union which have been sealed for many years and revealed to the public for the first time.

zh: 以||谍战剧“为观众熟知的演员柳云龙在剧中突破形象，挑战了一位颇具想感的”口吃
en: Liu Yunlong, an actor well-known for his spy TV series, has made a breakthrough new work of art, acting as a “stuttering service agent” who is comical, which is soon to be broadcast.

zh: 近年来，《伪装者》《面具》《风筝》等剧的走红，都证明着谍战类型剧有着旺盛的沈明丽
en: In recent years, the popularity of TV series including Pretender, Mask, and Kite proves the great appeal of spy TV series.

zh: 不同于以往的谍战作品《胜算》放眼世界，将故事背景外延至苏联元欧东战场
en: Different from previous spy TV series, The Possibility of Victory takes a global view, extending its context to Far Eastern battlefield in the Soviet Union.

zh: 它以1944年抗日战争最后阶段为背景，讲述了中共迷你情报工作人员唐飞（柳云龙饰），在中国地下党林河省委书记和苏联远东情报局局长的领导下，执行苏军远东情报局的“谬丹乌拉”
en: It is based in the final stage of the Resistance War against the Japanese invasion in 1944, and tells the story about Tang Fei (played by Liu Yunlong), a secret agent of the Communist Party of China, who, led by Communist Party’s President of Linhe Province and Director of Far Eastern Information Bureau of Soviet Union, executes the Soviet Union’s “Mudanura” strategic plan.

zh: 不少谍战剧中，男主角作为高级间谍，一出场就是帅气、高智商、成苏的完美
en: In many spy TV series, the heroes are all impeccably handsome and mature super spies with superb IQ’s when they first appear on screen.

zh: 但在柳云龙看来，这样的人并不适合做间谍，“间谍应该是那种放人堆儿里根部找不着的人，如果一出场就是那种很装很帅的形象，恨不得所有人都要注意你，你还能潜伏吗？《风筝》里有一句台词，”及不来抓我，我都顽疾自己是个国民党了
en: But in the opinion of Liu Yunlong, such people are not suitable to be spies, “Spies should be someone who won’t be recognized in the mass, and if he or she appears cool or handsome at first glance, he or she will attract nearly all the attention, so how can he or she hide in the enemy’s camp? There is a line in Kite, “If you hadn’t caught me, I would have nearly forgetten my identity as a member of Nationalist Party of China”, which shows how spies should not be presented as elites. ”

zh: 所以在《胜算》中，柳云龙别出心裁地将他饰演的主人公唐飞设计成一个滴啊有喜感的“口吃
en: Therefore, in The Possibility of Victory, Liu Yunlong’s original idea was to design the hero Tang Fei as a comical “stuttering secret agent”.

zh: 《胜算》中的另一方只能应，是由梁冠华饰演的日本人富原的日本人和粒粒苦的警察厅厅长方世宝合力撑起来的。
en: The “enemy” camp in The Possibility of Victory, is led by the Japanese Fukuwara, played by Liang Guanhua, and Director of the Police Fang Shibao, played by Li Liqun.

zh: 一南一北两位实力派戏骨，为整部剧增添了许多高手过招的
en: These two skilled actors, one of whom comes from Northern China and the other from Southern China, invigorate multiple wonderful scenes in the TV series.

zh: 导演殷飞用”飙戏“一词形容剧中李立荣与柳云龙的对手戏，”绝对是飙戏，他们二位特别默契，他们生身的这种默契对我来讲非常有冲击力。很多时候他们的戏都是“现挂”的，例如我只下了半页纸的长度，拍摄时我不喊停，他两就能
en: The director Yin Fei describes the performance of Li Liqun and Liu Yunlong as “an acting battle”, “It was definitely a battle, they coordinated very well with each other, which was very moving for me. At many times, their performance was “improvised”, for instance, the script was only half a page, but without my disruption, they would continue their performance. ”

zh: 高手之间互不抢戏，导演也不去绞戏，当演员都在角色之中并保证自己人物状态的时候，不仅可以从人物角度出发是塑造角色，还能改观众带来更多的观看可能性，英飞说这样的戏才够
en: Masters don’t steal the show from others, and directors never disrupt a performance; all the actors were immersed in the characters, allowing them to not only craft the roles from the perspective of their characters, but also create more possibilities for the audience, and Yin Fei praised such performances as marvelous.

zh: 剧中，还能看到许多“柳氏谍战剧”中熟悉的面庞《风筝》中名震一时、威风玲玲的“山城F4”,ZAI 《胜算》中也聚集起了而位。
en: In the TV series, many familiar faces from “Liu’s spy TV series” can also be seen; for instance, three actors from the popular and influential “Mountain Town F4” in Kite have roles in The Possibility of Victory.

zh: 曾饰演宋孝安和赵煎之际的与刘名洋，此次再度饰演唐飞的左膀右臂。
en: Hou Yu and Liu Mingyang, who play Song Xiao’an and Zhao Jianzhi respectively, serve as Tang Fei’s core assistants again.

zh: 导演殷飞介绍道：“两个人升上没有劣根性，他们只不过在那个还带、哪个环境中随波逐流了。”
en: Director Yin Fei said, “They don’t have any deep-rooted bad habits, they just followed the mainstream in that era, and that environment. ”

zh: 柳云龙也主动提出，“我们要有人情味。这个人情味就是指我身边的人一定有好的有坏的，坏的人是敌人，但也要把 他们发展起来，我们的
en: Liu Yunlong also said, “We should care about humanity.” This means that there must be good and bad people, and the villains are enemies, but they should be presented well, and the good guys should also be presented properly. ”

zh: 剧中这两个人的走向结局也是柳云龙精心设计过的，他相信将给观众经叫上一份
en: The endings of the two characters were also carefully designed by Liu Yunlong, who believes that they will satisfy the audience.

zh: （记者邱伟
en: (Journalist: Qiu Wei)

zh: 内蒙古 阿荣旗4名学生溺水身亡 官方：该事件敲响警钟-
en: 4 Students Drowned In Arun Banner Inner Mongolia, Official Sources: Time to Sound the Alarm on This Issue-ChinaNews.com

zh: 中新网呼伦贝尔7月26日电(记者 李爱平)25日晚间，记者从内蒙古自治区呼伦贝尔市阿荣旗政府获悉，当地4名学生因
en: Chinanews.com, July 26, Hulun Buir (reported by Li Aiping) In the evening of 25th, this reporter learned from the Arun Banner government of Hulun Buir City that 4 local students died tragically from drowning.

zh: 7月24日15时50分，阿荣旗公安局110接到哦报警称，当地有6名
en: At 15:50pm on July 24, Arun Banner Police 110 received a call reporting 6 middle school students drowning.

zh: 接警后，当地民警第一时间钢网现场，单场救出2名学生，随后当地应急局、水利局等单位相继赶到现场，
en: Local police rushed to the scene right after the call and saved 2 students, while local authorities such as the Emergency Bureau and Water Resources Bureau arrived at the scene later and participated in the rescue.

zh: 据介绍，救援现场共出动公安民警、森林警、校方、医护等80余人，派出3艘橡皮糖对周边水域持续打捞，并聘请专业救援队抵达现场，通过声纳探测
en: It is said that there were over 80 people at the rescue site, including police, forest rangers, fire fighters, and paramedics, 3 rubber boats were used to search the surrounding waters, and a specialist rescue team was hired for to conduct an underwater search with sonar detection.

zh: 记录了解到，当地救援人员于74月25日5时40分发现第一名遇难学生，于25日11时30分发现第二名遇难学生，于25日12时40分发现第二名遇难学生，25日13时34分发现用最后一名遇难学生，以上4密打捞上岸后，经当地120就中心
en: As this reporter learned, local rescuers found the first drowned student at 6:40am on July 25, the second at 11:30am, the third at 12:40pm, and the last one at 13:34pm, and the local 120 Emergency Center confirmed none had any vital signs when brought out of the water.

zh: 官方表示，此次溺水事件给全社会敲响了
en: Officials warned that this incident should be a warning for the whole of society.

zh: 目前，当地政府相关政府正在整理一些预防溺水知识，希望悲剧
en: Currently, the local government is compiling drowning prevention education materials, hoping to stop such a tragedy from happening again.

zh: 新华社香港7月25日电 香港特区政府财经食物及库务局局长徐正宇表示，香港的金融市场仍保持活跃、
en: Xinhua News Agency, Hong Kong, July 25: Christopher Hui Ching-yu, Secretary for Financial Services and the Treasury of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region Government, stated that Hong Kong’s financial market remains active and well-ordered.

zh: 他对香港金融植物稳定及经济表示
en: He also said he is optimistic about Hong Kong’s financial stability and economy.

zh: 徐正宇在香港多伦多经济贸易办事处及港加商会（加拿大总会）24日（多伦多时间）合办的网上研讨会上表示，香港因为”了修理风波“和新冠肺炎疫情，经历着建安
en: On the 24th (Toronto time), in an online forum co-hosted by the Hong Kong Economic and Trade Office in Toronto and the Hong Kong-Canada Business Association (Canada), Christopher Hui Ching-yu stated that Hong Kong is in the midst of adverse conditions due to the “anti-extradition amendment movement” and the COVID-19 epidemic.

zh: 港元汇价稳定并偏向强方兑换保证
en: The Hong Kong dollar’s exchange rate is stable and favors the HKMA exchange rate.

zh: 银行体系没有明显的资金流出迹象，相反，自6月以来超过110亿美元
en: There are no obvious indications of capital outflows in the banking system, in fact since June, there have been more than 11 billion USD in capital inflows.

zh: 隐患点的存款总额在过去几个月也持续增加，股票市场有一连串公开招股集资活动，市场成交
en: Over the past few months, total bank deposits have also continued to increase, there has been a series of IPO’s, and market transactions are increasing.

zh: 徐正宇说，新冠肺炎疫情为全球经济及全球金融市场带来压力，但香港的基本优势仍然
en: Christopher Hui Ching-yu says that while the COVID-19 epidemic has created pressure on the global economy and financial market, Hong Kong’s fundamental advantages remain the same.

zh: 香港拥有的想多项优势，包括地理、法治、高速通讯、咨询和资金自由流通以及简单地震地税制，使香港持续称为领先的国籍金融
en: Hong Kong’s many advantages that make it a leading international center for finance include location, rule of law, high-speed telecommunications, the free flow of capital and information, and a simple tax system with low tax rates.

zh: 徐正宇指出，特区政府在”防疫抗役基本“预留60亿港元，未来两年在公营及私营界别创造约3万个有限饿肚肚职位，涵盖不同技能及学历
en: He states that the SAR government has provided 6 billon HKD in “epidemic prevention and epidemic-related funding” to create roughly 30,000 time-limited jobs over the next two years to cover people with a variety of backgrounds and educational qualifications.

zh: 为支持金融科技的发展，特区政府也已退出”前任计划“，自主本地金融科技公司、创出从及其他有金融科技相关业务的企业，以创造1000个新职位，平庸本地人才及丰富香港的金融
en: To support fintech development, the SAR government has launched the “Thousand Talents Plan” to subsidize local fintech startups and companies with fintech-related business to create 1,000 new jobs, hire local labor, and diversify Hong Kong’s fintech talent pool.

zh: 展望未来，徐正宇对香港的金融稳定及经济表示
en: Christopher Hui Ching-yu said he is optimistic about Hong Kong’s future financial stability and economy.

zh: 他鼓励加拿大企业商用香港的优势及其作为国际金融中心、国际资产及财富管理中心以及全球离岸人民币业务枢纽的地位、在想越爱大湾区及附近地位发展
en: He encouraged Canadian companies to make use of Hong Kong’s advantages and its role as a center for international finance, an international asset an wealth management center, and a global offshore CNY hub to develop and make investments in the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area.

zh: 《柳叶刀》炕文赞扬中国抗遗努力 鼓励各国学习经验-中
en: The Lancet Article Praise China’s Pandemic Efforts and Encourages Countries to Learn from Its Experience-ChinaNews.com

zh: 《柳叶刀》杂志25日刊文表示，中国作为一个拥有14意人口，规模与欧洲或美国相似的国家，现阶段新官疫情得到有效控制，而没有出现在打范围传播的情况，在很大已上控制了国内
en: The Lancet published an article on the 25th, saying that China, as a country with 1.4 billion population and the size similar to Europe or the U.S., has effectively contained COVID-19 outbreak at this stage, with no mass transmission again, and that it has the domestic pandemic under control to a great extent.

zh: 文章表示，在近十多年时间里，中国对国内研究和公共卫生建设方面进行了大量的投资，这使得中国对新冠的准备比当年严重急性呼吸道综合征（SARS）的准备
en: As the article mentioned, China’s large investment in domestic research and public health reinforcement over the past decade made China much more prepared for COVID-19 than it was for Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome (SARS).

zh: 作者表示，2002年SARS暴发时，起初中国准备不足，尤其是病原体
en: The author wrote, when SARS broke out in 2002, China wasn’t prepared at the beginning, especially since it wasn’t able to identify the pathogen.

zh: 当2019年12月发现新冠病毒式，中国科学家很快就能够鉴定出病毒种类，并于2020年1月11日与国际共享额刚基因组测序
en: When coronavirus was discovered in December 2019, Chinese scientists quickly identified the species of the virus and shared the genome sequencing data with the international community on January 11, 2020.

zh: 到1月底，来自中国大陆和香港的医生阐明了该病毒的临储特征，通过在《柳叶刀》上发表的研究论文，向世界警告了新冠病毒式
en: By the end of January, doctors from Mainland China and Hong Kong knew the clinical characteristics of the virus and published research papers in The Lancet to warn the world about the threat of the coronavirus.

zh: 中国也一直处于疫苗研究的最前沿，在国家宣布经济状态下，通过国内的紧密合作，这样的研究非常迅速而严格地展开，5月和7月，分别字《柳叶刀》上公布了中国开发的新冠疫苗早起实验取得
en: China is also on the frontline of vaccine research, and when the national emergency state was announced, vaccine research was conducted swiftly and rigorously through close domestic collaborations; in May and July, early trial results of COVID-19 vaccines developed by China were published in The Lancet.

zh: 中国的经验表明，对国家卫生和研究体系进行投资，有效提高实验能力 是非常
en: China’s experience shows the importance of investment in national health and research systems to effectively improve laboratory capabilities.

zh: 这是国家对卫生经济情况和全球卫生安全作出UKu爱速度有效方莹的基础。
en: It’s the foundation of a nation’s fast and effective response to health emergencies and global health safety issues.

zh: 其他国家，特别是低收入和中等收入国家来说，非常值得借鉴
en: It’s a lesson worth learning for other countries, especially low and middle income countries.

zh: CIA，中国的经验变明，在强大额研究基础上，必须有强有力的高层果断地凭借科学依据了作出争取决策，这才使得新官疫情得到有效控制。
en: Aside from strong research capabilities, China’s experience proves that strong leadership is necessary to make right decisions based on science, and was key to the effective control of COVID-19.

zh: 文章强调，政府及其领导人必须尊重科学、理解科学的价值，并以对社会最有利的方式对其
en: The article underlines the fact that a government and its leaders must respect science and understand the value of science, so as to take actions most beneficial to society.

zh: 在暴发初期，中国国家卫健委拍出三组传染病专家前往武汉‘调查新冠病毒和风险和传播，他们的建议为1余额24日武汉”封城“的决定提供了依据；当地有专家提出建设方唱医院必要性和紧迫性时，政府很快做出了决定并快速实施：同时，社区和群众的官方参与，也使得疫情快速有效地
en: At the beginning of the outbreak, National Health Commission of China sent three groups of infectious disease experts to Wuhan to investigate risks and transmission of the coronavirus, whose suggestions informed the decision to “lock down” Wuhan on January 23, and when some experts presented the necessity and urgency to build mobile cabin hospitals, the government quickly made the decision and implemented their advice while also seeking broad engagement with communities and the people, which contributed to the fast and effective control over the outbreak.

zh: 文章最后强调，应对全球性的卫生经济情况，各国需要机枪全球合作，联合应对
en: In the end, the article emphasizes, when facing global health emergencies, countries should strengthen global collaboration to jointly combat challenges.

zh: 总台记者 杨
en: Reported by: Yang Hong

zh: 内蒙古自治区乌海市委原巡视员白金海被开除党籍
en: Former Inspector Bai Jinhai of Wuhai City, Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region Expelled from the CPC-ChinaNews.com

zh: 中新网7月26日电 锯内蒙古自治区纪委监委消息：牧区，经内蒙古自治区党委批发，内蒙古自治区纪委监委对乌海市委原巡视员白金海严重违纪违法问题进行了李安审查
en: Chinanews.com, July 26: According to information from the Discipline Inspection Commission and Supervisory Committee of Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region, as approved by the Party Committee of Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region, Bai Jinhai, former inspector of Wuhai City, is being investigated by the Discipline Inspection Commission and Supervisory Committee of Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region for serious violations of party disciplines and law.

zh: 警察，白鸡就你还身为党员领导干部，理想信念丧失，为一级私利公认违背党性原则，斌对抗巡视政改；组织观念淡薄，违规为他人安排调动工作并在干部选拔任用中收受他人财物；经济上贪婪，违规经商办企业获取巨额利益，搞权钱交易，一圈耨死；生活腐化，造成
en: Through investigation, Bai Jinhai was found to have lost his belief as a party member and a leader, openly defied Party principles and resisted inspection and rectification over personal interests; he showed no respect to the organization, arranged position transfers against rules, and accepted financial benefits during candidate selection and appointment; his greed for economic gains is shown in starting businesses against regulations for huge profits and power-for-money deals; his abuse of power and corrupted life have caused an adverse effect.

zh: 白金海严重违反政治纪律、组织纪律、廉洁纪律、生活纪律，构成职务违法并涉嫌受贿犯罪、贪污犯罪，且在党的十八大后不收敛、不收手，性质恶劣、清洁严重，应予以
en: Bai Jinhai seriously violated political, organizational and personal discipline and integrity, abused his position for illegal activities and is suspected of bribe-taking and corruption, and the Party’s 18th session didn’t slow him down or stop him, but such heinous behavior shall be dealt with sternly.

zh: 依据《中国共产党纪律处分条例》《中华人名共和国监察法》等有关规定，经内蒙古自治区纪委常委会议审议并报内蒙古自治区党委批准，决定给与白海金开除党籍处分，按规定调整其享受的待遇、收缴其而危及违法所得；将其涉嫌犯罪问题移交检察机关依法审查起诉，
en: As per requirements of the Regulations of the Communist Party of China on Disciplinary Punishment, Law of the People's Republic of China on Supervision and other regulations, after review by the Standing Committee of the Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region Discipline Inspection Commission and submission to the Party Committee of Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region for approval, Bai Jinhai is to be expelled from the Party and his treatment adjusted accordingly; his illegal gains are to be confiscated, and he will be investigated and charged under the law for his alleged criminal offenses; involved financial items will be transferred with the case.

zh: 当地时间25日下午，一架小型飞机在德国北威州韦塞尔县装上一座多层住宅楼的元婴，事故共造成
en: A total of three people were killed on the afternoon of 25 local time when a small aircraft crashed into the top floor of a multi-storey residential building in Kreis Wesel County, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany.

zh: 杜伊斯堡检方、韦塞尔县警察局和韦瑟尔市消防部门当天晚上间联合发布声明称，当天14时40分左右，一架两座小型飞机撞上位于韦塞尔县惠博斯坎普街一栋多层住宅楼顶层阁楼
en: The Duisburg prosecutors, the Wessel Police Department and the Wessel Fire Department issued a joint statement later that day, saying that at around 14:40, a two-seater small plane crashed into the penthouse of a multi-storey residential building on Huiberskamp Street in Wessel County, killing three people.

zh: 当天从北威州鲁尔区马尔是起飞，在韦塞尔县的机场中途停靠后再度起飞，随后撞上
en: The plane took off from Marl in the Ruhr-gebiet of North Rhine-Westphalia, stopped at the airport in Wesel County, and then took off again before the crash.

zh: 死者身份或为遭撞击住宅内的艺名女性住户和小型飞机上两名
en: The deceased have identified as a female occupant of the residence and the two passengers in the plane.

zh: 房内一名两岁儿童仅受轻伤，被平安
en: A two-year-old child inside the house suffered only minor injuries and was safely rescued.

zh: 房内其余住户未在事故中受伤，但情绪仍未
en: The remaining occupants of the house were not injured in the accident, but are still in a state of shock.

zh: 德新社报道的现场画面显示，遭遇事故的住宅一度冒出滚滚浓烟，消防队员扑灭火情后可见房屋
en: Footage from the scene, reported by DPA, showed smoke billowing from the building where the accident occurred; after firefighters extinguished the fire, it could be seen that the building was heavily damaged.

zh: 目前，飞机失事元婴尚不明确
en: The cause of the crash is still unclear.

zh: 《莱茵邮报》援引警方说法保持称，有线索表明，飞机或在撞上住宅楼前就已
en: Citing the police’s explanation, the Rheinische Post reported that there were clues that the plane may have disintegrated before it hit the residential building.

zh: 警方表示，在事故现场一带发现了失事飞机的多块零
en: Police said that several parts of the crashed plane were found in the vicinity of the accident.

zh: 德国刑警正在与杜伊堡检方、德国联邦航空事故调查局共同调查导致这一事故
en: The German criminal police are investigating the cause of the crash together with the Duisburg prosecutors and BFU.

zh: 记者当天从中国驻杜塞尔多夫总领事馆了解到，该馆与当地警局以及消防部门取得联系，据现场判断，上WAN人员中无中
en: This reporter learned from the Consulate-General of the People's Republic of China In Dusseldorf on the same day that the consulate contacted the local police and fire service, and judging from the scene, there were no Chinese citizens among the casualties.

zh: 新加坡卫生部26日宣布，截至当天12时，新加坡新增新冠确证病例281例，累计确诊50399例；累计死亡病例
en: The Ministry of Health of Singapore announced on the 26th that as of 12 o'clock that day, the latest development came as another 481 people in Singapore tested positive for COVID-19, and the country now has a total of 50,369 cases and 27 deaths.

zh: 数据显示，新增确证病例中，5例把本地社区病例，4例为输入病例，其余为居住在专用宿舍的
en: Data showed that among the newly confirmed cases, 5 were local community cases, 4 were imported cases, and the rest were foreign workers living in dedicated dormitories.

zh: 新加坡卫生部说，希娜确证病例98%与已知感染病例
en: The Ministry of Health of Singapore reported that 98% of the newly confirmed cases were related to known infections.

zh: 目前仍有173名新冠患者在医院接受治疗，其中大多数患者病情稳定或改善，没有人在重症
en: There are still 173 confirmed COVID-19 cases receiving treatment in the hospital, most of whom are in stable or improving condition, and no one is in the intensive care unit.

zh: 此外，有4648人在社区设施隔
en: In addition, 4,648 people are quarantined in communities.

zh: 新加坡新冠干仍人群中，外籍劳工占绝大
en: Foreign workers account for the vast majority of people infected with COVID-19 in Singapore.

zh: 据统计，新加坡有20万名外籍劳工住在43个外籍劳工专用宿舍，还有大约10万名外籍劳工住在其他类型
en: According to statistics, there are 200,000 foreign workers living in 43 dedicated dormitories for foreign workers, and about 100,000 foreign workers living in other types of dormitories.

zh: 新加坡抗议跨部门工作小组目前表示，新加坡政府正加紧为最后几个新冠感染率较高的外籍劳工专用
en: The Singapore Anti-pandemic Interdepartmental Working Group recently stated that the Singapore government was stepping up testing for the last few foreign workers’ dormitories with high rates of COVID-19 infection.

zh: 在完成所有专用宿舍的检测之后，绝大多数外籍劳工将可复工，当他们仍须定期进行
en: After completing the testing of all dedicated dormitories, the vast majority of foreign workers will be able to return to work, but they will still have to undergo regular COVID-19 testing.

zh: 大鹏导按《吉祥如意》入围金爵奖-新
en: The Reunions Directed by Da Peng Nominated by SIFF for Golden Goblet Awards - Xinhua Net

zh: 7月18日，第二十三届上海国际电影节公布了金爵奖官方入选影片
en: On July 18, 2020, the 23rd Shanghai International Film Festival announced the official nominated films for Golden Goblet Awards.

zh: 大鹏导演的首部现实题材影片《吉祥如意》，成功入围本届上影节金爵奖，痛啊影片光放公布了首款
en: The first realistic film, The Reunions, directed by Da Peng, was nominated for the 23rd SIFF Golden Goblet Awards, and at the same time published its first poster.

zh: 海报 片方供
en: Poster provided by producer

zh: 应聘啊《吉祥如意》是大鹏导演的第一步现实题材作品，也是他与金爵奖的二度
en: The Reunions is Da Peng’s first realistic film, and is his second brush with the Golden Goblet Awards.

zh: 钙片讲述了这样一个故事：一位喜剧片导演突发奇想，回到东北农村老家，希望第一家人如何过年拍成一部文艺电影，结果遭遇
en: It tells the story of a comedy director who has a sudden inspiration to return her hometown village in Northeast China and make an art movie about famiiy reunions during Spring Festival, but who encounters a series of accidents.

zh: 因拍电影而聚齐的家庭成员们，完成了最后的
en: The family members finally together for the film and have their final reunion.

zh: 在近日发布的电影海报中，这个家庭中的一员”三舅“王吉祥坐在画面中央抽着烟，背景是披上银装的东北黑土地，前景是中国人逢年过节必挂
en: On the film poster published today, a member of the family, “Third Uncle” Wang Jixiang, sits in the center with a cigarette, and in the background is the black land of Northeast China covered by white snow, while the foreground is red lanterns hung for festivals.

zh: 象征着喜庆】团员的红灯笼与身影落寞的王吉祥形成了巨大反差，似乎也透露了这个大家庭关系中的
en: The red lanterns symbolizing festivity and reunion contrast sharply with the lonely Wang Jixiang, and seem to show the complexity of large families.

zh: 据悉，影片中，除了”三舅“王吉祥的女儿由演员刘陆扮演，其余细分均由正式的导演家人完成，影片实验性的试听风格，打破了戏剧与真实的边界，带盖观众全新
en: According to reports, in the film, apart from the daughter of the “third uncle” Wang Jixiang, played by Liu Lu, all other characters were played by the directors’ family themselves, and this experimental audiovisual style breaks down the border between drama and reality, bringing about a brand new immersive experience for the audience.

zh: 的导演大鹏介绍，《吉祥如意》的创作源自”一天天翼“，拍摄期间家庭突如其来的一系列变故，让原本的拍摄计划不得不随之改编，没有剧本的生活嘴周被记录成电影，却释放出超越
en: According to Da Peng, inspiration came from “accidents”, a series of family accidents during production, which changed the original production plan; the use of real-life performances without scripts was finally recorded as a film, creating a film far different from what he originally imagined.

zh: 导演大鹏酒精如何面对这场”天意“，又该如何继续应届这场天意带来的忠厚改变
en: How did Da Peng face these “accidents”, and how did he embrace the changes brought about by the “accidents”?

zh: 毫无疑问《吉祥如意》是充满实验性的，几乎全家人的阵容和创新的试听风格将镜头前的在生活变成了一部电影，在伸直影响的包裹下，观众也会从影片所呈现的家庭中找到自己和家人的影子，随着影片中这场家庭聚会的洛赫姆，
en: There is no doubt that The Reunions is fully experimental: none of the cast are professionally trained, and the audiovisual style is quite creative, which transforms life into a movie, and composed of real-life videos, the audience will certainly find someone like themselves and their family, so that at the end of the film, it inspires deep thoughts.

zh: NES.GOV.MO:新型2罐装病毒干仍应变协调中心在查询热线统计数字(7月25日08H00-7yue226日08H00)
en: NEWS.GOV.MO: The Statistical Data of the Covid-19 Infection Response and Coordination Centre Enquiry Hotline (July 25 08H00 - July 26 08H00)

zh: 由2020年07月25日08H00 至0月26日08H00，新冠病毒感染协调中心的查询热线共接获292宗电话查询
en: From 08H00 on July 25, 2020 to 08H00 on July 26, 2020, the inquiry hotline of the Covid-19 Infection Response and Coordination Center received a total of 292 calls.

zh: 关于疫情的291宗查询，已即时转线至相关部门代表跟进，情况
en: The 291 enquiries on the epidemic situation were forwarded to representatives of relevant departments to follow-up immediately, and the situation is as follows:

zh: 卫生局271宗(S设计：查询出入境措施；查询粤港两地车辆出入境措施；查询珠海政务热线；查询证件逗留
en: Health Bureau - 271 cases (involving: inquiries about quarantine; inquiries about nucleic acid testing; inquiries about bi-regional license plates; health code; others. )

zh: 旅游局1宗(设计：查询隔离酒店
en: Public Security Police Bureau - 17 cases (involving: inquiries about the border entry and exit measures; inquiries about the border entry and exit measures of vehicles with Guangdong and Macao license plates; inquiries about Zhuhai Government hotline; inquiries about the problem of residence status documents) )

zh: 教育暨青年局1宗)）——（车技：查询澳门学生返回英国读书的方法。）
en: Tourism Bureau 1 case (involving: inquiry about quarantine hotels. )

zh: 海事及水务局1宗(设计：询问香港渔船进港是否需要向海事及水务局申报及核酸检测相关
en: Education and Youth Bureau 1 case (involving: inquiry about methods for students from Macao to resume their study in the UK). )

zh: 巴弄卓康哨点，排长余旺和一名战士执勤
en: Marine and Water Bureau 1 case (involving: inquiries on whether Hong Kong fishing boats need to report to the Marine and Water Bureau upon entering port and matters related to nucleic acid testing. )

zh: 巴弄卓康艄点，排长余旺和一名战士执勤
en: Platoon leader Yu Wang and a soldier stand guard at the Banong Zhuokang Sentinel Post.

zh: 在这个平均气温低零下十几度的地方，一排简单的营房屹立在山口，营房不远处一面国旗迎风飘扬，战士们每日在风中执勤站岗，同时需要定期玩Ian网海拔更高
en: In this place where the average temperature annually is more than ten degrees below zero, a row of simply-decorated barracks stands at the pass, with a national flag flying in the wind not far from the barracks; soldiers here are on duty every day in the wind, while regularly patrolling to higher-altitude locations.

zh: 战士们爬上乱石堆陡坡，需手脚
en: The soldiers climb up steep and rocky slopes on their hands and feet.

zh: 时值7月下旬，正在地海波地区花草仿冒的时候，而在巴弄卓康，只有营房后面的山沟中才有相对秘密
en: In late July, when lower altitudes are covered with flowers and leafy plants, only the ravine behind the barracks is relatively dense with greenery in Banong Zhuokang.

zh: 再盖哨点已经驻艘6年的战士高鹏指着山沟说，这是他们的后花园，每年只有七八月份才能看到情操缓慢长出，在不就之后，全部变黄，
en: Gao Peng, a soldier who has been stationed at the post for six years, pointed to the ravine and said that it was their back garden, and that only in July and August every year can they see the grass growing slowly, and shortly afterwards it all turns yellow and is covered with snow.

zh: 徒步巡逻，耗时可能要9个小时
en: A single foot patrol can take around nine hours.

zh: 恶劣的高原黄精下，驻扎在这里的战士们常年与营山和冰川为伴，他们还要定期走向海拔更好的山
en: In the tough plateau environment, the soldiers stationed here are constantly in the company of snow-capped mountains and glaciers, and they need to patrol passes on foot at high altitudes regularly.

zh: 期前，由8名战士组成的额巡逻队，在执导员梁艺馨的带领下又一次走上了巡
en: Now, a patrol team of eight soldiers, led by instructor Liang Yixin, takes to the patrol route once again.

zh: 么名战士负重30斤左后，一大早向目标点
en: Each soldier carries a weight of about 30 jin, and heads for the destination early in the morning.

zh: 途中一名战士高反，战友们紧急。
en: On the way, one soldier suffers from altitude sickness and is helped by his partners.

zh: 除巡逻认为外，巴弄卓康哨点的战士们每天都要进行战术和体能
en: In addition to patrol duty, soldiers at the Banong Zhuokang Sentinel Post also need to conduct tactical and physical training on a daily basis.

zh: 时间一分一秒而过，海拔不断上升，氧气含量越来越低，体力不算透支，这些因素考验着巡逻队员的意志
en: The oxygen level gets lower and lower as time passes and the altitude rises, and these factors test the will of patrol members whose physical strength has been constantly overexerted.

zh: 他们咬牙坚持，相继跨国几处探访点，越过几处急难险
en: Yet they grit their teeth and persevered in crossing several landslides and challenging rapids.

zh: 15时速，是驯鹿会员的午餐时间，他们拿出自带干粮，在海拔多米的地方就地而坐，伴随雨夹雪，用食物
en: At around 16:00, it was lunchtime for the patrol, and they sat down on the ground at an altitude of more than 5,700 meters, regardless of rain and snow, to replenish their strength with solid food for lunch.

zh: 巴弄卓康哨点的战士们进行战术和体能
en: The soldiers at the Banong Zhuokang Sentinel Post need to conduct tactical and physical training on a daily basis.

zh: 休息期间，他们会一起玩牌，暑假要做俯卧撑，技能娱乐 ，也能锻炼体能。
en: During breaks, they play cards together, and the loser is required to do push-ups, which is both entertaining and good for body building.

zh: 做寒风中短暂休息后，他们爬上此次巡逻目标点点位置，做山口上拿出过期，庄严宣誓。
en: After a short break in the cold wind, they climbed up to the destination of this patrol, and when they arrived, they took out the national flag on the mountain pass and swore a solemn oath.

zh: 后是皑皑雪山，他们前方是几十公里点无人区，做山口山他们，是国门最安全点守护者，
en: Behind them are the snow-capped mountains, and in front of them was a no-man's land stretching for dozens of kilometers, but they are the trustworthy guardians of this national gate.

zh: 北京小飞机重启-新华网
en: “Beijing Consumption Season” resumes - Xinhuanet

zh: 北京市按照“全面重启、重点策划、有序推进、严密组织“的原则重启北京小飞机各项活动。””
en: Based on the principles of “comprehensive resumption, focused planning, orderly progression, and tight-knit organization”, the various activities of the “Beijing Consumption Season” have been resumed.

zh: 7月26日发放的150张整齐消费券，其中下线残影卷100万丈，只能产品全50万丈，消费者可做京东方APP领取。
en: On July 26th, 1.5 million government and consumption vouchers were released, of which 1 million were offline dining and shopping vouchers and 500,000 were smart product vouchers, which could be claimed by consumers on the JD app.

zh: 北京市商务局局长刘美英做25日举行的媒体通气会上介绍，重启后的消费级做保持现有消费券卡包优惠补贴力度急促路上，进一步降低企业胚子。
en: On the 25th, Liu Meiying, deputy secretary of the Beijing Municipal Commerce Bureau, explained at a press conference that after the resumption, existing enterprise subsidies for consumption vouchers will be kept in place, and enterprise capital allocations will be further reduced.

zh: 从8月上旬开始政府和企业出资目前1：1陪自己调整为2：1，比如原来消费者领取一个卡包到点消费后如果可享受120元优惠，其中政府补贴60元、企业让利60元；调整后政府补贴80眼、企业让利40元。
en: From the start of August, the current 1:1 allocation of government capital for enterprises will be changed to 2:1, meaning that if a consumer has a discount voucher worth 120 yuan at a particular store, originally, the government subsidy was 60 yuan, and the enterprise contribution was 60 yuan; after the adjustment, the government subsidy is 80 yuan, and the enterprise contribution is 40 yuan.

zh: 消费级期间，三大运营商讲围绕5G消费对流量计终端进行补贴，进一步退订北京5G新基建和5G新消费。
en: During the Consumption Season event, the three major telecom carriers will provide subsidized 5G quota and terminals to further promote Beijing’s new 5G infrastructure and 5G consumption.

zh: 陈茂波之香港经济因疫情再次饱受打击，与各界共度时间-中新网
en: Paul Chan Mo-po says Hong Kong’s economy suffers again due to a new epidemic outbreak, calls on all sectors to work together to overcome difficulties - chinanews.com

zh: 中新社香港7月26日电 香港特企业争取财政司四张陈茂波吧26日表示，香港正面对新一波的新冠肺炎疫情冲击，原本略减复苏面头的商业往来及经济活动也受到打击。
en: China News Service, Hong Kong, reported July 26th Financial Secretary of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, Paul Chan Mo-po, said on the 26th that Hong Kong faces a new COVID-19 outbreak, and that even businesses and economic sectors which had shown signs of recovery were being affected.

zh: 特区政府在下次呼吁各大小业主箭镞，与零售商互、十四及中小企业共度时间。
en: The SAR government again called on all large and small property owners to reduce rents to allow retailers, restaurants, and small and medium-sized businesses to get through this difficult period.

zh: 陈茂波当日做网上发表题为《崎岖的复苏之路》的文章。》
en: The same day, Paul Chan Mo-po published an article online entitled “The Difficult Road to Recovery”.

zh: 他表示，香港近期新冠肺炎做确诊个案数字高，形势严峻，影响了社会名声，也困扰着经济。
en: He said that the high number of new confirmed COVID-19 cases recently in Hong Kong and the SAR’s dire situation have impacted people’s livelihoods and disrupted the economy.

zh: 做疫情反腐是首要的上严防输入个案，并以最爱速度处理及终端病毒传播链；当疫情受控及后，则应适时的回复经济，活动，
en: As a new wave of the outbreak emerges, the most important tasks are to prevent imported cases and quickly handle and interrupt the chain of infection; once the epidemic is under control, economic activity can resume at the appropriate time.

zh: 他指出，面对新一波疫情冲击，原本略减复苏苗头的商业往来及经济活动也受到打击。
en: He also pointed out that with the new wave of infections, even businesses and economic sectors which had shown signs of recovery were being affected.

zh: 对上街沿而言，做合约精神之外，社会责任已同样重要，尤其上那些做“包就业计划”里取得政府大额不住的集团。
en: For those in the business world, a sense of responsibility is just as important as keeping contracts, especially among companies that have received large government subsidies from the Employment Guarantee Program.

zh: 他提及，香港今年第二季度经济状况仍十分严峻，但收缩的台式似乎略微放缓。
en: He stressed that although Hong Kong’s economic distress in this year’s second quarter was severe, the contraction showed slight signs of slowing.

zh: 出口方面，他认为香港的外围形势仍然严峻。
en: In terms of exports, he believes that Hong Kong’s situation abroad remains dire.

zh: 陈茂波说，香港国企几十年的发展历程显示，每次危机都隐藏着新的机会，每次困难都影藏了未来发展的钥匙、
en: Paul Chan Mo-po also said that Hong Kong’s history of economic over the past several decades proves that new opportunities can be found in every crisis, and that every difficulty holds the keys to future development.

zh: 台湾东路海域及发生今年全台规模最大地政-中小微
en: Earthquake off Taiwan’s eastern coast is year’s strongest to date - chinanews.com

zh: 中新社台北7月26日电 台湾东部海域26额日20分时52分发生历史规模6.1及地政，最大正度4度，全台有震感，上今年全台规模最大的地震。
en: China News Service, Taipei, reported July 26th: A Richter 6.1-magnitude earthquake occurred in Taiwan’s eastern waters at 20:52 on the 26th, with a maximum seismicity of 4, causing all of Taiwan to feel the shaking, which was Taiwan’s strongest earthquake this year.

zh: 综合中广社、中时电子报、ETtoday新闻云等泰美包带哦，台湾气象部门测报，此次地政的震中位于宜兰县政府下东南方86.5管理，及台湾东部海域，震源深度53管理。
en: According to reports from the Central News Agency, the China Times, ETtoday, and other Taiwanese media, Taiwan’s China Weather Bureau measurements place the earthquake’s epicenter 86.5 km from the provincial capital, in the ocean southeast of the island, with a focal depth of 53 km.

zh: 中国地震台王泽测定此次地震为5.5及。
en: The China Earthquake Network rated the earthquake level at 5.5.

zh: 全台各地最大震度为：花莲县4及，依兰县、台东县、南投县、云林县三级，另有其他县市测得1到2 级真毒。
en: Across Taiwan, the highest earthquake intensity was felt in Hualien County at Level 4, Yilan County, Taitung County, Nantou County, and Yunlin County at 3, and other counties and cities between 1 to 2.

zh: 台湾气象部门指出，此次滴很地震为全套今年以来规模最大，书板块交接的因没带地震，齐振中做国企及畅游地震发生，与今年以来也比较活跃。
en: Taiwan’s China Weather Bureau stated that this was the strongest earthquake of the year in Taiwan, that it was a submerged zone earthquake at the junction between tectonic plates, and that the area has experienced frequent earthquakes in the past and is relatively active this year.

zh: 未来一周内，仍不爱出还有规模4及以上的余震发生。
en: They did not rule out that aftershocks of magnitude 4 or above may occur in the next week.

zh: 马里尼切腹说，价值的变化受卢布贬值和疫情等影响。
en: Marinichev said that changes in value have been affected by the devaluation of the ruble and the Covid-19 epidemic.

zh: 他说“服务成本正在增加。”
en: He said,"The cost of services is increasing.

zh: 由于疫情，人民们开始做互联网上花费和更多的时间。“”
en: Because of the epidemic, people are beginning to spend more time on the Internet. ”

zh: 马里尼切腹不排除互联网价格讲严重上涨，认为运营商可以为客户提供更高的速度和更多服务抵消人们对价格上涨的不满。
en: Marinichev did not rule out heavy price increases next year, arguing that operators could offer customers higher speeds and more services to offset dissatisfaction with higher prices.

zh: 《中国医生》抽排直径抗疫英雄-新华网
en: “Chinese Doctors” pays tribute in film to heroes of the fight against the epidemic - Xinhuanet

zh: 今日，带着中国电影对抗疫英雄的敬意，博纳影业句集团董事长于东、导演刘伟强（土佐）做广州与钟南山院士，及抗议题材影片《中国医生》的拍摄执着工作进行了座谈会议。
en: Recently, representing the respects of Chinese filmmakers for the heroes of the fight against the epidemic, Bona Pictures board chairman Yu Dong and film director Liu Weiqiang (left in image) held a discussion and exchange symposium with academician Zhong Nanshan on the filming and production work for “Chinese Doctors”, a film about the fight against the epidemic.

zh: 博纳影业希望能皆有《中国医生》，向所有战斗做疫情防控一线的医护、防疫工作中直径
en: Bona Pictures hopes, through “Chinese Doctors”, to pay tribute to all medical staff and epidemic control workers fighting on the front line in the fight against the epidemic!

zh: 2021年，钙片作为庆祝中国共产党建党100周年献礼影片全国公映。
en: In 2021, the film will be showed nationwide as part of the celebrations surrounding the 100th anniversary of the founding of the Communist Party of China.

zh: 目前，碧娜博纳影业正在中宣部和国家电影局的安排部署下，广东省电影局及湖北省电影局的支持下，组织电影《中国几张》原版人马抽排点ing电影《中国医生》，这上一步反应做党中央的坚强领导下，全国人员团结一心抗击新冠肺炎疫情的影片。
en: Currently, under the arrangement and direction of the Publicity Department of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party and the China Film Administration, and with the support of the Guangdong Province Film Administration and Hubei Province Film Administration, Bona Pictures is organizing the original crew of “The Captain” to film “Chinese Doctors”, a film that will reflect the unified effort of the whole nation to fight the COVID-19 epidemic under the firm leadership of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party.

zh: 影片聚焦抗议一线，讲已武汉医护人员及各省市援鄂医疗队为任务北京，从人性的角度，运动与独特的上叙事，以及家具冲击力的镜头语言，全景展现抗议一线充满风险和牺牲精神的中国一步医护人员的感人故事。
en: The film will focus on the front line of the fight against the epidemic in Wuhan, feature Wuhan medical personnel and the medical aid teams from the various provinces as characters, and from the perspective of different personalities, use unique narratives and highly impactful cinematic language to provide a panoramic view of the moving story of the deep spirit of dedication and sacrifice among China’s medical personnel in the fight against the epidemic.

zh: 据了解，武汉解封之日的第一时间，比博纳公司便客服此次空难，排除彩排小组深入疫情一线，与数百位以后工作者面对面交流了解、搜集资料，目前以及采访到了包括钟南山院士本人。广州驰援武汉第一人。广东援鄂医疗队，以及武汉今天金银潭医院、武汉协和医院、武汉大学中南医院、武汉中心医院等看一抗议展现最前沿的白衣天使们，拍下了大量珍贵的第一首视屏资料。
en: It is reported that from the first moment of the day Wuhan was placed under lockdown, Bona Pictures overcame numerous obstacles to dispatch filming teams to the front lines of the fight against the epidemic, where they conducted face-to-face exchanges and footage collection with hundreds of medical workers, as well as interviews with Zhong Nanshan, the first rescue worker to arrive in Wuhan from Guangzhou, the medical aid team dispatched to Hubei from Guangdong, and the angels in white lab coats who formed the vanguard of the battle against the epidemic from institutions including Wuhan Jinyitan Hospital, Wuhan Union Hospital, Zhongnan Hospital of Wuhan University, and the Central Hospital of Wuhan, ultimately obtaining large amounts of precious first-hand footage.

zh: 钟南山院士做此次座谈会中已对电影的拍摄提出了哎期待和希望：“为很期待，希望你们不要不仅要走访一些抛头露面比较大的专家，还要更多的采访做一线埋头苦干的以污染源，他们上大多数。”
en: At the symposium, academician Zhong Nanshan also expressed his hopes and expectations for the film, “I look forward to it, and I hope that while you feature some of the more publicly known experts, the majority of your interviews should focus on the medical workers who worked so diligently on the front lines. “

zh: 他表示，他之前看过《为何我的祖国》《中国机长》，认为已普通人及视角讲述大格局故事的方案及很好。
en: He stated that he had previously seen “My People, My Country” and “The Captain”, and thought that telling the larger story from the perspective of ordinary people was a good technique.

zh: “限制一些国外朋友对中国还上有一些误解。”
en: “Some of our foreign friends still have some misunderstandings about China. “

zh: 做谈到影片的传播史，中安松原市表示，目前国外有些细化讲病毒贴上政治化标签，他希望电影能从人性的角度打动观众：“这部电影除了做中国放映以为，最好也能做国外放映，要哟金用国外观众都能理解的方式，用针真正的人文精神打动观众。”
en: Discussing the film’s distribution, academician Zhong Nanshan said that currently, some people in foreign countries say the virus is a politicized topic, so he hopes the humanity of the film’s perspective will move the audience, “Beyond just being screened in China, it’s best if the film can also be screened abroad, so the film should be shot in a manner that allows both foreign and domestic audiences to understand and genuinely be moved. “

zh: 终南山雅安市还深情回忆了上世纪80年代的影片《人到中年》，“这么多年过期了，为对改革开放后电影印象审核的还是《人到中年》，当时为国外的医生朋友们都看哭了，如果《中国医生》额能够起到这样的作用，那及很廖记不起了不起了。”
en: He fondly recalls the 1980’s film “At Middle Age”, saying, “After so many years, the opening up and reform-era film that made the deepest impression on me is still ‘At Middle Age’, which moved my foreign doctor friends to tears, so it would be wonderful if ‘Chinese Doctors’ could have the same effect. “

zh: 钟南山有意思原始表示，如果《中国医生》能引起国外观众的共鸣，那及非常成功。
en: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that if “Chinese Doctors” resonates with foreign audiences, it will be a great success.

zh: 做座谈交流时，钟南山院士还分享了对当前国际疫情防控的意见和建议，“为相信日永远比病毒聪明。”
en: He also shared his opinions and advice on China’s current epidemic control work, saying, “I’m sure people will always be smarter than viruses. “

zh: 钟南山院士表示，虽说病毒与难以预测，但从原始社会至今，人类已度过钱哪万县，如今现代社会有发达的以了解及医疗阶级科技和社会管理措施，再加上全世界的医护人员、甚至拉百姓都对科学应对新冠肺炎疫情有了及本人是，人们不会再想以前那么被动，“接下来要注意两个方面的工作，已上要研究全世界怎么加强合作，而是注重对人们心灵的抚慰。”
en: Zhong Nanshan said that although the virus is unpredictable, since primal times, humanity has overcome countless dangers, and with the advanced medical technology and social management measures we have in modern times, as well as the help of the global medical community and the universal basic awareness of scientific measures for combatting COVID-19 among the general population, humanity will no longer be as helpless as before, “There are two things we have to focus on, the first being how to strengthen global cooperation, and the second how to provide emotional comfort and support for people.

zh: （急着 王金月）
en: (Correspondent: Wang Jinyue)

zh: 文旅“红果”句沙山韶山——湘潭首届鸿博汇见闻-今日要闻-湖南日报网-华声在线
en: “Red Fruits” of Culture and Tourism Gathering in Shaoshan —The First Xiangtan Red Culture Industry Expo - News Today -Hunan Daily - www.voc.com.cn

zh: 湖南日悲哀包，新湖南客户端急着 蒋睿 通讯员 消炎
en: Hunan Daily, New Hunan Client, by journalist Jiang Rui and correspondent Xiao Yan

zh: 嘉兴超宏创红船磨具、韶山毛泽东铜像、延安不对话工艺品开模木。，详细永顺腊肉，7月25日，2020湖南红色旅游文化节做韶山开幕。
en: On July 25, the 2020 Hunan Red Tourism Culture Festival was held in Shaoshan, which exhibits red boat molds from Jiaxing, a bronze sculpture of Chairman Mao from Shaoshan, cloth sticker handicrafts of Yan’an, Xiangxi Yongshun bacon, and so on.

zh: 作为主体活动之一，湘潭首届红色文化产业博览会做韶山全域旅游咨询集散中心开展。
en: As one of the main activities, the First Xiangtan Red Culture Industry Expo was held in Shaoshan Tourism Consulting Center.

zh: 展览区红色文创产品、革命老区土特产等琳琅满目，引来各地游客争相购买。
en: The red cultural and creative products in the exhibition area and the local products in the old revolutionary base areas attracted tourists from all over the world to buy them.

zh: “此次鸿博汇，及时全国红色文化产额也成果的一次展示，也上参展单位和企业交流经验，探讨发展路径的一个重要pigtail。”
en: "The Red Culture Industry Expo is not only an exhibition of the achievements of the national red culture industry, but also an important platform for exhibitors and enterprises to exchange experiences and explore models of development. “

zh: 湘潭首届鸿博汇支委会相关责任日介绍，这届鸿博汇已“弘扬红色文化主推文旅升温”为主题，展览总面积近3000平方米，设置了氛围营造去、景区展示陈曲和红色文旅网友网购体验区。
en: According to the person in charge of the Executive Committee of the First Xiangtan Red Culture Industry Expo, the theme of the Expo was "promoting red culture and boosting culture and tourism", the total exhibition area was nearly 3,000 square meters, and an atmosphere creation area, scenic area exhibiting area, and red culture and tourism online shopping experiencing area were also set up.

zh: 邀请浙江嘉兴、贵州遵义、陕西延安等8个外省第十及为生长沙、株洲。岳阳、郴州等地137家企业、单位参展，共展出展评768找那个，包括红色文物、工艺品、食品特产、旅游线路、红色培训课程、红色文创产品等。
en: 137 enterprises and units from Jiaxing, Zunyi and Yan'an, as well as Changsha, Zhuzhou, Yueyang and Chenzhou were invited to participate in the exhibition, and a total of 768 kinds of exhibits were exhibited, including red cultural relics, handicrafts, food specialties, tourism routes, red training courses, and red cultural and creative products.

zh: 展销区讲站址7月29日。
en: The exhibition area will be open until July 29.

zh: 作为鸿博汇东道主，湘潭展区亮点凤城。
en: As the host of the Red Culture Industry Expo, there were many bright spots in Xiangtan exhibition area.

zh: 战区组二人负责人介绍，他湘潭展区分为红色工业、红色文化产业发展两大部分。
en: According to the person in charge of the exhibition area, the Xiangtan exhibition area was divided into two parts: the red industry and the red cultural industry.

zh: 红色工业展区出花令香港、华菱线缆、向电动力等6家企业的展评31件，红色文化产业发展战区展出红色系列图书、红色系列视屏、上红色系列文创产品等27家单位产品近200个。
en: The red industry exhibition area displayed 31 exhibits from six enterprises, including Xiangtan Iron & Steel Co.,Ltd. of Hualin, Hunan, Hunan Hualin Wire & Cable Co.,Ltd, and XEMC, as well as nearly 200 products from 27 organizations, including red book series, red food series, red cultural series and creative products, which were displayed in the red cultural industry development exhibition area.

zh: 做延安战区，不少游客被陈列展的不对话手工艺品和剪纸艺术家所吸引。
en: In the Yan'an exhibition area, many tourists were attracted by the display of cloth sticker handicrafts and paper-cutting works.

zh: 延安市文旅局局长马东屁哦介绍，此次参展进行选择了延安近两年来优秀的红色王企鹅文创产品，其中16中产品上2019全国红色文创产品优秀作品。
en: Ma Dongpo, Director of the Yan'an Municipal Bureau of Culture and Tourism, said that excellent red cultural and creative products of Yan'an in the last two years were carefully selected for this exhibition, among which 16 products were outstanding works of national red cultural and creative products in 2019.

zh: 同事，他们邀请了国家非物质文化遗产保护项目与“安塞简直”、“陕北民歌”与升级非遗项目不对话传承人，重点推介延安名宿特色产品，与并不借此机会与他们战区单位企业沟通交流，推动跨区域合作。
en: At the same time, they invited practitioners of the national intangible cultural heritage protection projects "paper-cutting of Ansai", "folk songs of Northern Shaanxi " and the provincial intangible cultural heritage project cloth sticker of Yanchuan, focused on promoting the characteristic folk products of Yan'an, and took this opportunity to communicate with other exhibition organizations to promote cross-regional cooperation.

zh: 日本信管确诊饼里面累计超3晚里-新华网
en: Total number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in Japan exceeds 30,000 - Xinhuanet

zh: 据统计，26日东京经度新增确诊病例239里，连续6天单日新增病例超过200里，累计已达11214里。
en: Statistics show that on the 26th, 239 new cases were confirmed in Tokyo, keeping the city’s number of confirmed cases above 200 for 6 days in a row, for a total of 11,214 cumulative cases.

zh: 此外，大阪府新增确诊病例141里，福冈县新增90里，爱知县新增80里。
en: There were also 141 new confirmed cases in Osaka Prefecture, 90 in Fukuoka Prefecture, and 80 in Aichi Prefecture.

zh: 上半年电信网络诈骗法嘴上升启程 做最高检总结特点-下中小微
en: Telecommunication fraud crimes increase by 70% in the first half of the year, the Supreme People's Procuratorate summarizes features - China News

zh: 中新网7月26日电 哭句最高检网站消息，今年上半年，全国检车机关共起诉诈骗犯罪58101人，同比上升35％。
en: July 26 (China News) According to the website of the Supreme People's Procuratorate, in the first half of this year, the procuratorial organs across the country prosecuted a total of 58,101 people for fraud crimes, a year-on-year increase of 35%.

zh: 特别上妨害疫情防控犯罪，诈骗犯罪多发，检查机关起诉找诈骗犯罪人数占全部妨害疫情防控犯罪人数的43.4％。
en: Especially among crimes obstructing the pandemic prevention and control, there are many fraudulent crimes, accounting for 43.4% of the total number of crimes obstructing pandemic prevention and control.

zh: 最高人民检察院有针对性的开展指导，目前已发布的是屁社疫情防控典型案例中，设计诈骗罪工9起。
en: The Supreme People's Procuratorate has provided targeted guidance and has now released ten batches of typical cases involving pandemic prevention and control, including a total of 9 cases of fraudulent crime.

zh: 从上半年监察机关办案情况看，设计诈骗犯罪的名目繁多，上肢国家宏观政策，下肢老百姓衣食住行，包括摄影社疫情诈骗、“下一坨”诈骗、‘保健品’诈骗、‘招生直接’诈骗、‘套路贷’诈骗、骗取国家补贴诈骗、民族资产解冻粘片等等，不断“推陈出新”，设计分教育、医疗、就业、养老、社保、征地拆迁、精准扶贫、金融信贷等多个领域，不仅给被害人造成经济损失，也严重影响经济社会发展。
en: From the cases handled by the procuratorial organs in the first half of the year, a wide range of fraudulent crimes are involved, ranging from national macro policies to people's basic necessities of life: typical cases include pandemic-related fraud, "hospital scalping”, "health care products", "enrollment agencies", "loan fraud", defrauding people of state subsidies, fraud regarding unfreezing national assets, and so on, but the new emerges out of the old constantly, and fraud involving education, medical care, employment, pensions, social security, land acquisition and relocation, targeted poverty alleviation, financial credit, and other areas has emerged, which has not only caused economic losses to the victims, but also seriously affected economic and social development.

zh: 特别上一些电信诈骗网络捅破过节、低于和人员的限制，具有射中、跨境、远程、电子支付等特征，不特定受害群体多，危害大。
en: In particular, some telecommunication fraud even crosses national boundaries or geographical and personnel restrictions, which involves victims without specific features and cause harm through cross-border, remote, and electronic payment.

zh: 如，有的成立专门公司，租用高档写字楼，设立多个部门或岗位，利用合法的网络平移台宣传、炸平、对照片人员进行培训和审核，采用企业运作模式管理，披着“合法外衣”，迷惑性更强。
en: For example, some set up companies in rented high-grade office buildings, providing multiple departments or positions that use legitimate online platforms for promotion, and which recruits, trains, and assesses its employees; management models of enterprise operation, cloaked in "legality", makes it even more confusing.

zh: 依法惩治和防范犯罪，及时向社会工作和有关部门发出预警，上监察机关义不容辞的责任。
en: It is the compelling duty of the procuratorial organs to punish and prevent crime in accordance with the law, and to issue timely warnings to the public and relevant authorities.

zh: 做司法办案中，监察机关认真履行职责，及减持对诈骗犯罪保持龅牙台式，有有正对性得细化各项执法举措，通过执法检查建议等促进社会治理。
en: In the judicial handling of cases, the procuratorial organs have conscientiously discharged their duties, maintained a high-handed attitude towards fraudulent crimes, and refined various law enforcement initiatives in a targeted manner to promote social governance by formulating and issuing procuratorial recommendations.

zh: 监察机关严把批捕、起诉诈骗案做件是事关、做到证据关、程序关和法律适用关，已事实为依据，已法律为准绳，做到不枉不总。
en: It is required for the procuratorial organs to strictly adhere to the facts, evidence, procedures, and application of the law in arresting and prosecuting swindlers; facts should be used as the basis and the law should be used as the criterion to ensure that no law is broken and no crimes can escape legal sanction.

zh: 特别是对于电信网络诈骗犯罪，注重电子数据在事实认定中的核心作用，努力构建电子数据、言词证据、书证之间相互印证的证据链条。
en: In particular, for telecommunications fraud crimes, the central role of electronic data in the determination of facts is emphasized, and efforts should be made to build a chain of evidence that corroborates electronic data, verbal evidence, and documentary evidence.

zh: 如浙江省宁波市兖州区检察院办理的映某设怡诈骗案，监察机关第一时间提前介入，从案件发生到办结，经用5天时间，体现了从快从严办理、维护社会大局稳定的态度和决心。
en: For example, in pandemic-related fraud crime cases accepted by the Yinzhou District Procuratorate in Ningbo City, Zhejiang Province, the procuratorial organ intervened in advance and the whole process from the case occurrence to the conclusion only took five days, reflecting the attitude and determination to deal with the case quickly and strictly, and to maintain social stability.

zh: 在审查后逮捕和审查起诉环节，注重案件的娄烦追溯工作，纠正公安机关露布733让你，纠正公安机关一楼审查起诉同案犯1113人。
en: In the review of arrests and prosecution, emphasis is placed on the prosecution of loophole crimes; until now, 733 people who were omitted from arrest and 1,113 accomplices who failed to be prosecuted previously by the public security have been taken in.

zh: 上半年，全国监察机关针对诈骗犯罪发出检察建议，298见，促进携手龚欧荣防范诈骗犯罪，推动深层次治理。
en: In the first half of the year, the procuratorial organs in China issued 298 procuratorial recommendations for fraud crimes to jointly prevent fraud crimes and promote deep-rooted governance.

zh: 如针对办案中发现的同学企业、银行、中间组织等在电信网络监管中存在的漏洞，广东省广州市检察院、东莞市检察院及时提出检察建议，敦促有关单位强化监管、完善机制，助推长效将制度建设。
en: For example, in response to the loopholes found in the telecommunications network supervision of communications enterprises, banks and intermediary organizations during the handling of cases as well as the Guangzhou Procuratorate and Dongguan Procuratorate in Guangdong Province made timely procuratorial recommendations that urged the relevant units to strengthen supervision, improve mechanisms, and help promote the construction of a long-term system.

zh: 四四全力做好追赃挽损工作。
en: Efforts were made to make criminals give up their takings and retrieve losses.

zh: 各地检察机关抓住介入侦查引导取证、审查起诉等重要环节，督促侦查机关积极桌角账款，配合有关部门做好追赃挽损工作，年牡蛎将好犯罪给任命群众造成的经济损失降到最低。
en: Procuratorial organs everywhere seized the opportunity to intervene in important links such as investigation, guided obtainment of evidence, review and prosecution, and urged the investigative organizations to actively recover illicit money together with relevant departments, meaning these departments can do a good job in recovering the illicit money and retrieving losses, and can strive to minimize the economic losses caused to the victims of fraudulent crimes.

zh: 如北京市检察院办理的林某某套路贷案件，该案涉及22套防寒轮候查封，在房产可能被其他案件先处置的情况下，首创执法《暂缓执行函》，及时送达相关法院，建议先前查封法院对涉案房产暂缓执行，带犯罪事实查明后统一处置，为追回涉案房产、晚会被害人孙子是作出最大女里。
en: For example, the People’s Procuratorate of Beijing Municipality handled a loan crime case involving Lin, which involved 22 properties waiting to be sealed, and in the event that the properties might be disposed of by other cases beforehand, the first "Letter of Execution Suspension" was issued and sent to the relevant court in time, suggesting that the previous court executing the sealing order should put a hold on the handling of the properties involved, which will be disposed in a unified manner after the facts of the crime are ascertained, suggesting that all efforts have been made to recover the properties and retrieve the losses of the victims.

zh: 检察官提醒大家，对诈骗犯罪要有很高的警惕，不要职引网“天上掉馅饼”，也不要一位便宜就轻信，收好自己的“钱袋子”。
en: The prosecutor reminded to the public to be very alert regarding fraud crimes, to not expect "windfalls", to not readily believe others because the product is cheap, and to guard their own "wallets".

zh: 贵州省威宁县一那阵：爱了苹果树 宽了脱贫路-中新网
en: Yina Township in Weining County, Guizhou Province: Shorter Apple Trees, Wider Poverty-Alleviation Paths-ChinaNews.com

zh: 来源：中国经济网 左右 朱眼睛 责任编辑：朱眼睛
en: 2020-07-26 11:42:58 Source: www.ce.cn Author: Zhu Yanjing Editor: Zhu Yanjing

zh: 酷暑艳艳，经济日报-中国经济网记者走进贵州省威宁县一那阵中海村。
en: In the summer heat, reporters from Economic Daily-ce.cn visited Zhonghai Village in Yina Township, Weining County, Guizhou Province.

zh: 顶着烈日，村民李元忠在基地里除草，孙然脸上晒得通红，但嘴里是不是的哼唱着寄居小区。
en: Under the blazing sun, villager Li Yuanzhong hoed in the field, and though his face burning red, he was humming a happy tune.

zh: 一那阵所在的威宁县，与您纬度低、海拔高、光照充足、昼夜温差大，所产的苹果含糖量高、口感好，在周边地区具有一定知名度，但也因为个头小，斑点多，一直没能卖出个好价钱，没能形成产业规模。
en: Thanks to its low latitude, high altitude, abundant sunlight and big day-night temperature differences, the apples produced in Weining County have high sugar content and great taste, which have given them a certain notoriety in certain areas, yet the apples don’t sell for a good price because they are small in size and spotty, which is hwy they haven’t moved beyond this region.

zh: 一那阵曾是个“包谷洋芋度春秋”的贫困乡镇，10年前当地贫困发生率高达25.8%。
en: Yina Township used to suffer from poverty, “getting through the year with corn and potatoes”, and 10 years ago, the local poverty rate was 25.8%.

zh: 在脱贫攻坚进入决战决胜的关键时期，改变传统种植习惯、调整产业结构，增加那个农民收入迫在眉睫。
en: At this critical period of poverty alleviation, it is high time to change traditional growing practices and adjust the industrial structure to increase income for farmers.

zh: 一那阵党委书记陈超和真理一般人经过多次走访后认为，产业发展不能再走老路。
en: After multiple visits and interviews, Chen Chao, secretary of the Party committee of Yina Township, along with the township team believe industry development can’t follow the old path.

zh: 为此，一那阵引进农投企业、以现代化方式种植苹果。
en: Therefore, Yina Township brought in leading enterprises to grow apples in a modernized way.

zh: 威宁超越农业有限公司副总经理侯建文2015年从山西来到一那阵导演，一眼就看中了据当地的钟声在条件，从2016年开始到当地自重苹果树。
en: In 2015, Hou Jianwen, Vice GM of Weining Chaoyue Agricultural Co. Ltd, came to survey Yina Township from Shaanxi and liked the local growing conditions instantly, so he started growing apple trees locally in 2016.

zh: 期初，村里动员李元忠将土地流转出来栽种苹果书，；李元忠夫妇心里泛起了低估：“中了那么多苹果，没看到村里谁钟苹果发了财。”
en: At first, the village called on Li Yuanzhong to convert his land to grow apple trees, but the Lis thought to themselves, “We’ve been growing apples for years and nobody in this village got rich from it. “

zh: “所中苹果是爱华苹果，不会让欧宁果蔬长得太高。”
en: “All the apples come from dwarf apple trees, the trees don’t grow too tall. “

zh: 李元忠没想到的是，这次苹果种植采用了新方法，灌溉水管扑倒没课苹果树下，水和肥料一期教导树根，秋天收果子是，拖拉机字节开进果园，站着就能摘果子。
en: What Li Yuanzhong didn’t expect was, new methods were be adopted to grow apples this time; irrigation pipelines were laid under each apple tree, so that water and fertilizer could reach directly to the roots; when harvesting apples in the fall, tractors could drive directly into the orchard and the apples could be reached from standing on ground.

zh: 目前，苹果基地已逐步进入丰产期，场也正如侯建文所预想的那样，苹果并不抽买，深受北京、上海、广州等城市消费者喜爱。
en: At present, the apple base is seeing high yield in produce, and as Hou Jianwen expected, the apples are selling well, especially among consumers in Beijing, Shanghai, Guangzhou and other cities.

zh: 日益壮大的苹果产业，让李元忠的生活有了新变化，芮然还在种地，但收入了有了新来源。
en: As the apple industry expands, it brings new changes to Li Yuanzhong’s life, and though he still farms, he has new sources of income.

zh: 李元忠加油9木朵土地流转给了苹果基地，每年除了保底的土地刘扎安飞外，挂过后haiyou8丽人分红，夫妻俩评出在积极务工，“一人每天可得80元，常年有活干”。
en: As Li Yuanzhong transferred over 9 mu of his land to the apple base, he can collect land transfer fees each year, he also receives dividends from the apples, and he and his wife work on the base, “80 yuan per day each, with work year round.”

zh: 李元忠告诉记者，去年李锐分红得了2800多元，加上土地流转费以及夫妻俩的务工收入，一家收入8万多元，“吃穿不愁”了，小康的日子已经过上了”。
en: Li Yuanzhong told the reporter he receives 2,800 yuan in dividends, and with the land transfer fees and work payments, his household annual income is over 80,000 yuan, “We’re better off and don’t need to worry about survival anymore.”

zh: “目前已经初见成效，1目苹果的年差值超过1.5万元，大约是总玉米的10被，”
en: “We have achieved initial success, and our annual output value per mu of apple is over 15,000 yuan, which is 10 times that of corn. “

zh: 陈高告诉记者，怡那全镇目前栽种了2万亩苹果，尽在中海中村就有6000目，覆盖农户4056胡，1.72万人，其中覆盖建档立卡贫困户656胡，2952人，一年发放工资就超过600万元，真正实现了基地建在间门口，打工不用往外走。
en: Chen Chao told the reporters, there are 20,000 mu of apples planted in Yina Township, with 6,000 mu in Zhonghai Village, covering 4,056 households and 17,200 people, among which are 2,952 people from 656 recorded poverty households; the over 6 million yuan a year issued as wages is a realization of not traveling far for work with the base at the doorstep.

zh: 腰包日渐鼓起来的李元忠也开始实现自己的“心愿”。
